berita: A number of terrorist prisoners at the Kelapa Dua Detention Center, Depok, West Java were involved in a commotion, which caused damage to a number of facilities at the detention center. Rumors circulated that the commotion was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by officers from Densus 88 Anti-terror. This news was denied by the Head of the Public Information Division of the Public Relations Division of the Police Headquarters, Martinus Sitompul. The former Head of Public Relations of the Polda Metro Jaya confirmed that the commotion was suspected to be a search by officers of a number of apparel terrorist prisoners. "It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard," said Martinus in a written statement, Friday, November 10 2017. At the time of the incident, said Martinus, what the officers did was to check the books and objects in the cell. ''What is there is that the officers conducted an examination of the books and objects in the cell,'' he said. Previously, information was circulating on social networks that this commotion was suspected to have been caused by the throwing of the Koran by officers. Because of that, the prisoners then went on a rampage and damaged a number of detention facilities. "There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, Depok, where the terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk," according to pieces of information that were allegedly hoaxes circulating in the public. Security Tightened Meanwhile, since the commotion in the area of ​​Blocks C and B of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, at the location until Friday night, several officers were seen on guard. A Baracuda car and a number of motorized police officers dressed in all black were seen entering the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, on guard. There is no explanation about the tightening of this security by the police. The officers on standby even asked the media crew to stay away from the location. "Go away, not here," said an officer while asking a number of media crews who were at the main gate of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Depok to leave.
berita_id: Sejumlah tahanan teroris di Pusat Penahanan Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat terlibat dalam keributan, yang menyebabkan kerusakan pada sejumlah fasilitas di pusat penahanan.Rumor beredar bahwa keributan dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas dari Densus 88 Anti-teror.Berita ini ditolak oleh kepala Divisi Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat dari Markas Besar Kepolisian, Martinus Sitompul.Mantan kepala hubungan masyarakat Metro Polda Jaya mengkonfirmasi bahwa keributan itu dicurigai sebagai pencarian oleh petugas dari sejumlah tahanan teroris pakaian."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga," kata Martinus dalam sebuah pernyataan tertulis, Jumat, 10 November 2017. Pada saat insiden itu, kata Martinus, apa yang dilakukan petugas adalah memeriksa buku dan benda di dalam sel.'' Apa yang ada bahwa para petugas melakukan pemeriksaan buku dan benda -benda di dalam sel, '' katanya.Sebelumnya, informasi beredar di jejaring sosial bahwa keributan ini diduga disebabkan oleh pelemparan Alquran oleh petugas.Karena itu, para tahanan kemudian mengamuk dan merusak sejumlah fasilitas penahanan."Telah ada kerusuhan di markas Brimob Kelapa Dua, Depok, di mana para tahanan teroris membakar dan menghancurkan ruangan itu karena penjaga Ahmad dan timnya melemparkan Alquran dan menyebabkan para tahanan mengamuk," menurut informasi yang diduga beredar di publik.Sementara itu, keamanan diperketat, karena keributan di area blok C dan B dari markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, di lokasi hingga Jumat malam, beberapa petugas terlihat berjaga -jaga.Sebuah mobil Baracuda dan sejumlah petugas polisi bermotor yang berpakaian hitam terlihat memasuki markas Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua Depok, berjaga -jaga.Tidak ada penjelasan tentang pengetatan keamanan ini oleh polisi.Para petugas siaga bahkan meminta kru media untuk menjauh dari lokasi."Pergi, tidak di sini," kata seorang petugas sambil meminta sejumlah kru media yang berada di gerbang utama markas brigade seluler Depok untuk pergi.

berita: Invitations to uninstall the Traveloka application are milling about on Twitter's timeline. This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtag #BoikotTraveloka has become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. But it can be ascertained that the news is just a hoax or not true. Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Traveloka is proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Kanisius alumni. However, he was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned several months earlier. to Ananda), he was not there," he said. "We state that Traveloka is a technology-based company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian nation that puts forward the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. These values ​​are always applied to employees and external stakeholders," he continued. DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan regretted the invitation to uninstall Traveloka, which was previously busy milling about on Twitter's timeline. The call to uninstall Traveloka was triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. Related to this, Anies called on his supporters to respect differences. "Well, I think it's like this. We respect people with different views. Respect different people. There is no need to uninstall and so on," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta DPRD Building, Jalan Kebon Sirih, Gambir, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (14/11/2017). ). According to Anies, the Traveloka application has been providing benefits for the community. This invitation should not arise just because of differences of opinion. "Traveloka also provides benefits for many citizens. After all, it is a service that has great benefits for many people. So let's get used to different views in a healthy way, respecting each other without having to carry out punishments like that. So implement there's no need to uninstall all kinds of things. ," said Anies.

berita: Needling in the ear in stroke patients is said to prevent more severe bleeding in the brain. However, that's the wrong way. If you find a patient who has had a stroke, they should immediately be rushed to the hospital, not stabbed. So far cock up there is an assumption, by piercing the needle into the ear and finger can bleed so that the volume of blood flowing in the brain is reduced. This method is considered to reduce the risk of bleeding because the pressure decreases after the blood volume decreases. This was conveyed by Neurologist & Interventional Neurologist, Dr. Fritz Sumantri Usman SpS, FINS, when contacted by Liputan6.com, Jakarta, Monday (24/6/2013). Finger prick, ear prick is wrong. Maybe one in 10 cases that after being injured healed. It's just a coincidence, but don't be. For initial treatment, do not handle at home. Just take him to the hospital, said Dr Fritz. He explained that people who have had a stroke can be identified from symptoms such as: Paralysis on one side of the body Tingling on one side of the body Speak slurred tongue If this is the case, immediately go to the hospital. Don't wait any longer, he said.
berita_id: Tusuk jarum di telinga pada pasien stroke dikatakan mencegah pendarahan yang lebih parah di otak.Namun, itulah cara yang salah.Jika Anda menemukan pasien yang mengalami stroke, mereka harus segera dilarikan ke rumah sakit, tidak ditikam.Sejauh ini ayam di atas ada asumsi, dengan menusuk jarum ke telinga dan jari dapat berdarah sehingga volume darah yang mengalir di otak berkurang.Metode ini dianggap mengurangi risiko pendarahan karena tekanan berkurang setelah volume darah menurun.Ini disampaikan oleh ahli saraf & ahli saraf intervensi, Dr. Fritz Sumantri Usman SPS, FINS, ketika dihubungi oleh LIPUTAN6.com, Jakarta, Senin (24/6/2013).Tusukan jari, tusukan telinga salah.Mungkin satu dari 10 kasus yang setelah terluka sembuh.Itu hanya kebetulan, tapi jangan.Untuk perawatan awal, jangan menangani di rumah.Bawa saja dia ke rumah sakit, kata Dr Fritz.Dia menjelaskan bahwa orang -orang yang mengalami stroke dapat diidentifikasi dari gejala seperti: kelumpuhan di satu sisi tubuh kesemutan di satu sisi tubuh berbicara lidah yang tidak jelas jika ini masalahnya, segera pergi ke rumah sakit.Jangan menunggu lagi, katanya.

berita: The Ministry of Communication and Information (Kominfo) through the Director General of Informatics Applications again sent a letter to Facebook on Thursday (19/4/2018). The letter is still related to the leak of data of 1.3 million Facebook users in Indonesia and the alleged misuse of the data. Through the letter, on behalf of the government of the Republic of Indonesia, Kominfo asked for confirmation and explanation of the information on the misuse of Facebook user data, which reportedly spread to other analysis firms besides Cambridge Analytica, namely CubeYou and Aggregate IQ. In addition, Kominfo also asked for confirmation and further explanation regarding the technical actions that Facebook will take to limit access to the data they have. Regarding this data access restriction, the Head of Public Policy at Facebook Indonesia previously disclosed in a letter sent on April 5, 2018. Again, Kominfo asked Facebook to provide schedule data and audit results for cases of misuse of user data from the leaking of data of 1.3 million Indonesian Facebook users. Previously, at a meeting with Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives, Facebook was asked to conduct an audit for one month, starting April 17, 2018. In response to this, Facebook mistreat confirmed that it would conduct a transparent audit, but could not promise an exact date for the completion of the process. Finally, in a letter sent by Kominfo, Facebook was asked to provide data on Indonesian Facebook users who were affected by data misuse by Cambridge Analytica. Kominfo emphasized that Facebook could fulfill all of these requests, no later than seven calendar days after the letter was sent last Thursday. If by the time limit specified Facebook has not fulfilled the request, there is no certainty about the steps that will be taken by the government. There is also no certainty about the news that Facebook will be closed on April 24, 2018. The government can indeed impose strict sanctions by blocking Facebook, however, the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, has never mentioned the issue of blocking since the first time this case emerged. So, it can be ascertained that the news of the closing of Facebook on April 24, 2018 is not true or a hoax.
berita_id: Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi (KOMINFO) melalui Direktur Jenderal Aplikasi Informatika lagi mengirim surat ke Facebook pada hari Kamis (19/4/2018).Surat itu masih terkait dengan kebocoran data 1,3 juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia dan dugaan penyalahgunaan data.Melalui surat itu, atas nama Pemerintah Republik Indonesia, Kominfo meminta konfirmasi dan penjelasan informasi tentang penyalahgunaan data pengguna Facebook, yang dilaporkan menyebar ke perusahaan analisis lain selain Cambridge Analytica, yaitu Cubeyou dan agregat IQ.Selain itu, Kominfo juga meminta konfirmasi dan penjelasan lebih lanjut mengenai tindakan teknis yang akan dilakukan Facebook untuk membatasi akses ke data yang mereka miliki.Mengenai pembatasan akses data ini, kepala kebijakan publik di Facebook Indonesia sebelumnya diungkapkan dalam surat yang dikirim pada 5 April 2018. Sekali lagi, Kominfo meminta Facebook untuk memberikan data jadwal dan hasil audit untuk kasus penyalahgunaan data pengguna dari bocor data 1,3 juta pengguna Facebook Indonesia.Sebelumnya, pada pertemuan dengan Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia, Facebook diminta untuk melakukan audit selama satu bulan, mulai 17 April 2018. Sebagai tanggapan terhadap hal ini, Facebook Mistreat mengkonfirmasi bahwa itu akan melakukan audit transparan, tetapi tidak dapat menjanjikan tanggal pasti untuk penyelesaian proses tersebut.Akhirnya, dalam surat yang dikirim oleh KOMOMO, Facebook diminta untuk memberikan data tentang pengguna Facebook Indonesia yang dipengaruhi oleh penyalahgunaan data oleh Cambridge Analytica.Kepomo menekankan bahwa Facebook dapat memenuhi semua permintaan ini, selambat -lambatnya tujuh hari kalender setelah surat itu dikirim Kamis lalu.Jika pada batas waktu yang ditentukan Facebook belum memenuhi permintaan, tidak ada kepastian tentang langkah -langkah yang akan diambil oleh pemerintah.Juga tidak ada kepastian tentang berita bahwa Facebook akan ditutup pada 24 April 2018. Pemerintah memang dapat menjatuhkan sanksi yang ketat dengan memblokir Facebook, namun, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara, tidak pernah menyebutkan masalah pemblokiran sejak pertama kali kasus ini muncul.Jadi, dapat dipastikan bahwa berita tentang penutupan Facebook pada 24 April 2018 tidak benar atau tipuan.

berita: Raids on pacifiers suspected of containing drugs were also carried out in Bangkalan Regency. During the raid, which was held by joint officers from the Bangkalan Police, Satpol PP, and the Bangkalan Health Office, thousands of bottles of dot candy were secured from a number of shops. The target of the raid was not only big shops. A number of hawkers who sell in elementary schools (SD) also did not escape the simultaneous operation in a number of Bangkalan areas. Even the joint officers found the candy agent allegedly containing the banned substance. The total number of confiscated candies was 1,530 bottles. All the evidence is secured at the Mapolres and will be tested in the laboratory to determine the substance in it. “This raid is not only in the city. But we spread it to a number of areas such as Tanah Merah, Kamal and Sukolilo," explained Head of the Bangkalan Police Ops, Kompol Agung Setyono, Wednesday (8/7/2017). The next step, said Agung, is to wait for the results of the examination and research on the content of the candy. If it is proven that they contain illegal drugs, the candy sellers will be summoned for questioning. However, if it does not contain harmful substances, it will be returned. “This candy has spread everywhere. Of course, it is a concern for parents to supervise their children when buying any food,” he added. Meanwhile, Head of the Health Division of the Bangkalan Health Office, Ciptaning Tekad, added that at least the candy should be secured first and waiting for the results of research from the Surabaya Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BBPOM). "If you look at the ML code, these are imported goods. If confect MD is a domestic product. But all the explanations are in Indonesian. Whether this is fake or not, we are waiting for the results of the examination," he explained.
berita_id: Penggerebekan pada dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan juga dilakukan di Kabupaten Bangkalan.Selama penggerebekan, yang dipegang oleh petugas bersama dari polisi Bangkalan, Satpol PP, dan Kantor Kesehatan Bangkalan, ribuan botol permen DOT diamankan dari sejumlah toko.Target serangan itu bukan hanya toko -toko besar.Sejumlah penjaja yang menjual di sekolah dasar (SD) juga tidak luput dari operasi simultan di sejumlah wilayah Bangkalan.Bahkan petugas gabungan menemukan agen permen yang diduga mengandung zat yang dilarang.Jumlah total permen yang disita adalah 1.530 botol.Semua bukti diamankan di Mapolres dan akan diuji di laboratorium untuk menentukan zat di dalamnya."Serangan ini tidak hanya di kota. Tapi kami menyebarkannya ke sejumlah daerah seperti Tanah Merah, Kamal dan Sukolilo," jelas kepala Ops Polisi Bangkalan, Kompol Agung Setyono, Rabu (8/7/2017).Langkah selanjutnya, kata Agung, adalah menunggu hasil pemeriksaan dan penelitian tentang konten permen.Jika terbukti bahwa mereka mengandung obat -obatan terlarang, penjual permen akan dipanggil untuk ditanyai.Namun, jika tidak mengandung zat berbahaya, itu akan dikembalikan."Permen ini telah menyebar ke mana -mana. Tentu saja, itu menjadi perhatian orang tua untuk mengawasi anak -anak mereka ketika membeli makanan apa pun," tambahnya.Sementara itu, kepala Divisi Kesehatan Kantor Kesehatan Bangkalan, Ciptaning Tekad, menambahkan bahwa setidaknya permen harus diamankan terlebih dahulu dan menunggu hasil penelitian dari Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat Surabaya (BBPOM)."Jika Anda melihat Kode ML, ini adalah barang impor. Jika Konferter MD adalah produk domestik. Tetapi semua penjelasannya dalam bahasa Indonesia. Apakah ini palsu atau tidak, kami sedang menunggu hasil pemeriksaan," jelasnya.

berita: If the iPhone 4s has a fatal problem in the form of a decrease in antenna function, then the latest iPhone series is threatened with problems in terms of design. One iPhone 6 Plus consumer reported that his favorite iPhone looks curved after some time of use. Almost a week after the first wave of iPhone 6 Plus entered the market and began to be used around the world, a technology news portal writer, Russel Holly admitted that his iPhone 6 Plus was caught curving at the front of the screen. The complaint from Holly was filed after several similar complaints appeared in a virtual world forum, Ars Technica (24/09). Based on the analysis results from Holly's report, it is very likely that his iPhone 6 Plus is curved due to pressure from the pocket and exposure to body heat that makes the smartphone body expand. The combination of these two factors is claimed to make it easier for the iPhone 6 Plus which does have wide and thin dimensions to curve. Several other reports state that their iPhone 6 Plus bends after being put in a back pocket and used for activities such as complaint sitting to dancing. Only a dozen hours later, the iPhone 6 Plus looks curved but can still be used smoothly. Apple itself has not issued their official confirmation regarding the potential for the iPhone 6 or iPhone 6 Plus to bend after a certain period of use. Not a few parties claim that it could be a design error that makes the iPhone 6 bent. The issue of the curved iPhone 6 Plus will give Apple a bad image if later this case becomes an 'epidemic' among its users. The company led by Tim Cook certainly doesn't want the case of mass damage to the iPhone 4s antenna to repeat itself in one of the best products made under the era of the new CEO of Apple.
berita_id: Jika iPhone 4S memiliki masalah fatal dalam bentuk penurunan fungsi antena, maka seri iPhone terbaru terancam dengan masalah dalam hal desain.Satu konsumen iPhone 6 Plus melaporkan bahwa iPhone favoritnya terlihat melengkung setelah beberapa saat digunakan.Hampir seminggu setelah gelombang pertama iPhone 6 Plus memasuki pasar dan mulai digunakan di seluruh dunia, seorang penulis portal berita teknologi, Russel Holly mengakui bahwa iPhone 6 Plus -nya tertangkap melengkung di bagian depan layar.Keluhan dari Holly diajukan setelah beberapa keluhan serupa muncul di forum dunia virtual, ARS Technica (24/09).Berdasarkan hasil analisis dari laporan Holly, sangat mungkin bahwa iPhone 6 Plus -nya melengkung karena tekanan dari saku dan paparan panas tubuh yang membuat tubuh smartphone mengembang.Kombinasi dari kedua faktor ini diklaim memudahkan iPhone 6 Plus yang memang memiliki dimensi lebar dan tipis untuk melengkung.Beberapa laporan lain menyatakan bahwa iPhone 6 mereka ditambah tikungan setelah dimasukkan ke dalam saku belakang dan digunakan untuk kegiatan seperti keluhan yang duduk untuk menari.Hanya selusin jam kemudian, iPhone 6 Plus terlihat melengkung tetapi masih dapat digunakan dengan lancar.Apple sendiri belum mengeluarkan konfirmasi resmi mereka mengenai potensi iPhone 6 atau iPhone 6 Plus untuk menekuk setelah periode penggunaan tertentu.Tidak sedikit pihak yang mengklaim bahwa itu bisa menjadi kesalahan desain yang membuat iPhone 6 ditekuk.Masalah iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung akan memberi Apple gambar yang buruk jika nanti kasus ini menjadi 'epidemi' di antara penggunanya.Perusahaan yang dipimpin oleh Tim Cook tentu tidak ingin kasus kerusakan massa pada antena iPhone 4S mengulangi sendiri di salah satu produk terbaik yang dibuat di bawah era CEO baru Apple.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani Indrawati explained this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java, Monday (12/3/2018). "It doesn't exist and has never been discussed," said Sri Mulyani to a number of media crews. When giving information regarding the meeting of President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) with the delegation of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB), the Minister of Finance received a question about it. And the Minister of Finance explained that currently, there are indeed a lot of circulating information and documents that are made as if they came from government institutions. "What the Menpan said (in social media) was a hoax, it was indeed like that. On social media today, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," said Sri Mulyani. Previously, it was widely circulated on social media regarding the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia. In the issue, it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp 553,422,694 per month. The vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp 368948462 per president month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani Indrawati menjelaskan hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor, Jawa Barat, Senin (12/3/2018)."Itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah dibahas," kata Sri Mulyani kepada sejumlah kru media.Ketika memberikan informasi mengenai pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Infrastruktur Asia (AIIB), Menteri Keuangan menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu.Dan Menteri Keuangan menjelaskan bahwa saat ini, memang ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah."Apa yang dikatakan Menpan (di media sosial) adalah tipuan, memang seperti itu. Di media sosial hari ini, ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan," kata Sri Mulyani.Sebelumnya, secara luas diedarkan di media sosial mengenai rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia.Dalam masalah ini, dinyatakan bahwa presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga Rp 553.422.694 per bulan.Wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji Rp 368948462 per bulan presiden.

berita: Jakarta - A number of members of the Ponorogo Reog Community (KRP) visited the Ministry of Foreign Affairs office to ask for clarification regarding the burning of reog in front of the Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao himself said that the burned reog had been damaged and eaten by termites. 15 KRP representatives gathered in front of the office of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemlu), Jl Pejambon, Central Jakarta, Monday (2/10/2015). They brought reog, a banner that reads 'Strict action on burning reyog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao Philippines' and an open letter to Foreign Minister Retno Marsudi. Their arrival was related to the burning of reog that occurred at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao on 20 October. They also attached a picture showing the burning of the reog. "We will not take action or demonstrations. We only want to ask for information and clarification from the Minister and firm action against the government regarding this incident," said Deputy Chairman of KRP S Nojeng to reporters. After waiting for some time, 5 KRP representatives were received by the Director of Development of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs at 10.20 WIB. For 30 minutes they held a meeting and as a result the Ministry of Foreign Affairs promised to seek information related to the incident and notify KRP again. Later it will be clarified there why there could be an incident like this and will be notified again," said Nojeng who participated in the meeting. By now the crowd had begun to disperse. There is no traffic jam as a result of this action. Explanation of the Consulate General in Davao Meanwhile, in a press release from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao which was published on its website, it was explained that on October 20, 2015 the Consulate General in Davao City was forced to destroy the Ponorogo reog which had been an asset of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City since 1988. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because the Ponorogo reog was already in a state of disrepair. damaged and eaten by termites. "The arson was in no way an attempt by the Consulate General fill in Davao City to damage or eliminate the reog of Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for the reog of Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Consulate General in Davao City would also like to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to exorcise idols or spirits," he wrote. "The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Reog Ponorogo," he continued.
berita_id: JAKARTA - Sejumlah anggota Komunitas Reog Ponorogo (KRP) mengunjungi Kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk meminta klarifikasi mengenai pembakaran Reog di depan Konsulat Jenderal di Davao, Filipina.Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao sendiri mengatakan bahwa Reog yang terbakar telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.15 Perwakilan KRP berkumpul di depan Kantor Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemlu), JL Pejambon, Jakarta Tengah, Senin (2/10/2015).Mereka membawa Reog, sebuah spanduk yang membaca 'tindakan ketat tentang membakar Reyog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao Filipina' dan surat terbuka kepada Menteri Luar Negeri Retno Marsudi.Kedatangan mereka terkait dengan pembakaran reog yang terjadi di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao pada 20 Oktober.Mereka juga memasang gambar yang menunjukkan pembakaran reog."Kami tidak akan mengambil tindakan atau demonstrasi. Kami hanya ingin meminta informasi dan klarifikasi dari menteri dan tindakan tegas terhadap pemerintah mengenai insiden ini," kata Wakil Ketua KRP S Nojeng kepada wartawan.Setelah menunggu beberapa waktu, 5 perwakilan KRP diterima oleh Direktur Pengembangan Kementerian Luar Negeri di 10.20 WIB.Selama 30 menit mereka mengadakan pertemuan dan sebagai hasilnya, Kementerian Luar Negeri berjanji untuk mencari informasi yang terkait dengan insiden tersebut dan memberi tahu KRP lagi.Kemudian akan diklarifikasi di sana mengapa mungkin ada insiden seperti ini dan akan diberitahu lagi, "kata Nojeng yang berpartisipasi dalam pertemuan itu. Sekarang orang banyak mulai bubar. Tidak ada kemacetan lalu lintas sebagai akibat dari tindakan ini. Penjelasan Konsulat Jenderal di Davao, dalam siaran pers dari 20 tahun itu, di Konsultasi, di Kota, di Kota, di Kota, di Kota, di Kota, di Kota, di Konsultan, di Kota, di Kota, di Kota, di Consulate, di Kota, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Consulate, di Kota.Dipaksa untuk menghancurkan Reog Ponorogo yang telah menjadi aset Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao sejak tahun 1988. Penghancuran dengan pembakaran harus dilakukan karena Ponorogo Reog sudah dalam keadaan kerusakan dan dimakan oleh Rayap.Penghancuran aset -aset ini telah dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan rasa hormat penuh terhadap Reog of Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya.Konsulat jenderal di Kota Davao juga ingin menekankan bahwa pembakaran sama sekali tidak ada hubungannya dengan upaya untuk mengusir idola atau roh, "tulisnya." Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao saat ini berkomunikasi dengan partai -partai di Indonesia untuk mencari pengganti baru untuk Reog Ponorogo, "lanjutnya.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax or false news. This certainty was revealed after Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java. It does not exist and has never been discussed, he said. When giving information about President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he received a question about it. The Minister of Finance explained that currently there are explain a lot of circulating information and documents that are made as if they came from government institutions. "It's a hoax. Nowadays, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said. Previously, it was widely circulated on social media regarding the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia. Residents will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. Meanwhile, the vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.

berita: It has been a long time since the issue of boar bristles has been used as a material for toothbrushes, but until now there are still many who do not know about it. Therefore, in this paper, this problem will be presented. The Rise of the Pig Hair Issue Around 2009 the issue had circulated but was dimmed because no facts were found. In 2012 the issue had resurfaced, but only in certain circles. we are shocked by the emergence of brushes or toothbrushes made from pig bristles. To the extent that the MUI issued a fatwa that it is forbidden to use a pig bristle brush. But recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has resurfaced. Information, especially for Muslims, to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use non-halal ingredients. Features of the Pig Bristle Toothbrush From the information provided by the manufacturer itself, it is stated that there are toothbrushes made from sea urchins. Indeed, toothbrushes like this are very rare in Indonesia. But abroad, there are quite a lot of boar-bristle toothbrushes, with quite expensive prices. It is said that the toothbrush that comes from pig bristles is actually softer. The way to distinguish sea urchins from synthetic/plastic materials is to burn them. If burned with fire smells like burning horns, then it comes from the hair or hair of an animal, usually a pig. While the plastic material does not produce odors. (HALAL Journal No. 62/X/2006) Get to know the product before buying Dear readers, you can check the toothbrush to be purchased, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains Pig Bristle. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), it usually says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Once again make sure the packaging if it's from bristles, then it's made from sea urchins. Feel free to prove that the bristles are burned, if it smells like burnt hair, it means it's from pig bristles. But if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. slam Forbids Its Use For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly Haram. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. The risks of using it for Muslims are Haram: Worship is rejected, Prayers are rejected, and Hell is more it deserving (hadith). Daily Activities Related to the Use of Brushes and Brushes In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, and spread food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various grilled or grilled meats and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at the salon or barbershop, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors. Did you know that the brushes & toothbrushes you are currently using come from? Most likely it is made from Sea urchin! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally come from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. There are other terms for Sea urchins, including: PIG, BOAR, HOG, BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH. Some Ways to Avoid Brushes or Toothbrushes Made from Pig Bristle: Use 100% natural brushes and brushes such as siwak root or synthetic materials, such as nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, with slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. Use an alternative to brushes. For example, paint rollers for painting, sponges & cotton buds for makeup, as well as knives & spatulas for greasing food. Be aware of the type of food whose cooking process and cleaning the tools using a pig brush. The characteristics of the Pig Bristle Brush, when burned, will cause a distinctive smell like burning meat. Usually Pig Bristle Brushes are sold in white and black. But it is possible for manufacturers to process the coloring by bleaching it, as if it were any other animal's fur. May be useful
berita_id: Sudah lama sejak masalah bulu babi telah digunakan sebagai bahan untuk sikat gigi, tetapi sampai sekarang masih ada banyak yang tidak mengetahuinya.Karena itu, dalam makalah ini, masalah ini akan disajikan.Munculnya masalah rambut babi sekitar tahun 2009 masalah ini telah beredar tetapi redup karena tidak ada fakta yang ditemukan.Pada 2012 masalah telah muncul kembali, tetapi hanya di kalangan tertentu.Kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Sejauh MUI mengeluarkan fatwa yang dilarang menggunakan sikat bulu babi.Namun baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul kembali.Informasi, terutama bagi umat Islam, untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan-bahan non-halal.Fitur sikat gigi bulu babi dari informasi yang disediakan oleh pabrikan itu sendiri, dinyatakan bahwa ada sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi.Memang, sikat gigi seperti ini sangat jarang di Indonesia.Tapi di luar negeri, ada cukup banyak sikat gigi berbulu babi, dengan harga yang cukup mahal.Dikatakan bahwa sikat gigi yang berasal dari bulu babi sebenarnya lebih lembut.Cara membedakan bulu babi dari bahan sintetis/plastik adalah dengan membakarnya.Jika dibakar dengan bau api seperti tanduk yang terbakar, maka itu berasal dari rambut atau rambut binatang, biasanya seekor babi.Sementara bahan plastik tidak menghasilkan bau.(Jurnal Halal No. 62/x/2006) Kenali produk sebelum membeli pembaca yang budiman, Anda dapat memeriksa sikat gigi yang akan dibeli, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya mengatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% China Bristle".Sekali lagi pastikan kemasannya jika itu dari bulu, maka itu terbuat dari bulu babi.Jangan ragu untuk membuktikan bahwa bulu dibakar, jika baunya seperti rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti itu dari bulu babi.Tetapi jika meleleh dan menjadi sulit, itu berarti terbuat dari plastik dan aman untuk digunakan.Slam melarang penggunaannya untuk umat Islam, penggunaan bulu babi jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.Risiko menggunakannya untuk umat Islam adalah haram: ibadah ditolak, doa ditolak, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis).Kegiatan harian yang terkait dengan penggunaan kuas dan kuas dalam kehidupan sehari -hari, kami menggunakan berbagai jenis sikat untuk menerapkan riasan, cat, debu bersih, cat rumah, wajan kue minyak, dan menyebarkan makanan.Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda bahwa sikat & sikat gigi yang Anda gunakan saat ini berasal?Kemungkinan besar itu terbuat dari landak laut!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Ada istilah lain untuk bulu babi laut, termasuk: babi, babi hutan, babi, sikat rambut bulu.Beberapa cara untuk menghindari sikat atau sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi: Gunakan sikat dan kuas alami 100% seperti akar siwak atau bahan sintetis, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.Gunakan alternatif untuk sikat.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, serta pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.Waspadai jenis makanan yang proses memasaknya dan membersihkan alat menggunakan sikat babi.Karakteristik sikat bulu babi, ketika dibakar, akan menyebabkan aroma khas seperti daging yang terbakar.Biasanya sikat bulu babi dijual putih dan hitam.Tetapi mungkin bagi produsen untuk memproses pewarnaan dengan memutihkannya, seolah -olah itu adalah bulu hewan lainnya.Mungkin berguna

berita: A riot occurred at the Brimob Mako Prison, Kelapa Dua, Depok, on Friday afternoon, November 10, 2017 News of the riot mako was heard outside the prison walls because it was recorded in a video that went viral on social media shortly after the riot took place. The detainees were reported to have been damaged by being broken into by angry detainees, and some of the glass and windows were also reported to have been damaged. The police denied reports that the riot was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the officers on duty at the detention center. four cellphones belonging to prisoners of terrorism cases Luckily the riot didn't last long The guard immediately coordinated with the Brimob Unit to defuse tensions It's conducive, the residents have calmed down, said Head of the National Police Headquarters, Kombes Martinus Sitompul via text message, Saturday, 11 November 2017 Here are the facts -collected facts by Criminology in the riot Occurred in the Block of Terrorist Detainees The riot that occurred at the Brimob Mako Rutan, Kelapa Dua, Depok on Friday afternoon, November 10, 2017 at around 1600 WIB, occurred in the terrorist detainee block. It started with an inspection carried out by the Rutan guards on goods and reading books in the detention cells occupied by prisoners of terrorist cases in block C. The protest because of the inspection then spread to block B. Ricuh Triggered by Mobile Phone Raids. It was rumored that the riot was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the prison guards during the conduct of the crime. However, this was denied by the police, the Head of the National Police Headquarters, Kombes Martinus Sitompul, said that it was not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard officer. find four mili cell phones The convicts of terrorism cases occupying block C, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam, and Jumali. The confiscation of cell phones was what Martinus said was the trigger for the riots. Prisoners' cells were destroyed. The anger of the detainees can be seen from breaking down cell doors, breaking glass and windows. Even a table tennis board has become the target of inmates' tantrums. In a video uploaded on social media that depicts the atmosphere in a detention cell during a riot, broken glass can be seen scattered and the cell door was broken down There was an ISIS flag rioting in the terrorist detention block at the Mako Brimob detention center. It was recorded in a video that went viral on social media. In addition to showing the situation in the detention cell when the rioting occurred, two black ISIS flags were attached to the wall. Viral detention cell on Social Media al The incident of the riot in the terrorist detention block of the Mako Brimob detention center was widely broadcast because it was recorded in a video that went viral on social media. Several accounts on social media such as Aswaja Garis Lurus, Lone Wolf, and Uky449MuslimCyber ​​uploaded the video. In less than 24 hours, The video has been watched by more than 10 thousand visitors and has been distributed more than 1000 times
berita_id: Kerusuhan terjadi di penjara Brimob Mako, Kelapa Dua, Depok, pada hari Jumat sore, 10 November 2017 Berita kerusuhan Mako terdengar di luar tembok penjara karena direkam dalam sebuah video yang menjadi viral di media sosial tak lama setelah kerusuhan itu terjadi.Para tahanan dilaporkan telah rusak karena dipecah oleh tahanan yang marah, dan beberapa kaca dan jendela juga dilaporkan telah rusak.Polisi membantah laporan bahwa kerusuhan itu dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas yang bertugas di pusat penahanan.Empat ponsel milik tahanan kasus terorisme yang untungnya kerusuhan itu tidak bertahan lama penjaga segera berkoordinasi dengan unit Brimob untuk meredakan ketegangan yang kondusif, penduduknya telah tenang, kata kepala markas polisi nasional, Kombes yang ditabrak oleh pidana di dalam pidana di dalam pujian di dalam panci, Sabtu, 11 November 2017 di sini adalah fakta -fakta yang dikumpulkan oleh fakta -fakta oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang ditoleksi oleh fakta -fakta yang ditoleksi oleh fakta -fakta yang dikmoni oleh fakta -fakta yang ditoleksi oleh fakta -fakta yang ditoleksi oleh fakta.Terjadi di Brimob Mako Rutan, Kelapa Dua, Depok pada Jumat sore, 10 November 2017 di sekitar 1600 WIB, terjadi di blok tahanan teroris.Itu dimulai dengan inspeksi yang dilakukan oleh penjaga Rutan tentang barang -barang dan membaca buku -buku di sel -sel penahanan yang ditempati oleh para tahanan kasus teroris di blok C. Protes karena inspeksi kemudian disebarkan untuk memblokir B. ricuh yang dipicu oleh penggerebekan ponsel.Dikabarkan bahwa kerusuhan itu dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga penjara selama melakukan kejahatan.Namun, ini ditolak oleh polisi, kepala markas polisi nasional, Kombes Martinus Sitompul, mengatakan bahwa itu tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh petugas penjaga.Temukan empat ponsel Mili, narapidana kasus terorisme yang menempati Blok C, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam, dan Jumali.Penyitaan ponsel adalah apa yang dikatakan Martinus adalah pemicu kerusuhan.Sel -sel tahanan dihancurkan.Kemarahan tahanan dapat dilihat dari memecah pintu sel, memecahkan kaca dan jendela.Bahkan papan tenis meja telah menjadi target amukan narapidana.Dalam sebuah video yang diunggah di media sosial yang menggambarkan atmosfer di sel penahanan selama kerusuhan, pecahan kaca dapat terlihat tersebar dan pintu sel dipecah ada kerusuhan bendera ISIS di blok penahanan teroris di pusat penahanan Mako Brimob.Itu direkam dalam video yang menjadi viral di media sosial.Selain menunjukkan situasi di sel penahanan ketika kerusuhan terjadi, dua bendera ISIS hitam melekat pada dinding.Sel penahanan viral di media sosial di dekatnya kerusuhan di blok penahanan teroris dari Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob secara luas disiarkan karena direkam dalam sebuah video yang menjadi viral di media sosial.Beberapa akun di media sosial seperti Aswaja Garis Lurus, Lone Wolf, dan UKY449MusLimCyber ​​mengunggah video.Dalam waktu kurang dari 24 jam, video telah ditonton oleh lebih dari 10 ribu pengunjung dan telah didistribusikan lebih dari 1000 kali

berita: Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia Davao City, Philippines, was forced to destroy Reog Ponorogo which had been an asset since 1988 on October 20, 2015. Extermination by burning had to be done because Ponorogo reog had already been destroyed damaged and eaten by termites. In a release received by Metrotvnews.com, Saturday (31/10/2015), arson is in no way an ethnical attempt by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City to destroy or eliminate reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. Destruction is carried out with care and respect as a cultural asset. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with the parties in Indonesia to try to find a new replacement Ponorogo reog.
berita_id: Konsulat Jenderal Republik Kota Indonesia Davao, Filipina, terpaksa menghancurkan Reog Ponorogo yang telah menjadi aset sejak 1988 pada 20 Oktober 2015. Pemusnahan oleh pembakaran harus dilakukan karena Ponorogo Reog telah dihancurkan rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Dalam rilis yang diterima oleh Metrotvnews.com, Sabtu (31/10/2015), pembakaran sama sekali bukan upaya etnis oleh konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao untuk menghancurkan atau menghilangkan reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya.Penghancuran dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan hormat sebagai aset budaya.Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao saat ini sedang berkomunikasi dengan para pihak di Indonesia untuk mencoba menemukan pengganti baru Ponorogo Reog.

berita: The news that Facebook will be blocked in Indonesia on April 24, suddenly became widely shared on social media. This information, which has gone viral and circulated widely on social media, especially Facebook, is definitely not true, aka a hoax. The government can indeed take firm action to block Facebook because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Cambridge Analytica (CA) scandal. However, there is no certainty that on April 24, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia. As reported by Kompas.com, the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never said he would block Facebook. Instead, Rudiantara said the Ministry of Communications and Informatics did not hesitate to block Facebook, but it must follow procedures so that the steps are not rash. Rudiantara's only firm statement regarding the blocking of Facebook is, if there is evidence that Facebook is used as a means of inciting. The Minister of Communication and Informatics also ensures that if investigators find elements of criminal suspicion in the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia, the chances of Facebook blocking are even greater. At the moment, these two things cannot be proven, they are still under investigation and awaiting the results of the audit. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is used for incitement, as happened in Myanmar, I have no qualms about blocking it," said Rudiantara, Wednesday (11/4/2018), at the Kominfo Building, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta. Furthermore, since a week after the announcement that Facebook user data in Indonesia had been leaked in the CA scandal, Rudiantara had asked Facebook to conduct an audit, and submitted the results of the audit to Kominfo. The request was included in the first warning letter sent by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics. However, after the specified deadline arrived, Facebook help has not yet submitted the results of the audit. Kominfo also issued a second warning letter. “Currently, it is SP II. We wait, later after SP II it can be upgraded to a temporary service termination if needed," said Rudiantara last week (11/4/2018). If the audit results are known later, the government can assess the potential problems that could arise from this data leak and take steps to address them. In addition, the Deputy Chairman of Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives, Satya Widya Yudha in a hearing with Facebook today, Tuesday (17/4/2018), said that blocking Facebook is not a solution, considering that Facebook actually has many benefits. According to Satya, if Facebook does not have good intentions, then blocking can be considered. "Before going there (blocking), it must be understood first. Because Facebook is also useful for communication today," he said. The Cambridge Analytica scandal incident attracted global attention. This analyst firm itself is a political consultant who helped Donald Trump's winning campaign in the 2016 US Presidential Election. CA has stolen 87 million global Facebook user data. Indonesia occupies the third position as the country with the most user data victims

Karena Facebook juga berguna untuk komunikasi hari ini," katanya.Insiden skandal Cambridge Analytica menarik perhatian global.Perusahaan analis ini sendiri adalah konsultan politik yang membantu kampanye kemenangan Donald Trump dalam pemilihan presiden AS 2016.CA telah mencuri 87 juta data pengguna Global Facebook.Indonesia menempati posisi ketiga sebagai negara dengan korban data pengguna terbanyak

berita: The iPhone 6 Plus turns out to be easy to bend, this is experienced by some users who only realize that they have been in their pockets for too long. Regarding the occurrence of this case, Apple as the manufacturer's vendor was considered careless in choosing a mixture of metal-aluminum alloy materials that were not too solid to be used as the basic material for the iPhone 6 Plus frame. The easy-to-curve case of the iPhone 6 Plus is still being talked about, considering that this Apple-made software was only released to the market last Friday (19/9/2014). Of course, this is reminiscent of the case of the iPhone 4, which was released in 2010. At that time, the tech-savvy public called it the "antennagate" scandal because in the iPhone 4 design an error occurred in the antenna section, which caused frequent disconnections when in use on a call. Responding to the excitement of the iPhone 6 Plus case, which bends easily when placed in a pocket. Apple has not made an official statement yet. However, they announced they were investigating reports of problems found in the iOS 8 operating system (OS). In fact, Apple pulled the OS version 8.0.1. Of course, this case will be made by rival vendors as a means of attack. The latest Blackberry on the sidelines of the announcement of the launch of the BlackBerry Passport also satirized this case. This was revealed caseful by BlackBerry CEO John Chen who also attacked the weaknesses of the iPhone 6 plus. "No matter how hard you try, you won't be able to bend the BlackBerry Passport," Chen said
berita_id: IPhone 6 Plus ternyata mudah ditekuk, ini dialami oleh beberapa pengguna yang hanya menyadari bahwa mereka telah berada di saku mereka terlalu lama.Mengenai terjadinya kasus ini, Apple sebagai vendor pabrikan dianggap ceroboh dalam memilih campuran bahan paduan logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat untuk digunakan sebagai bahan dasar untuk bingkai iPhone 6 Plus.Kasus iPhone 6 Plus yang mudah dikurung masih sedang dibicarakan, mengingat perangkat lunak buatan Apple ini hanya dirilis ke pasar Jumat lalu (19/9/2014).Tentu saja, ini mengingatkan pada kasus iPhone 4, yang dirilis pada 2010. Pada waktu itu, publik yang paham teknologi menyebutnya skandal "antenagat" karena dalam desain iPhone 4 terjadi kesalahan di bagian antena, yang sering menyebabkan pemutusan ketika digunakan pada panggilan.Menanggapi kegembiraan case iPhone 6 Plus, yang menekuk dengan mudah saat ditempatkan di saku.Apple belum membuat pernyataan resmi.Namun, mereka mengumumkan bahwa mereka sedang menyelidiki laporan masalah yang ditemukan dalam Sistem Operasi IOS 8 (OS).Faktanya, Apple menarik OS versi 8.0.1.Tentu saja, kasus ini akan dibuat oleh vendor saingan sebagai sarana serangan.Blackberry terbaru di sela -sela pengumuman peluncuran Blackberry Passport juga menyindir kasus ini.Ini terungkap berkasel oleh CEO Blackberry John Chen yang juga menyerang kelemahan iPhone 6 Plus."Tidak peduli seberapa keras Anda mencoba, Anda tidak akan bisa menekuk paspor blackberry," kata Chen

berita: Many people still believe in the efficacy of various alternative treatments in recovering stroke. As is known, stroke is a condition in which the blood vessels narrow and are characterized by the malfunction of one side of the body. Well, usually, after a stroke, people undergo the method of needling (acupuncture) or reflexology to restore the function of body parts. Then, can this alternative method method acting be a stroke healing solution? Doctor Maizul Anwar, SpBTKV as Chairman of Siloam Hospital Kebon Jeruk said that acupuncture only helps restore the body's motor functions that have been disrupted due to stroke. The damage is in the brain, so you can't cure a stroke. Such methods are only as physiotherapy only. Usually also not 100 percent recovered motor as usual, he said, Tuesday (17/1/2016). Stroke, he said, consists of two types, namely ischemic stroke caused by blockage of blood vessels, and the second is hemorrhagic stroke, which occurs when a blood vessel bursts. Ischemic stroke does not cause permanent nerve damage, such as slurred speech, slanted mouth, but can return to normal. But parts of the brain that have been damaged cannot be 100 percent good again, he added. The cause of stroke, according to Dr. Maizul is aging blood vessels. This condition can appear early if the walls of the blood vessels thicken due to a buildup of bad cholesterol or can also be triggered by high blood pressure and a history of heart disease.
berita_id: Banyak orang masih percaya pada kemanjuran berbagai perawatan alternatif dalam pemulihan stroke.Seperti diketahui, stroke adalah suatu kondisi di mana pembuluh darah sempit dan ditandai dengan kerusakan satu sisi tubuh.Nah, biasanya, setelah stroke, orang menjalani metode tusuk jarum (akupunktur) atau refleksiologi untuk mengembalikan fungsi bagian tubuh.Lalu, dapatkah metode metode alternatif ini bertindak menjadi solusi penyembuhan stroke?Dokter Maizul Anwar, SPBTKV sebagai Ketua Rumah Sakit Siloam Kebon Jeruk mengatakan bahwa akupunktur hanya membantu mengembalikan fungsi motorik tubuh yang telah terganggu karena stroke.Kerusakan ada di otak, jadi Anda tidak bisa menyembuhkan stroke.Metode seperti itu hanya sebagai fisioterapi saja.Biasanya juga tidak 100 persen memulihkan motor seperti biasa, katanya, Selasa (17/1/2016).Stroke, katanya, terdiri dari dua jenis, yaitu stroke iskemik yang disebabkan oleh penyumbatan pembuluh darah, dan yang kedua adalah stroke hemoragik, yang terjadi ketika pembuluh darah meledak.Stroke iskemik tidak menyebabkan kerusakan saraf permanen, seperti ucapan yang tidak jelas, mulut miring, tetapi dapat kembali normal.Tetapi bagian otak yang telah rusak tidak bisa 100 persen bagus lagi, tambahnya.Penyebab stroke, menurut Dr. Maizul adalah pembuluh darah yang menua.Kondisi ini dapat muncul lebih awal jika dinding pembuluh darah menebal karena penumpukan kolesterol buruk atau juga dapat dipicu oleh tekanan darah tinggi dan riwayat penyakit jantung.

berita: Apple previously stated that curved iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus are extremely rare and only 9 users have experienced it. Apple's statement also received support from Consumer Reports which said that the issue of the curved iPhone was excessive. To prove that the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus don't bend easily, Consumer Reports conducted a test using a special compression engine called Instron. The results obtained show that the iPhone 6 and iPhone Plus are once again not easily bent. In the video, Consumer Reports not only tests both iPhone 6 models, but also uses the iPhone 5s and Android smartphones, such as the Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, and HTC One M8 for comparison. The test showed the HTC One M8 to be the most vulnerable and in last consumer place and the Galaxy Note 3 the most powerful with a pressure of 150 pounds (68.04kg). In fifth place is the iPhone 6. With the same weight pressure as the HTC One M8, the iPhone 6 can bend under 70 pounds (31.75kg). But the new iPhone 6 case can separate under the pressure of 100 pounds (45.36kg). While the iPhone 6 Plus is fourth, Apple's phablet can bend at 90 pounds (40.82kg) and the case can't withstand 110 pounds (49.90kg). It seems that the issue of curved iPhone is not a problem anymore. Consumer Reports concluded that the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus and other smartphones can be used for everyday use. So, are you sure about this result? You now don't have to worry anymore or fail to buy an iPhone 6 or iPhone Plus. Apple has even carried out a series of rigorous tests to ensure the latest iPhone is strong enough for normal use.
berita_id: Apple sebelumnya menyatakan bahwa iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung sangat jarang dan hanya 9 pengguna yang mengalaminya.Pernyataan Apple juga menerima dukungan dari laporan konsumen yang mengatakan bahwa masalah iPhone melengkung berlebihan.Untuk membuktikan bahwa iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus jangan menekuk dengan mudah, Consumer Reports melakukan tes menggunakan mesin kompresi khusus yang disebut Instron.Hasil yang diperoleh menunjukkan bahwa iPhone 6 dan iPhone Plus sekali lagi tidak mudah ditekuk.Dalam video tersebut, konsumen melaporkan tidak hanya menguji kedua model iPhone 6, tetapi juga menggunakan smartphone iPhone 5S dan Android, seperti Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, dan HTC One M8 untuk perbandingan.Tes menunjukkan HTC One M8 menjadi yang paling rentan dan di tempat konsumen terakhir dan Galaxy Note 3 yang paling kuat dengan tekanan 150 pound (68,04kg).Di tempat kelima adalah iPhone 6. Dengan tekanan berat yang sama dengan HTC One M8, iPhone 6 dapat menekuk di bawah 70 pound (31,75kg).Tetapi case iPhone 6 baru dapat terpisah di bawah tekanan 100 pound (45,36kg).Sementara iPhone 6 Plus berada di urutan keempat, phablet Apple dapat menekuk pada 90 pound (40,82kg) dan kasingnya tidak dapat menahan 110 pound (49,90kg).Tampaknya masalah iphone melengkung tidak menjadi masalah lagi.Consumer Reports menyimpulkan bahwa iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus dan smartphone lainnya dapat digunakan untuk penggunaan sehari -hari.Jadi, apakah Anda yakin tentang hasil ini?Anda sekarang tidak perlu khawatir lagi atau gagal membeli iPhone 6 atau iPhone Plus.Apple bahkan telah melakukan serangkaian tes ketat untuk memastikan iPhone terbaru cukup kuat untuk penggunaan normal.

berita: Currently, there is news about candy in the form of a pacifier circulating in Surabaya, East Java, which is suspected to contain drugs or other hazardous materials. The candy, which is known to be imported from a certain country, has gone viral on social media because it is accused of containing drugs. The National Narcotics Agency (BNN) as the focal point for drug problems in Indonesia, said that until now the East Java Provincial BNN and the Surabaya City BNN are bringing samples of the candy for scientific examination by the National Narcotics Laboratory of the National Narcotics Agency regarding the content of the candy. BNN urges the public to be patient while waiting for the results of the examination. It is hoped that parents and children will remain AWARE of all forms and types of drugs by not consuming food, agency drink, or drugs that do not have a distribution permit.
berita_id: Saat ini, ada berita tentang permen dalam bentuk dot yang beredar di Surabaya, Jawa Timur, yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan atau bahan berbahaya lainnya.Permen, yang diketahui diimpor dari negara tertentu, telah menjadi viral di media sosial karena dituduh mengandung obat -obatan.Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) sebagai titik fokus untuk masalah narkoba di Indonesia, mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang BNN Provinsi Jawa Timur dan Kota Surabaya BNN membawa sampel permen untuk pemeriksaan ilmiah oleh Laboratorium Narkotika Nasional Badan Narkotika Nasional mengenai isi Candy.BNN mendesak masyarakat untuk bersabar sambil menunggu hasil pemeriksaan.Diharapkan bahwa orang tua dan anak -anak akan tetap menyadari semua bentuk dan jenis obat dengan tidak mengonsumsi makanan, minuman agensi, atau obat -obatan yang tidak memiliki izin distribusi.
