berita: Indeed, the Consultants General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao, the Philippines are confused. They had the heart to suddenly burn the Reog Ponorogo peacock and its accompanying gamelan because it was considered an object containing idols. The actions of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia have clearly destroyed the noble cultural heritage of our ancestors and do not know about the history of Reog Ponorogo which has become worldwide and has become a cultural asset of the Indonesian nation at UNESCO. As reported by the news site Bitungnews.com Thursday (29/10/2015), a number of elements of the Indonesian Consulate General were seen burning the Barong Reog Ponorogo and the accompanying gamelan. From information compiled by bitungnews.com, the burning was carried out on Tuesday, October 20, 2015. Even though the cultural object is the pride of the people of Ponorogo. The reason for the burning of Barong Reog Ponorogo, and the dragon decoration on the gamelan, is because there is a demon and it is an idol. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. In fact, reportedly, Acting Consulate General Davao actually called a security guard named Santander to pour gas over the reog and 2 gamelan dragons, the security guard was so surprised and surprised he said in the Bisaya Tagalog language: "Hadluk kaayu ko, dear kaayu ang dragon gwapo kaayu unya sunugon, kasayang sa reog pero gisugo man ko (I'm so scared, it's a shame that the dragon snake is so good it wants to be burned, the reog is too bad but how else can I be told)," said Santander. "When the Barong Reog and dragon gamelan decorations were burned, which are the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum, none of the other Indonesian Consulate General staff knew about it," said a source as quoted by bitungnews.com. "After this incident, the perpetrators were blasphemed by most of the Indonesian citizens in Davao, but the perpetrators still feel innocent because they think what they are doing is right in the eyes of God," added the source. An Indonesian citizen residing in Davao, stated that the Acting Consulate General in Davao was declared persona non grata, and asked the Indonesian government to withdraw the persons involved in the act of burning the nation's cultural heritage. Cultural activist and historical object Yul Adriansyah condemned the burning of reog carried out by a number of elements of the Indonesian Consulate General. "It's really sad, Reog Ponorogo's property was burned because it was considered an idol," said Yul in a questioning tone. According to Yul, the actions taken by the Indonesian Consulate General have gone too far and do not respect Indonesian culture, which should be respected and promoted in other countries. "It's not even burned, I'm sad to hear that, and this is a shame for the honor of the Indonesian people who uphold the noble culture of our nation," said the man who is also a journalist. Regarding the news of the sudden burning of Reog Ponorogo, the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, clarified the issue. They admitted that they did burn the Reog Ponorogo but the reason was not related to the expulsion of idols or spirits. The objection was conveyed through a press release on its website which was updated this afternoon, Saturday, October 31, 2015. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City admitted that they had burned full phase of the moon Reog Ponorogo on October 20, 2015. The Reog Ponorogo is an asset they have had since 1988. So what was the real reason they destroyed cultural objects by burning them? "The destruction by burning had to be carried out because the Ponorogo reog was already in a damaged condition and was eaten by termites," wrote the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The Consulate General affirmed that the burning was not at all an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao City to damage or eliminate Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Consulate General in Davao City also wants to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to expel idols or spirits. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Reog Ponorogo. Previously, the Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Retno LP Marsudi, said that the news of a Reog Ponorogo being deliberately burned at the office of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao, Philippines, was not entirely true. "Reog and gamelan decorations in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were damaged and infested with termites," said Retno via text message. For information, several media had published news stating that officials at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao allowed these individuals to burn the cultural products of the Indonesian people because they were considered to be worshiping idols.

There was a commotion at the terrorist detention house at the Police Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Friday (10/11/2017) evening. The commotion began when Detachment 88 officers conducted fri a sweep of the prisoners' cells and confiscated a number of cell phones. "Detachment officers carried out a search and found four cellphones belonging to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali," said Head of the Public Information Bureau of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Brigadier General Pol Rikwanto in a written statement, Friday night. The confiscation of the cell phone made one of the inmates disapprove and provoked a commotion. He provoked the officers by issuing provocative remarks. The action succeeded in provoking the reactions of officers and detainees in other blocks. Riots are inevitable. Resistance was carried out by the prisoners against the officers, resulting in damage to the prison facilities, such as the door of the prison cell being broken and the glass breaking. The picket members fired shots upwards as a warning. "Until now the atmosphere has been eased by the Densus picket. After that, the members are on standby at the picket while waiting for developments," said Rikwanto. However, there are still prisoners who make provocations. Furthermore, the detention center coordinated with the Brimob Police to back up security at the Mako Brimob detention center.
berita_id: Ada keributan di Gedung Penahanan Teroris di Markas Besar Brigade Polisi, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jumat (10/11/2017) malam.Keributan dimulai ketika Petugas Detasemen 88 melakukan Jum menyapu sel -sel tahanan dan menyita sejumlah ponsel."Petugas detasemen melakukan pencarian dan menemukan empat ponsel milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali," kata Kepala Biro Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Publik Brigadir Polisi Nasional Pol Rikwanto dalam pernyataan tertulis, Jumat malam.Penyitaan ponsel membuat salah satu narapidana tidak setuju dan memicu keributan.Dia memprovokasi para petugas dengan menerbitkan komentar provokatif.Tindakan itu berhasil memprovokasi reaksi petugas dan tahanan di blok lain.Kerusuhan tidak bisa dihindari.Perlawanan dilakukan oleh para tahanan terhadap para petugas, yang mengakibatkan kerusakan pada fasilitas penjara, seperti pintu sel penjara yang pecah dan kaca pecah.Anggota piket menembakkan tembakan ke atas sebagai peringatan."Sampai sekarang suasananya telah diredakan oleh piket Densus. Setelah itu, para anggota siaga di piket sambil menunggu perkembangan," kata Rikwanto.Namun, masih ada tahanan yang membuat provokasi.Selain itu, Pusat Penahanan berkoordinasi dengan polisi Brimob untuk mendukung keamanan di Pusat Penahanan Mako Brimob.

berita: Who doesn't know catfish, this fish is a favorite for many people because it has a delicious taste and has a soft meat texture, but it turns out that catfish is the dirtiest fish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells. Is that true? Catfish The Dirtiest Fish, One Mouth contains Three Thousand Cancer Cells, Here's the Explanation Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu easy is always available because the price is quite cheap and delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is an explanation: The catfish pond is very dirty and is surrounded by chicken coops and pigs. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who admitted that he had supplied a lot of catfish to markets and restaurants on the side of the road in Hainan province, precisely in Haikou, which he harvested 3 once a month. Due to the many complaints from the community, journalists searched about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, even this fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. That's some information about catfish in China, but in Indonesia this fish has been cultivated well by catfish farmers and they use pellets as food instead of using waste which is very dangerous for the health of the human body. So that consuming catfish in Indonesia there is no need to doubt its cleanliness, but as wise consumers we must remain vigilant about the content of this fish and do not need to consume it in large quantities on a regular basis because it can interfere with our health.
berita_id: Siapa yang tidak tahu ikan lele, ikan ini adalah favorit bagi banyak orang karena memiliki rasa yang lezat dan memiliki tekstur daging yang lembut, tetapi ternyata ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor, satu suapan berisi tiga ribu sel kanker.Apakah itu benar?Catfish ikan paling kotor, satu mulut berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, inilah penjelasannya Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit dan bahkan di setiap kios makanan menu ini dengan mudah selalu tersedia karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat dapat menjadi daya tarik utama untuk ikan yang satu ini.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Kenapa begitu?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi.Menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-Hong, yang mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar dan restoran di sisi jalan di provinsi Helah, tepatnya di haikou, yang ia panen 3 sebulan sekali.Karena banyak keluhan dari masyarakat, jurnalis mencari tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor karena ikan ini mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi di Indonesia ikan ini telah dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani lele dan mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan alih -alih menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh manusia.Sehingga mengkonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia tidak perlu meragukan kebersihannya, tetapi sebagai konsumen yang bijak kita harus tetap waspada tentang kandungan ikan ini dan tidak perlu mengkonsumsinya secara teratur secara teratur karena dapat mengganggu kesehatan kita.

berita: One million Facebook accounts in Indonesia were reportedly leaked, angering the Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara. According to Rudiantara, the government is ready to turn off Facebook access in Indonesia if needed. The one million data on Facebook users in Indonesia was used by Cambridge Analytica. In addition to the leak of Facebook accounts, it had also exacerbated the massacre of the Rohingya in Myanmar. "I made a statement that if I had to shutdown, I would shutdown. So the government has no doubts about it if the facts are sufficient," said Rudiantara at the Presidential Palace Complex, Jakarta, Thursday, April 5 2018. Rudiantara added, in an interview. With international media, Facebook's role in Myanmar has take been recognized by its leader, Mark Zuckerberg. Facebook is used as a medium for spreading hate speech against the ethnic groups who were forced to flee to Bangladesh. Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communication and Information held a meeting this afternoon with representatives of Facebook in Indonesia. The government will ask for direct clarification regarding the truth about the data leak, as well as the use of Facebook for bad things.
berita_id: Satu juta akun Facebook di Indonesia dilaporkan bocor, membuat marah Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara.Menurut Rudiantara, pemerintah siap untuk mematikan akses Facebook di Indonesia jika diperlukan.Data satu juta pada pengguna Facebook di Indonesia digunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica.Selain kebocoran akun Facebook, itu juga telah memperburuk pembantaian Rohingya di Myanmar."Saya membuat pernyataan bahwa jika saya harus menutup, saya akan menutup. Jadi pemerintah tidak memiliki keraguan tentang hal itu jika faktanya cukup," kata Rudiiantara di kompleks Istana Presiden, Jakarta, Kamis, 5 April 2018. Rudiantara menambahkan, dalam sebuah wawancara.Dengan media internasional, peran Facebook di Myanmar telah diakui oleh pemimpinnya, Mark Zuckerberg.Facebook digunakan sebagai media untuk menyebarkan pidato kebencian terhadap kelompok etnis yang terpaksa melarikan diri ke Bangladesh.Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi mengadakan pertemuan sore ini dengan perwakilan Facebook di Indonesia.Pemerintah akan meminta klarifikasi langsung mengenai kebenaran tentang kebocoran data, serta penggunaan Facebook untuk hal -hal buruk.

berita: The Surabaya City government continues to carry out dot candy raids that indicate drugs. There are three sub-district points that are mobilized by the Surabaya City Satpol PP marketer to raid the green colored candy. They are Genteng District, Rungkut District and Sawahan District. The Head of Sawahan District of Surabaya City, Yunus said that raids had been carried out at three school points. "We raided SDN Pakis I, II, and IX on Jalan Pakistirtosari. The result was 20 teats," said Yunus. The candy pacifiers are suspected to contain drugs. Physically, the candy does not look like drugs but looks like ordinary candy. "Those who sell it at street vendors around the school are immediately secured. We secure them and take them to the sub-district office," said Yunus. Not only pacifiers, but in the food and beverage raids at a number of elementary schools in Sawahan, a number of hard candies were also found, namely candy containing formaldehyde which is dangerous if consumed by children. "For hard candy, there are 33 seeds and 17 packs of hard candy in tablet form. We also secure that," said Yunus
berita_id: Pemerintah Kota Surabaya terus melakukan serangan permen dot yang menunjukkan obat -obatan.Ada tiga poin sub-distrik yang dimobilisasi oleh pemasar Surabaya City Satpol PP untuk menyerang permen berwarna hijau.Mereka adalah Distrik Genteng, Distrik Rungkut dan Distrik Sawahan.Kepala distrik Sawahan di Kota Surabaya, Yunus mengatakan bahwa serangan telah dilakukan di tiga titik sekolah."Kami menggerebek Sdn Pakis I, II, dan IX di Jalan Pakistirtosari. Hasilnya adalah 20 dadah," kata Yunus.Permen dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Secara fisik, permen itu tidak terlihat seperti obat -obatan tetapi terlihat seperti permen biasa."Mereka yang menjualnya di pedagang kaki lima di sekitar sekolah segera diamankan. Kami mengamankannya dan membawanya ke kantor sub-distrik," kata Yunus.Tidak hanya dot, tetapi dalam serangan makanan dan minuman di sejumlah sekolah dasar di Sawahan, sejumlah permen keras juga ditemukan, yaitu permen yang mengandung formaldehida yang berbahaya jika dikonsumsi oleh anak -anak."Untuk permen keras, ada 33 biji dan 17 bungkus permen keras dalam bentuk tablet. Kami juga mengamankannya," kata Yunus

berita: The Kanisius College Alumni Association (PAKKJ) issued an official statement regarding the comments made by one of its alumni during the 90th Anniversary of Canisius College on November 11, 2017. "We respect freedom of expression. However, we regret that the statement was made at an inappropriate moment," said PAKKJ Chairperson Sharief Natanegara in Jakarta, Tuesday (11/14/2017). He explained that the presence of Governor Anies Baswedan in the event actually got the attention of the alumni and there were no group walk outs as reported on social media. The Canisius For Indonesia Festival is the culmination of a series of 90th Anniversary of Canisius College. The celebration which consists of three main parts, namely the nation's children's party, Prayer for the Nation, and the Canisius Symphony for Indonesia is a form of gratitude and an expression of commitment from all Kanisians, Alumni, Fathers, and Educators to spread the hope of building the nation amidst the diversity in society. the framework of the Unitary State of the Republic of Indonesia which is based on Pancasila. Kanisius College has been established and has become a part of the history of Indonesia for 90 years and has produced thousands of alumni with the spirit of "Man for request Others" who have dedicated their work to the beloved Indonesian nation. For this reason, Sharief requested that all parties not be provoked by things circulating on social media. One of the long traditions at Kanisius always prioritizes and respects everyone who is present in every activity carried out. "This has become part of the Kanisian values ​​that have been instilled since being a student at Kanisius College," concluded Sharief.
berita_id: Asosiasi Alumni Kanisius College (PakKJ) mengeluarkan pernyataan resmi mengenai komentar yang dibuat oleh salah satu alumninya selama peringatan 90 tahun Canisius College pada 11 November 2017. "Kami menghormati kebebasan berekspresi. Namun, kami menyesal bahwa pernyataan itu dibuat pada saat yang tidak pantas," kata Ketua Pakkj N Natanegara.Dia menjelaskan bahwa kehadiran Gubernur Anies Baswedan dalam acara tersebut benar -benar mendapat perhatian para alumni dan tidak ada jalan keluar kelompok seperti yang dilaporkan di media sosial.Festival Canisius untuk Indonesia adalah puncak dari serangkaian peringatan 90 tahun Canisius College.Perayaan yang terdiri dari tiga bagian utama, yaitu partai anak -anak bangsa, doa untuk bangsa, dan simfoni Canisius untuk Indonesia adalah bentuk rasa terima kasih dan ekspresi komitmen dari semua warga Kanada, alumni, ayah, dan pendidik untuk menyebarkan harapan untuk membangun bangsa di tengah keanekaragaman dalam masyarakat.Kerangka kerja kesatuan Republik Indonesia yang didasarkan pada Pancasila.Kanisius College telah didirikan dan telah menjadi bagian dari sejarah Indonesia selama 90 tahun dan telah menghasilkan ribuan alumni dengan semangat "manusia untuk meminta orang lain" yang telah mendedikasikan pekerjaan mereka untuk negara Indonesia yang dicintai.Untuk alasan ini, Sharief meminta agar semua pihak tidak diprovokasi oleh hal -hal yang beredar di media sosial.Salah satu tradisi panjang di Kanisius selalu memprioritaskan dan menghormati setiap orang yang hadir dalam setiap kegiatan yang dilakukan."Ini telah menjadi bagian dari nilai -nilai Kanisia yang telah ditanamkan sejak menjadi mahasiswa di Kanisius College," pungkas Sharief.

berita: A group of reog artists in Magelang City along with art activists strongly condemned the burning of reog at the Indonesian Consulate General (KJRI) in Davao, Philippines, some time ago. They regretted the action which was considered to have damaged state assets and slashed the nation's conscience. As a form of protest, they held an action in the Magelang City Square area, Wednesday (11/11). On the stage that reads Magelang, they gather together, pray together, and three of them perform to voice their protest by means of dancing, poetry, and songs. Eka Pradaning, one of the participants in the action fervidness performed a solemn dance. While carrying two torches he danced in front of the head of reog and reog artists. From his mouth came literary verses entitled "Fitnah Termites and Idols" accompanied by two other dancers. And fire has ignited everything/And fire has burned the national identity or Fire has burned a pair of dragons/Fire has burned a peacock and a lion's head/And fire has burned souls to manifest their ignorance or In the name of termites and idols who are alibis of ignorance and his filth "I deliberately made the poem and read it in this action as a protest to those who had burned the reog. With the alibis of termites and idols, they scorched the nation's heritage and that was an unforgivable act," said Eka after the action. In a similar vein, Wahyu Puji Santoso, an elder of the Manunggal Budoyo reog art group from the South Rejowinangun Village, Magelang City, said that the burning of reog is completely unacceptable. For whatever reason, the combustion is not feasible, moreover the condition of the reog still looks very good. "I see 80 percent of them are still in good condition. They were burned once. If they don't want to take care of them, we are ready to accept them and will take good care of them," said the father, who has 20 years of reog art. Meanwhile, the Action Coordinator, Agung Begawan Prabu, emphasized that the act of burning reog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, was a pure crime. This is because the extermination was not carried out through a clear and official procedure according to existing regulations. "One of the procedures is that there must be coordination and analysis first. Here the procedure is not followed and the burned reog is an asset of the state, arts and culture of the nation. We demand that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs investigate this case and the perpetrators of the arson can be punished," he explained.
berita_id: Sekelompok seniman reog di Kota Magelang bersama dengan aktivis seni sangat mengutuk pembakaran reog di Indonesian Consulate General (KJRI) di Davao, Filipina, beberapa waktu lalu.Mereka menyesali tindakan yang dianggap telah merusak aset negara dan memangkas hati nurani bangsa.Sebagai bentuk protes, mereka mengadakan tindakan di daerah Magelang City Square, Rabu (11/11).Di atas panggung yang membaca Magelang, mereka berkumpul bersama, berdoa bersama, dan tiga dari mereka tampil untuk menyuarakan protes mereka dengan cara menari, puisi, dan lagu.Eka Pradaning, salah satu peserta dalam aksi kelayakan melakukan tarian khidmat.Sambil membawa dua obor, ia menari di depan kepala seniman reog dan reog.Dari mulutnya datang ayat -ayat sastra berjudul "Fitnah Raynah and Idols" disertai oleh dua penari lainnya.Dan api telah memicu segalanya/dan api telah membakar identitas atau kebakaran nasional telah membakar sepasang naga/api telah membakar seekor merak dan kepala singa/dan api telah membakar jiwa -jiwa untuk mewujudkan ketidaktahuan mereka atau atas nama rayap dan idola yang ada dalam tindakan ini dan orang -orang yang telah dibakar dengan orang -orang yang telah membuat orang -orang yang telah membuat orang -orang yang telah menjadi pois dan membacanya sebagai orang yang memiliki poem dan membacanya dalam hal -hal yang telah dibakar oleh orang -orang itu dan membacanya dalam hal -hal yang telah dibakar oleh orang -orang itu dan membacanya dalam poemen dan membacanya dalam hal ini.Idol, mereka membakar warisan bangsa dan itu adalah tindakan yang tidak termaafkan, "kata Eka setelah aksi.Dalam nada yang sama, Wahyu Puji Santoso, seorang penatua kelompok seni reog Budoyo dari desa Rejowinangun Selatan, Kota Magelang, mengatakan bahwa pembakaran reog sama sekali tidak dapat diterima.Untuk alasan apa pun, pembakaran tidak layak, apalagi kondisi reog masih terlihat sangat bagus."Saya melihat 80 persen dari mereka masih dalam kondisi baik. Mereka dibakar sekali. Jika mereka tidak ingin merawat mereka, kami siap untuk menerimanya dan akan merawat mereka dengan baik," kata sang ayah, yang memiliki 20 tahun seni reog.Sementara itu, koordinator aksi, Agung Begawan Prabu, menekankan bahwa tindakan pembakaran kembali pada konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, adalah kejahatan murni.Ini karena pemusnahan tidak dilakukan melalui prosedur yang jelas dan resmi sesuai dengan peraturan yang ada."Salah satu prosedurnya adalah bahwa harus ada koordinasi dan analisis terlebih dahulu. Di sini prosedurnya tidak diikuti dan reog yang terbakar adalah aset negara, seni dan budaya bangsa. Kami menuntut agar Kementerian Luar Negeri menyelidiki kasus ini dan pelaku pembakaran dapat dihukum," jelasnya.

berita: If Malaysia wants to control Reog Ponorogo, but in Davao the Philippines is different. Barongan and suddenly peacock which were part of the Reog Ponorogo apparatus were burned by a number of Indonesian Consulate General staff in Davao, Southern Philippines, Tuesday (20/10/2015). As reported by the bitungnews.com site, he explained that the arson was actually carried out by a number of the Indonesian Consulate General's staff themselves. Another device that was burned was an ornament depicting a dragon on a gong (musical instrument) supporting pole to accompany Reog Ponorogo. It is said that the reason for sorry the burning of Barongan Reog Ponorogo, and the dragon decoration on the gamelan, is because there is a devil and is an idol. Unfortunately, the Acting Consulate General, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, did not prevent the arson. Instead, Acting Consulate General Davao summoned a security guard named Santander to pour gas over the reog and 2 gamelan dragons. Even the security guard who was ordered was so surprised and surprised. "Hadluk kaayu ko, dear kaayu ang dragon gwapo kaayu unya sunugon, kasayang sa reog pero gisugo man ko (I'm so scared, it's a shame that the dragon snake is so good it wants to be burned, the reog is too bad but how else can I be told)," said Santander. "Barong Reog and the burnt gamelan dragon ornaments are the inventory of the Indonesian Consulate General's cultural museum. However, none of the other Indonesian Consulate General staff knew when the arson took place," said a source from bitungnews.com. However, after this incident, most of the perpetrators were blasphemed by Indonesian citizens who were in Davao, but the perpetrators still felt innocent because according to them what they were doing was right in the eyes of God. An Indonesian citizen residing in Davao, stated that the Acting Consulate General in Davao was declared persona non grata, and asked the Indonesian government to withdraw the persons involved in the act of burning the nation's cultural heritage. Bitungnews.com tried to contact the Media and Information Service, Ministry of Foreign Affairs on 021 3813453, but until this news was published it was not picked up. And an electronic message to infomed@kemlu.go.id got an answer. Stupid action The act of burning Barong Reog Ponorogo and the Gamelan Dragon Ornament, at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) Davao, Philippines, was criticized by International Political Observer Sam Ratulangi University, Manado, Dr. Michael Mamentu. "One of the duties of diplomats is to introduce national culture in other countries, this is a bad precedent for our diplomacy world, I can even say it is a 'stupid action' for the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao," said Michael Mamentu, to bitungnews.com. According to Dr. Michael Mamentu, the Acting Consulate should have been more prudent in dealing with this problem, because the notion of being an idol or a devil in the decoration of the nation's culture, does not have to burn or destroy these items as a solution. This is an irony, other countries claim our cultural heritage, while at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao it burned it, the Acting Consulate General should have sent the equipment home, to be replaced with other cultural displays because Indonesia is rich with noble culture, added Mamentu. The Ministry of Foreign Affairs must investigate the case of asset burning at the Consulate General, and those involved in the action should be sent home to be replaced with wiser diplomats, he concluded.
berita_id: Jika Malaysia ingin mengendalikan Reog Ponorogo, tetapi di Davao Filipina berbeda.Barongan dan tiba -tiba merak yang merupakan bagian dari peralatan Reog Ponorogo dibakar oleh sejumlah staf umum konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina Selatan, Selasa (20/10/2015).Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh situs Bitungnews.com, ia menjelaskan bahwa pembakaran itu sebenarnya dilakukan oleh sejumlah staf konsulat Jenderal Indonesia itu sendiri.Perangkat lain yang dibakar adalah ornamen yang menggambarkan naga pada tiang pendukung gong (alat musik) untuk menemani Reog Ponorogo.Dikatakan bahwa alasan untuk menyesal pembakaran Barongan Reog Ponorogo, dan dekorasi naga di gamelan, adalah karena ada iblis dan merupakan idola.Sayangnya, akting konsulat jenderal, Loegeng Priyohanisetyo, tidak mencegah pembakaran.Sebaliknya, akting Konsulat Jenderal Davao memanggil seorang penjaga keamanan bernama Santander untuk menuangkan gas di atas reog dan 2 gamelan naga.Bahkan penjaga keamanan yang diperintahkan begitu terkejut dan terkejut."Hadluk Kaayu Ko, Kaayu Ang Dragon Gwapo Kaayu Unya Sunugon, Kasayang sa Reog Pero Gisugo Man Ko (Saya sangat takut, sungguh memalukan bahwa ular naga itu begitu baik sehingga ingin dibakar, yang diulangnya terlalu buruk tetapi bagaimana lagi saya bisa diceritakan)," kata Sant."Barong Reog dan ornamen Gamelan Dragon yang terbakar adalah inventaris museum budaya Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia. Namun, tidak ada staf umum konsulat Indonesia lainnya yang tahu ketika pembakaran itu terjadi," kata seorang sumber dari Bitungnews.com.Namun, setelah kejadian ini, sebagian besar pelaku dihujat oleh warga negara Indonesia yang berada di Davao, tetapi para pelaku masih merasa tidak bersalah karena menurut mereka apa yang mereka lakukan tepat di mata Tuhan.Seorang warga negara Indonesia yang tinggal di Davao, menyatakan bahwa penjabat konsulat jenderal di Davao dinyatakan kepribadian non grata, dan meminta pemerintah Indonesia untuk menarik orang -orang yang terlibat dalam tindakan membakar warisan budaya negara.Bitungnews.com mencoba menghubungi Layanan Media dan Informasi, Kementerian Luar Negeri di 021 3813453, tetapi sampai berita ini diterbitkan tidak diambil.Dan pesan elektronik ke infomed@kemlu.go.id mendapat jawaban.Tindakan bodoh Tindakan Barong Reog Ponorogo dan ornamen Dragon Gamelan, di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) Davao, Filipina, dikritik oleh pengamat politik internasional Sam Ratulangi University, Manado, Dr. Michael Mamentu."Salah satu tugas para diplomat adalah memperkenalkan budaya nasional di negara -negara lain, ini adalah preseden yang buruk bagi dunia diplomasi kita, saya bahkan dapat mengatakan itu adalah 'tindakan bodoh' bagi konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao," kata Michael Mamentu, kepada Bitungnews.com.Menurut Dr. Michael Mamentu, konsulat akting seharusnya lebih bijaksana dalam menangani masalah ini, karena gagasan menjadi idola atau iblis dalam dekorasi budaya bangsa, tidak harus membakar atau menghancurkan pembakaran aset di Konsulat Jenderal, dan mereka yang terlibat dalam tindakan tersebut harus dikirim pulang untuk diganti dengan diplomat yang lebih bijak, ia menyimpulkan.

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan admitted that he did not have a problem and still respects the attitude of composer Ananda Sukarlan who protested his presence at the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College. “I will greet all, protect all. If then there is a negative reaction, well that's a bonus for me. There is nothing, it's normal," said Anies at the Jakarta City Hall, Monday, November 13 2017. Ananda Sukarlan launched a walk out to protest the committee who invited Anies to commemorate the founding of Kanisius College. "Why invite someone who is against the values ​​taught to us at Kanisius," he said when contacted by Tempo, Monday, October 13 2017. Ananda said that while studying at Kanisius he got an understanding of pluralism. By appreciating differences, he believes life in the world will be better. "Differences are what bring us together," he said. However, he considers Anies' figure to be contrary to these values. According to Ananda, during the 2017 Jakarta Pilkada campaign which was full of religious and racist sentiments, Anies Baswedan did not seem bothered. In addition, Anies' inaugural speech as governor touched on indigenous issues. "I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," said Ananda Sukarlan. Anies Baswedan said that he was only informed this opinion morning about Ananda Sukarlan's protest. According to him, anyone has the right to express their thoughts or criticisms in their own way. He attended the event because he was invited as governor as well as a friend. "I'm not like someone who doesn't know my friends at Kanisius. And this isn't the first time I've been to Kanisius," concluded Anies Baswedan.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan mengakui bahwa dia tidak memiliki masalah dan masih menghormati sikap komposer Ananda Sukarlan yang memprotes kehadirannya pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College."Saya akan menyambut semuanya, melindungi semuanya. Jika ada reaksi negatif, yah itu bonus bagi saya. Tidak ada, itu normal," kata Anies di Balai Kota Jakarta, Senin, 13 November 2017. Ananda Sukarlan meluncurkan jalan -jalan untuk memprotes komite yang mengundang ANIES untuk memperingati pendirian Kanisius College."Mengapa mengundang seseorang yang menentang nilai -nilai yang diajarkan kepada kami di Kanisius," katanya ketika dihubungi oleh Tempo, Senin, 13 Oktober 2017. Ananda mengatakan bahwa ketika belajar di Kanisius ia mendapat pemahaman tentang pluralisme.Dengan menghargai perbedaan, ia percaya kehidupan di dunia akan lebih baik."Perbedaan itulah yang menyatukan kita," katanya.Namun, ia menganggap angka ini bertentangan dengan nilai -nilai ini.Menurut Ananda, selama kampanye Jakarta Pilkada 2017 yang penuh dengan sentimen religius dan rasis, Anies Baswedan tampaknya tidak terganggu.Selain itu, pidato pelantikan Anies sebagai gubernur menyentuh masalah -masalah asli."Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nurani dan nilai -nilai kemanusiaan," kata Ananda Sukarlan.Anies Baswedan mengatakan bahwa dia hanya diberitahu pendapat ini pagi tentang protes Ananda Sukarlan.Menurutnya, siapa pun memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pikiran atau kritik mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Dia menghadiri acara itu karena dia diundang sebagai gubernur dan juga teman."Aku tidak seperti seseorang yang tidak mengenal teman -temanku di Kanisius. Dan ini bukan pertama kalinya aku pernah ke Kanisius," pungkas Anies Baswedan.

berita: People who have a sudden stroke (falling from the bathroom), the blood vessels to the brain will burst little by little. Remember, to overcome this do not be nervous or panic. If the victim is at the scene such as in the bathroom, bedroom or living room. Do not move to another place, because it will accelerate the rupture of blood vessels and do not let the victim fall again. You can do this by removing the victim's blood using a needle that has been burned or sterilized and then inserted into the tip of each finger until 1-2 drops of blood come out. If the blood does not come out, it can be massaged until it comes out, after which the victim will be conscious after a few minutes. If the victim's mouth is tilted, pull the earlobe until it is red and directly pierce the bottom of the earlobe with the sterile needle until the blood drips out. After the victim is conscious and his mouth has recovered, then he is taken to a doctor or hospital. Usually, people who have a stroke will have their blood vessels burst more quickly due to shocks on the way to the hospital or net ball doctor. The person may not regain consciousness or faint when this happens it will usually be disabled or paralyzed. (We must remember BLOODING from the finger of a person who has a stroke, then we can help that person from a stroke).
berita_id: Orang yang tiba -tiba mengalami stroke (jatuh dari kamar mandi), pembuluh darah ke otak akan meledak sedikit demi sedikit.Ingat, untuk mengatasi hal ini jangan gugup atau panik.Jika korban berada di tempat kejadian seperti di kamar mandi, kamar tidur atau ruang tamu.Jangan pindah ke tempat lain, karena itu akan mempercepat pecahnya pembuluh darah dan jangan membiarkan korban jatuh lagi.Anda dapat melakukan ini dengan menghilangkan darah korban menggunakan jarum yang telah dibakar atau disterilkan dan kemudian dimasukkan ke ujung setiap jari sampai 1-2 tetes darah keluar.Jika darah tidak keluar, itu dapat dipijat sampai keluar, setelah itu korban akan sadar setelah beberapa menit.Jika mulut korban dimiringkan, tarik daun telinga sampai merah dan langsung menusuk bagian bawah daun telinga dengan jarum steril sampai darah keluar.Setelah korban sadar dan mulutnya pulih, maka ia dibawa ke dokter atau rumah sakit.Biasanya, orang yang mengalami stroke akan membuat pembuluh darah mereka meledak lebih cepat karena guncangan dalam perjalanan ke rumah sakit atau dokter bola bersih.Orang tersebut tidak boleh mendapatkan kembali kesadaran atau pingsan ketika ini terjadi biasanya akan dinonaktifkan atau lumpuh.(Kita harus ingat darah dari jari seseorang yang mengalami stroke, maka kita dapat membantu orang itu dari stroke).

berita: Rumors that catfish contain cancer cells in social networks and word of mouth continue to spread. The impact of this issue that mothers are reluctant to buy catfish managed to summarize the comments of mothers who usually buy catfish for routine consumption as a side dish. Circulation of information that states that catfish contain cancer in pisu because of the life of catfish that can live in very dirty places though. The nickname as the filthiest fish refers to the nature of catfish that likes to consume various types of waste in the waters. In fact, an article that is quite vital on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. Based on these issues, in a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3000 cancer cells. The issue quickly spread on social media and word of mouth. However, this issue has not dampened the sale of catfish in Medan and is still stable and has no effect. According to a number of traders in Medan and catfish farmers in the surrounding Medan, there is no effect of the stalls issue on the consumption and sale of catfish. As admitted by Br Manalu, a catfish trader at Sukaramai Market, Medan. According to him, the sale of catfish remained stable and was not affected by the impact, related to the news, many people still consumed catfish. Sales of catfish remained normal and the price of catfish was also stable at Rp. 18000 per kilo, and it is very unfortunate with the news that catfish contains cancer cells, obviously this makes catfish farmers offended and we as traders will clearly find it difficult to find catfish supplies, he explained, Monday (16/11). A catfish farmer in the Medan Marelan area, Pujiono admitted that he did not affect the demand for catfish from his pond. Even the recent fish harvest has not been able to meet the market, the majority of which are sent to Aceh and the Medan market. Regarding catfish containing cancer cells, Community Nutrition Expert and Professor of Food and Nutrition at the Bogor Agricultural University (IPB), Prof. Dr. Ir Ali Khemsan MS, while in confirmation via cellular, Monday (16/11) denied the issue. He deeply regretted the news about cancer cell bacteria contained in catfish. In my opinion, the news is not true, in fact it makes catfish cultivators feel offended and devastated, because from there they can meet their needs, he explained. Instead, he said, the trigger for cancer cells was catfish frying oil. It is precisely what makes and causes cancer cells in people who fry something or even catfish themselves for sale using used cooking oil, that can trigger cancer. Therefore, it is hoped that all people will be more careful when buying food fried in oil, he concluded.
berita_id: Rumor bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker di jejaring sosial dan dari mulut ke mulut terus menyebar.Dampak dari masalah ini bahwa para ibu enggan membeli ikan lele yang berhasil meringkas komentar para ibu yang biasanya membeli ikan lele untuk konsumsi rutin sebagai lauk.Sirkulasi informasi yang menyatakan bahwa ikan lele mengandung kanker di Pisu karena kehidupan lele yang dapat hidup di tempat yang sangat kotor.Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengonsumsi berbagai jenis limbah di perairan.Faktanya, sebuah artikel yang cukup vital di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Berdasarkan masalah ini, dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Masalahnya dengan cepat menyebar di media sosial dan dari mulut ke mulut.Namun, masalah ini belum mengurangi penjualan ikan lele di Medan dan masih stabil dan tidak berpengaruh.Menurut sejumlah pedagang di petani medan dan ikan lele di medan sekitarnya, tidak ada efek dari masalah kios pada konsumsi dan penjualan ikan lele.Seperti yang diakui oleh BR Manalu, seorang pedagang lele di Sukaramai Market, Medan.Menurutnya, penjualan ikan lele tetap stabil dan tidak terpengaruh oleh dampaknya, terkait dengan berita, banyak orang masih mengonsumsi ikan lele.Penjualan ikan lele tetap normal dan harga ikan lele juga stabil di RP.18000 per kilo, dan sangat disayangkan dengan berita bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker, jelas ini membuat petani lele tersinggung dan kami sebagai pedagang akan dengan jelas merasa sulit untuk menemukan pasokan ikan lele, jelasnya, Senin (16/11).Seorang petani lele di daerah Medan Marelan, Pujiono mengakui bahwa ia tidak mempengaruhi permintaan ikan lele dari kolamnya.Bahkan panen ikan baru -baru ini belum dapat memenuhi pasar, yang sebagian besar dikirim ke Aceh dan Pasar Medan.Mengenai ikan lele yang mengandung sel kanker, pakar nutrisi komunitas dan profesor makanan dan nutrisi di Universitas Pertanian Bogor (IPB), Prof. Dr. Ir Ali Khemsan MS, sementara dalam konfirmasi melalui Cellular, Senin (16/11) membantah masalah ini.Dia sangat menyesali berita tentang bakteri sel kanker yang terkandung dalam ikan lele.Menurut pendapat saya, berita itu tidak benar, sebenarnya itu membuat para pembudidaya lele merasa tersinggung dan hancur, karena dari sana mereka dapat memenuhi kebutuhan mereka, jelasnya.Sebaliknya, katanya, pemicu sel kanker adalah minyak penggorengan ikan lele.Justru apa yang membuat dan menyebabkan sel kanker pada orang yang menggoreng sesuatu atau bahkan ikan lele sendiri untuk dijual menggunakan minyak goreng bekas, yang dapat memicu kanker.Oleh karena itu, diharapkan bahwa semua orang akan lebih berhati -hati saat membeli makanan yang digoreng dengan minyak, ia menyimpulkan.

berita: Lately, many people are worried about beauty brushes or toothbrushes made of bristle. Because they think the material is definitely made of sea urchins. So that the material becomes haram -- and also unclean -- when used. But actually, not all tools that use bristle refer to sea urchins. Although there are certain brush products with bristle material that use pig bristles. So, it is necessary to distinguish between the materials used, even if there is a bristle code or mark. The term bristle can mean stiff hair, short, fiber, and others. So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. In relation to this bristle, the Institute for the Study of Food, Drugs and Food, the Indonesian Ulema Council (LPPOM MUI) has provided an explanation. The following is an explanation of LPPOM MUI uploaded to the www.halalmui.org page: Lately, the virtual world has been making a fuss about brushes or toothbrushes/toothbrushes made of bristle because they are DEFINITELY made from pigs. Although we are required to be vigilant, not all bristle terms always refer to sea urchins. The lexical meaning of bristle is a short, stiff hair, fiber, etc (Webster's Dictionary). So all the hair, the stiff fiber, then the term will be referred to as bristle. Hair, stiff beard, can be categorized as bristle. Another example is the stiff fibers or pine leaves can also be referred to as bristle. So, how is its application in the industrial world? In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used as a material for making brushes or brushes, including toothbrushes. Bristle can be sourced from animal hair or plant fibers as well or synthetic fibers such as nylon and silicone. The animal hair used can be sourced from pigs, goats, horses, or camels. The plant fiber that has also been used as a brush or brush material is palm fiber. Nylon is also a synthetic fiber that is commonly used for brushes, brushes or toothbrushes. From the halal aspect, brushes and brushes, including toothbrushes derived from animal hair, are critical points. When the material is sea urchin then it should not be used because any material derived from pigs is both haram and unclean, either in dry or wet form. In addition, besides the prohibition of the substance, the MUI has issued a fatwa for anything derived from pork that is haram for its use (al-intifa') including the fur. But the problem is that not all brush or brush or toothbrush users are able to recognize whether the brush they are using is a brush or a brush that comes from pig bristles. One of the information that can be seen as a marker that the brush or brush comes from sea urchins is that it is written as the name of the product, for example “Boar Bristle Brush”. Boar is the English term for wild boar or wild boar. This means that the product is a brush that uses wild boar bristles. Toothbrush can also use this boar bristles. Amazon.com, a global online store also offers pig toothbrushes under the name “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record V Adult Soft (Pack of 5)-Assorted colors by Fuchs Toothbrushes” (check this link) and brushes made from sea ​​urchin (#1 TRUSTED Wooden Boar Hair Bristle Beard Brush by Leven Rose - Perfect For a Beard Grooming Kit for Men - Made of Boars Hair Bristles and Firm Natural Wood). Please check here. However, brushes, brushes, or toothbrushes are not always made from pigs even though they have bristle written on them, because the term bristle is still a general term. There are several manufacturers who have used goat hair or camel or horse hair as brush material or made of nylon. The last group of materials is clearly acceptable. When there is no information on the source of the material, at least a simple method can be used. To determine whether it is made from animal hair or not, the method in question is to burn the material. If it smells like burning hair or horns, better leave it alone. Materials from plastic or coconut fiber do not emit such a distinctive odor when burned.
berita_id: Akhir -akhir ini, banyak orang khawatir tentang sikat kecantikan atau sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu.Karena mereka pikir bahannya pasti terbuat dari bulu babi.Sehingga materi menjadi haram - dan juga najis - bila digunakan.Tapi sebenarnya, tidak semua alat yang menggunakan Bristle merujuk pada bulu babi.Meskipun ada produk sikat tertentu dengan bahan bulu yang menggunakan bulu babi.Jadi, perlu untuk membedakan antara bahan yang digunakan, bahkan jika ada kode bulu atau tanda.Istilah bulu dapat berarti rambut kaku, pendek, serat, dan lainnya.Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.Sehubungan dengan bulu ini, Institute for Studies of Food, Obat dan Makanan, Dewan Ulama Indonesia (LPPOM MUI) telah memberikan penjelasan.Berikut ini adalah penjelasan LPPOM MUI yang diunggah ke halaman www.halalmui.org: Akhir -akhir ini, dunia virtual telah membuat keributan tentang sikat atau sikat gigi/sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu karena mereka pasti terbuat dari babi.Meskipun kami diharuskan waspada, tidak semua istilah bulu selalu merujuk pada bulu babi.Arti leksikal dari bulu adalah rambut pendek, kaku, serat, dll (Kamus Webster).Jadi semua rambut, serat kaku, maka istilah ini akan disebut sebagai bulu.Rambut, jenggot kaku, dapat dikategorikan sebagai bulu.Contoh lain adalah serat kaku atau daun pinus juga dapat disebut sebagai bulu.Jadi, bagaimana penerapannya di dunia industri?Di dunia industri, Bristle memang digunakan sebagai bahan untuk membuat kuas atau sikat, termasuk sikat gigi.BRISTLE dapat bersumber dari rambut hewani atau serat tanaman juga atau serat sintetis seperti nilon dan silikon.Rambut hewan yang digunakan dapat bersumber dari babi, kambing, kuda, atau unta.Serat tanaman yang juga telah digunakan sebagai sikat atau bahan sikat adalah serat kelapa sawit.Nylon juga merupakan serat sintetis yang biasanya digunakan untuk kuas, sikat atau sikat gigi.Dari aspek halal, sikat dan sikat, termasuk sikat gigi yang berasal dari rambut hewani, adalah titik kritis.Ketika bahannya adalah landak laut maka tidak boleh digunakan karena bahan apa pun yang berasal dari babi adalah haram dan najis, baik dalam bentuk kering atau basah.Selain itu, selain larangan zat, MUI telah mengeluarkan fatwa untuk apa pun yang berasal dari daging babi yang merupakan haram untuk penggunaannya (al-intifa ') termasuk bulu.Tetapi masalahnya adalah tidak semua sikat atau sikat atau sikat gigi dapat mengenali apakah kuas yang mereka gunakan adalah kuas atau kuas yang berasal dari bulu babi.Salah satu informasi yang dapat dilihat sebagai penanda bahwa kuas atau kuas berasal dari landak laut adalah bahwa itu ditulis sebagai nama produk, misalnya "Boar Bristle Brush".Babi adalah istilah bahasa Inggris untuk babi hutan atau babi hutan.Ini berarti bahwa produk adalah kuas yang menggunakan bulu babi liar.Sikat gigi juga dapat menggunakan bulu babi ini.Amazon.com, toko online global juga menawarkan sikat gigi pigi dengan nama “Fuchs Toothbrushes Pure Natural (Boar) Bristle Record v Dewasa Lembut (Paket 5) -sorpored Warna oleh Fuchs Toothbrushes” (periksa tautan ini) dan sikat yang terbuat dari landak (#Kayu).Silakan periksa di sini.Namun, kuas, sikat, atau sikat gigi tidak selalu terbuat dari babi meskipun mereka memiliki bulu yang tertulis di atasnya, karena istilah bulu masih merupakan istilah umum.Ada beberapa produsen yang menggunakan rambut kambing atau unta atau rambut kuda sebagai bahan sikat atau terbuat dari nilon.Kelompok material terakhir jelas dapat diterima.Ketika tidak ada informasi tentang sumber materi, setidaknya metode sederhana dapat digunakan.Untuk menentukan apakah itu terbuat dari rambut hewani atau tidak, metode yang dimaksud adalah membakar material.Jika baunya seperti rambut atau tanduk yang terbakar, lebih baik biarkan saja.Bahan dari plastik atau serat kelapa tidak memancarkan bau yang khas saat dibakar.

In addition, Anies' inaugural speech as governor touched on indigenous issues. "I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," said Ananda Sukarlan. Anies Baswedan said that he was only informed this opinion morning about Ananda Sukarlan's protest. According to him, anyone has the right to express their thoughts or criticisms in their own way. He attended the event because he was invited as governor as well as a friend. "I'm not like someone who doesn't know my friends at Kanisius. And this isn't the first time I've been to Kanisius," concluded Anies Baswedan.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan mengakui bahwa dia tidak memiliki masalah dan masih menghormati sikap komposer Ananda Sukarlan yang memprotes kehadirannya pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College."Saya akan menyambut semuanya, melindungi semuanya. Jika ada reaksi negatif, yah itu bonus bagi saya. Tidak ada, itu normal," kata Anies di Balai Kota Jakarta, Senin, 13 November 2017. Ananda mengatakan bahwa ketika belajar di Kanisius ia mendapat pemahaman tentang pluralisme.Dengan menghargai perbedaan, ia percaya kehidupan di dunia akan lebih baik."Perbedaan itulah yang menyatukan kita," katanya.Namun, ia menganggap angka ini bertentangan dengan nilai -nilai ini.Menurut Ananda, selama kampanye Jakarta Pilkada 2017 yang penuh dengan sentimen religius dan rasis, Anies Baswedan tampaknya tidak terganggu.Selain itu, pidato pelantikan Anies sebagai gubernur menyentuh masalah -masalah asli."Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nurani dan nilai -nilai kemanusiaan," kata Ananda Sukarlan.Anies Baswedan mengatakan bahwa dia hanya diberitahu pendapat ini pagi tentang protes Ananda Sukarlan.Menurutnya, siapa pun memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pikiran atau kritik mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Dia menghadiri acara itu karena dia diundang sebagai gubernur dan juga teman."Aku tidak seperti seseorang yang tidak mengenal teman -temanku di Kanisius. berita: Finance convey Minister Sri Mulyani emphasized that there was no discussion regarding the increase in the President's salary. This is in response to the statement from the Head of the Legal, Communication and Public Information Bureau of KemenPAN-RB, Herman Suryatman, who said that the President's salary would increase to Rp 553 million per month. "It doesn't exist and has never been discussed. And in my opinion, what was conveyed by the Menpan was a hoax," said Sri Mulyani at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java, Monday (12/3). The former Managing Director of the World Bank said that hoax information was indeed scattered on social media. Many parties make documents that seem to be the same as the original. "In the current era of social media, a lot of information is created, and documents that are made similar to the government are then published," he said. Although denying the discussion of the salary increase of the Head of State, Sri Mulyani confirmed the information on the plan to increase the salary of Civil Servants (PNS). "If the salary of civil servants will be in the 2019 RKP and 2019 RAPBN, we will design it based on what we have conveyed to the council. In financial notes, usually salary increases and payments for the 13th salary as well as for pensions are usually entered by the president at the time of the financial note. August," he explained

berita: Metrotvnews.com, Jakarta: A reog Ponorogo at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, was destroyed by burning on October 20, 2015. berita: A chain message about being aware of the presence of a toothbrush made of boar bristle is spreading in the community. Because of this, there is the word bristle on the packaging of a global toothbrush brand. The message is not really new. The message was spread a year ago, but now it's crowded again. "Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the packaging, it means that the toothbrush contains pig bristles. Bristle means pig hair. As soon as the sound of the message fragments spread again through the chat application. Not only on toothbrushes, the message maker also suggested that people check the bread brushes. He said the brush usually says “Bristle”, “Pure Bristle”, “100% China Bristle”. As with other hoax messages, the appeal was accompanied by a request to share the message with family and friends in the group so that more people would be spared from non-halal products. It turned out that the informant had misunderstood. Maybe, when he wrote the message, he had not had coffee. Because, the term bristle is not only used for sea urchins. According to the official website of the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) Food, Drug and Cosmetic Research Institute, the term bristle is lexically a short, stiff hair, and fiber. So, all stiff commonly hair fibers can be called bristle. In the industrial world, bristle is indeed used for making brushes or brushes (including toothbrushes). However, not all of them come from sea urchins. Bristle for brushes and brushes can be sourced from animal hair. Be it pigs, goats, horses, or camels. Apart from animal hair, for industrial purposes, bristle can also be made from synthetic materials, either nylon or silicone. Plant fiber has also been used as a brush or brush material. The fiber is commonly known as palm fiber. The MUI has firmly stated that if a brush or brush uses pork bristles, it is unlawful. However, manufacturers usually write down in detail the raw material used for fur. Usually, for brushes or brushes with boar bristle material, it is written boar bristle brush. Boar itself is an English term that refers to a wild boar. Recognizing the raw material for a brush or toothbrush is not easy. However, you can determine whether the fur comes from animal hair or synthetic material by slightly burning it. If you smell hair, you can be sure that the fur comes from an animal. If it is made of synthetic material or coconut fiber, the smell will be different. Referring to a number of sources, the use of bristles on toothbrushes was first carried out by the Chinese in the 15th century. At that time, the hair on the pig's neck was used. The brush was later brought to the European market. However, Europeans prefer horsehair because it is softer. The first modern toothbrush was introduced by William Addis in England around 1780. The handle was carved from cow bone. The fur is still made of sea urchin, only one big row. Furthermore, in 1844, a toothbrush with three rows of bristles was designed. Modern technology has finally found nylon can be used as bristles on brushes. The technology was introduced in 1938. Since 1950, the toothbrush industry has mostly used nylon bristles. So, don't be in a hurry to think of the bristle writing on your toothbrush packaging as a sea urchin. FACT The word bristle on the toothbrush packaging does not mean a boar. Almost all toothbrush products currently use synthetic materials.

berita: Who doesn't know catfish, this fish is a favorite for many people because it has a delicious taste and has a soft meat texture, but it turns out that catfish is the dirtiest fish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells. Is that true? Catfish The Dirtiest Fish, One Mouth contains Three Thousand Cancer Cells, Here's the Explanation Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu is always available because the price is quite cheap and delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is an explanation: The catfish pond is very dirty and is surrounded by chicken coops and pigs. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong, who admitted that he had supplied a lot of catfish to markets and restaurants on the side of the road in Hainan province, precisely in Haikou, which he harvested 3 once a month. Due to the many complaints from the community, journalists searched about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, even this fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. That's some information about catfish in China, but in Indonesia this fish has been cultivated well by catfish farmers and they use pellets as food instead of using waste which is very dangerous for the health of the human body. So that consuming catfish in Indonesia there is no need to doubt its cleanliness, but as wise consumers we must remain vigilant about the content of this fish and do not skirt need to consume it in large quantities on a regular basis because it can interfere with our health. Apart from all that, are there any healthy benefits of catfish? it turns out that this one fish besides being delicious also contains several substances that are good for the health of the human body. Here are 4 benefits of catfish: Healthy heart and brain Catfish contains omega-3 and omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and it turns out that a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good quality In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue and strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12 A serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is about 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin is useful in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content so it is safe for consumption. That's some information about the dirtiest fish catfish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells, but it turns out that this fish also has high nutritional value if cultivated properly.
