berita: DoctorSehat.Com Stroke is a neurological disease that most often results in disability and death. Besides being ranked first among a class of neurological diseases that cause death, stroke is also one of the three main causes of death in general. To overcome this crucial problem, a stroke prevention strategy is needed that includes preventive, rehabilitative, and promotive aspects. Actually, stroke have cases have occurred long ago, this is evidenced by the existence of first aid in stroke cases based on traditional Chinese medicine with acupuncture techniques, but this technique has been forgotten, so the impact is getting bigger. As is known, people who get a STROKE attack, all the blood in the body will flow very fast to the blood vessels in the brain. If the rescue activity is given a little too late, then the blood vessels in the brain will not be strong enough to withstand the rush of blood flowing and will soon burst little by little. The following first aid can be done Do not be moved If you move the patient from the place of origin / original place it will make the possibility of rupture of fine blood vessels in the brain will occur more quickly and of course this will be risky. Simply help the patient to take a sitting position so as not to fall again. Pull and prick the earlobe If the patient's mouth looks abnormal, you may have to try to tug on the patient's ears until they look a little red. Then, do 2 punctures on the lower end of the ear with a small needle that has been sterilized so that the blood drips 2 times from each earlobe. In a few minutes the patient's mouth will return to normal. Puncture the tips of the fingers with a needle It is recommended to use a syringe. But if you don't have one, you can use other needles that are not too big (ex: sewing needles, pins) and of course they must be in a sterile condition by burning. The point to be punctured is about 1 mm from the tip of the nail. Try to get at least a little blood dripping or 1 drop is enough. If you can't, press the finger. Within about 10 minutes, the patient will regain consciousness. Seek medical help when the patient's condition begins to recover, seek medical attention immediately. Take the patient to the nearest doctor or nearest hospital to get further action. Remember, before 6 hours since the attack, stroke sufferers must receive medical help. So some information and tips about First Aid for Stroke Patients, I hope you can provide help to those around you and help save a human life. Please leave your opinion Below!
berita_id: Stroke doctorsehat.com adalah penyakit neurologis yang paling sering mengakibatkan kecacatan dan kematian.Selain peringkat pertama di antara kelas penyakit neurologis yang menyebabkan kematian, stroke juga merupakan salah satu dari tiga penyebab utama kematian secara umum.Untuk mengatasi masalah penting ini, strategi pencegahan stroke diperlukan yang mencakup aspek preventif, rehabilitasi, dan promosi.Sebenarnya, stroke memiliki kasus telah terjadi sejak lama, ini dibuktikan dengan keberadaan pertolongan pertama dalam kasus stroke berdasarkan obat tradisional Tiongkok dengan teknik akupunktur, tetapi teknik ini telah dilupakan, sehingga dampaknya semakin besar.Seperti diketahui, orang yang mendapatkan serangan stroke, semua darah dalam tubuh akan mengalir sangat cepat ke pembuluh darah di otak.Jika aktivitas penyelamatan diberikan sedikit terlambat, maka pembuluh darah di otak tidak akan cukup kuat untuk menahan aliran darah yang mengalir dan akan segera meledak sedikit demi sedikit.Pertolongan pertama berikut dapat dilakukan, jangan dipindahkan jika Anda memindahkan pasien dari tempat asal / tempat asli itu akan membuat kemungkinan pecahnya pembuluh darah halus di otak akan terjadi lebih cepat dan tentu saja ini akan berisiko.Cukup bantu pasien untuk mengambil posisi duduk agar tidak jatuh lagi.Tarik dan tusuk telinga jika mulut pasien terlihat tidak normal, Anda mungkin harus mencoba menarik telinga pasien sampai mereka terlihat sedikit merah.Kemudian, lakukan 2 tusukan di ujung bawah telinga dengan jarum kecil yang telah disterilkan sehingga darah menetes 2 kali dari setiap daun telinga.Dalam beberapa menit mulut pasien akan kembali normal.Tusuk ujung jari dengan jarum yang disarankan untuk menggunakan jarum suntik.Tetapi jika Anda tidak memilikinya, Anda dapat menggunakan jarum lain yang tidak terlalu besar (mis: jarum menjahit, pin) dan tentu saja mereka harus dalam kondisi steril dengan membakar.Poin yang harus ditusuk adalah sekitar 1 mm dari ujung kuku.Cobalah untuk mendapatkan setidaknya sedikit darah yang menetes atau 1 tetes sudah cukup.Jika Anda tidak bisa, tekan jari.Dalam waktu sekitar 10 menit, pasien akan mendapatkan kembali kesadaran.Carilah bantuan medis ketika kondisi pasien mulai pulih, segera cari perhatian medis.Bawa pasien ke dokter terdekat atau rumah sakit terdekat untuk mendapatkan tindakan lebih lanjut.Ingat, sebelum 6 jam sejak serangan, penderita stroke harus menerima bantuan medis.Jadi beberapa informasi dan tips tentang pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke, saya harap Anda dapat memberikan bantuan kepada orang -orang di sekitar Anda dan membantu menyelamatkan hidup manusia.Silakan tinggalkan pendapat Anda di bawah!

berita: Lately we often get broadcast information via BBM about first aid for stroke sufferers, the broadcast message sounds roughly as follows: a person who has a sudden stroke (falls from the toilet, etc.), the blood vessels to the brain will burst little by little . Remember, to overcome this do not be nervous / panic. If the victim is at the scene such as in the bathroom / bedroom / living room etc. Do not be moved to another place, because it will accelerate the rupture of blood vessels, and do not let the patient fall again. The first aid method for stroke sufferers is to bleed the victim's blood using a burnt/sterilized needle which is then inserted into the tip of each confirm finger until 1-2 drops of blood come out. If the blood does not come out, it can be massaged until it comes out, after which the victim will wake up after a few minutes. If the victim's mouth is tilted, pull the earlobe until it is red and directly pierce the bottom of the earlobe with a sterile needle until 1-2 drops of blood come out. After the victim is conscious and his mouth has recovered, then he is taken to the doctor / hospital. Usually people who have a stroke will have their blood vessels burst more quickly due to shocks on the way to the hospital / doctor. The person may become unconscious / faint and will usually be disabled / paralyzed. Remember, the first aid method for stroke sufferers is to REMOVE BLOOD from the finger of the person affected by the STROKE, then we can already help the person from the STROKE disease that afflicts them. To get accurate information for the common good, CuitNews conducts searches and looks for various references about whether the broadcast above is true or not. The following is a summary of information obtained by CuitNews from various sources: dr. Ahmad Yanuar, SpS dismissed the truth. So far there is no such research, it is not known whether the action is effective or not, the neurologist from the University of Indonesia told detikHealth. This is also confirmed by dr. Fritz Sumantri, SpS. What must be underlined is that medicine departs from research and trials. As for the way beyond that there has been no research. At least it's not safe yet. Until now medical science does not know such a method, so we also do not know its effectiveness, he stressed. The only action that must be taken immediately is to be taken to the hospital and given reperfusion action at the fastest hour. About 3-6 hours after the incident, the patient must be rushed to the hospital for medical treatment, added Dr. Ahmad. The patient should immediately get a complete examination of his condition. So, a finger prick or puncture under the ear is not the right way because it will not remove the blockage or bleeding that occurs in the patient's brain. The same thing was confirmed by Dr. Fritz Sumantri, SpS. He said that patients should be taken directly to the hospital instead of being stabbed or just taken to the clinic. It is not true that patients should not be transferred anywhere, instead they must be immediately taken to the hospital. The danger of the needling method does not exist, it's just that if the patient is quickly taken to the hospital, the possibility of recovery will also be fast and the treatment will not be too late, he said. It says that this will relieve blood pressure and relieve symptoms. this advice has no scientific basis, even dangerous. Forcing stroke victims to sit up is not a good idea because it will result in a drop in blood pressure. It is best to keep the victim lying down. Stabbing the victim's finger is also a bad idea, not only because it's pointless, but also because it's a waste of time. The sooner contacting medical personnel the better, stroke patients must be treated promptly and appropriately, every minute will be very valuable. Only emergency medical care can help stroke victims, and the results of the efforts of experts will only be optimal if they help no later than 3 hours after the attack. We hope that this summary of information about how to give first aid to stroke sufferers that we often get via broadcast messages can be understood together and we can draw our own conclusions which are right and wrong. Do not be wrong in drawing conclusions and actions, because this is very dangerous for stroke sufferers and can even be helpless.
berita_id: Akhir -akhir ini kita sering mendapatkan informasi siaran melalui BBM tentang pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke, pesan siaran terdengar kira -kira sebagai berikut: seseorang yang mengalami stroke mendadak (jatuh dari toilet, dll.), Pembuluh darah ke otak akan meledak sedikit demi sedikit.Ingat, untuk mengatasi hal ini jangan gugup / panik.Jika korban berada di tempat kejadian seperti di kamar mandi / kamar tidur / ruang tamu dll. Jangan dipindahkan ke tempat lain, karena itu akan mempercepat pecahnya pembuluh darah, dan jangan biarkan pasien jatuh lagi.Metode pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke adalah untuk berdarah darah korban menggunakan jarum yang terbakar/disterilkan yang kemudian dimasukkan ke ujung setiap jari konfirmasi sampai 1-2 tetes darah keluar.Jika darah tidak keluar, itu bisa dipijat sampai keluar, setelah itu korban akan bangun setelah beberapa menit.Jika mulut korban dimiringkan, tarik daun telinga sampai merah dan langsung menusuk bagian bawah daun telinga dengan jarum steril sampai 1-2 tetes darah keluar.Setelah korban sadar dan mulutnya pulih, maka ia dibawa ke dokter / rumah sakit.Biasanya orang yang mengalami stroke akan membuat pembuluh darah mereka meledak lebih cepat karena guncangan dalam perjalanan ke rumah sakit / dokter.Orang tersebut dapat menjadi tidak sadar / pingsan dan biasanya akan dinonaktifkan / lumpuh.Ingat, metode pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke adalah menghilangkan darah dari jari orang yang terkena stroke, maka kita sudah dapat membantu orang dari penyakit stroke yang menimpa mereka.Untuk mendapatkan informasi yang akurat untuk kebaikan umum, CuitNews melakukan pencarian dan mencari berbagai referensi tentang apakah siaran di atas benar atau tidak.Berikut ini adalah ringkasan informasi yang diperoleh oleh Cuitnews dari berbagai sumber: DR.Ahmad Yanuar, SPS menolak kebenaran.Sejauh ini tidak ada penelitian seperti itu, tidak diketahui apakah tindakannya efektif atau tidak, ahli saraf dari University of Indonesia mengatakan kepada DetikHealth.Ini juga dikonfirmasi oleh DR.Fritz Sumantri, sps.Yang harus digarisbawahi adalah bahwa obat berangkat dari penelitian dan uji coba.Adapun jauh melampaui itu belum ada penelitian.Setidaknya belum aman.Sampai sekarang ilmu kedokteran tidak tahu metode seperti itu, jadi kami juga tidak tahu keefektifannya, ia menekankan.Satu -satunya tindakan yang harus diambil segera adalah untuk dibawa ke rumah sakit dan diberikan tindakan reperfusi pada jam tercepat.Sekitar 3-6 jam setelah insiden itu, pasien harus dilarikan ke rumah sakit untuk perawatan medis, tambah Dr. Ahmad.Pasien harus segera mendapatkan pemeriksaan lengkap dari kondisinya.Jadi, tusukan jari atau tusukan di bawah telinga bukanlah cara yang benar karena tidak akan menghilangkan penyumbatan atau pendarahan yang terjadi di otak pasien.Hal yang sama dikonfirmasi oleh Dr. Fritz Sumantri, SPS.Dia mengatakan bahwa pasien harus dibawa langsung ke rumah sakit alih -alih ditikam atau hanya dibawa ke klinik.Tidak benar bahwa pasien tidak boleh ditransfer ke mana pun, sebaliknya mereka harus segera dibawa ke rumah sakit.Bahaya metode tusuk jarum tidak ada, hanya saja jika pasien dengan cepat dibawa ke rumah sakit, kemungkinan pemulihan juga akan cepat dan perawatannya tidak akan terlambat, katanya.Dikatakan bahwa ini akan menghilangkan tekanan darah dan meredakan gejala.Saran ini tidak memiliki dasar ilmiah, bahkan berbahaya.Memaksa korban stroke untuk duduk bukanlah ide yang baik karena akan mengakibatkan penurunan tekanan darah.Yang terbaik adalah membuat korban berbaring.Menusuk jari korban juga merupakan ide yang buruk, bukan hanya karena tidak ada gunanya, tetapi juga karena itu buang -buang waktu.Semakin cepat menghubungi tenaga medis semakin baik, pasien stroke harus diobati dengan segera dan tepat, setiap menit akan sangat berharga.Hanya perawatan medis darurat yang dapat membantu para korban stroke, dan hasil dari upaya para ahli hanya akan optimal jika mereka membantu selambat -lambatnya 3 jam setelah serangan.Kami berharap bahwa ringkasan informasi tentang bagaimana memberikan pertolongan pertama kepada penderita stroke yang sering kami dapatkan melalui pesan siaran dapat dipahami bersama dan kami dapat menarik kesimpulan kami sendiri yang benar dan salah.Jangan salah dalam menarik kesimpulan dan tindakan, karena ini sangat berbahaya bagi penderita stroke dan bahkan bisa tidak berdaya.

berita: Terrorism observer Al-Chaidar assessed that the riot at the Mako Brimob detention house, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, Tuesday (08/05/2018) night was bigger than the explosions in Sarinah and Kampung Melayu, Jakarta, some time ago. . "This is a bigger incident than the Sarinah bombing and the Kampung Melayu bombing," said Chaidar, a lecturer at the Faculty of Social and Political Sciences, Malikussaleh University, Lhokseumawe, Aceh, who also lives permanently in Depok, to hidayatullah.com, last night, Wednesday. He considered that the riots occurred because the convicts of terrorism cases were offended by the authorities. "They are hurt by the police's actions to throw the Koran (in) November 2017," he said. Meanwhile, according to hidayatullah.com's monitoring last night, at locations around the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, the road leading to the Brimob Headquarters area was blocked by the police. Vehicles passing from Jl Raya Access UI to Jl Komjen Pol M Jasin, where the Mako Brimob complex is located, cannot go straight, they can only go to an intersection, go to Jl Nusantara, or to Jl Kelapa Dua Raya, or turn around. reader Traffic is congested around the intersection. Journalists who wanted to cover some of them were no longer allowed to enter the Mobile Brigade Headquarters via Jl Komjen Pol M Jasin. Journalists were also checked for press cards and personal identity cards (KTP), as well as the contents of their luggage. Some can enter after going through layers of security. Residents who want to pass are also not allowed, even though this media saw two people on motorbikes passing after being shouted "where are you going?" by officers. As previously reported, according to the Head of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Headquarters, M Iqbal, the rioting at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters was triggered when guards inspected food shipments from prisoners' families which took a long time, thus sparking the anger of the prisoners. "We have to verify food shipments according to the SOP, so that an incident occurs," said Iqbal at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters
berita_id: Pengamat terorisme Al-Chaidar menilai bahwa kerusuhan di Mako Brimob Detention House, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, Selasa (08/05/2018) malam lebih besar daripada ledakan di Sarinah dan Kampung Melayu, Jakarta, beberapa waktu yang lalu.."Ini adalah insiden yang lebih besar daripada pemboman Sarinah dan pemboman Kampung Melayu," kata Chaidar, seorang dosen di Fakultas Ilmu Sosial dan Politik, Universitas Malikussaleh, Lhokseumawe, Aceh, yang juga tinggal secara permanen di Depok, untuk Hidayatullah.com, tadi malam, Rabu.Dia menganggap bahwa kerusuhan terjadi karena narapidana kasus -kasus terorisme tersinggung oleh pihak berwenang."Mereka terluka oleh tindakan polisi untuk melemparkan Alquran (dalam) November 2017," katanya.Sementara itu, menurut pemantauan Hidayatullah.com tadi malam, di lokasi -lokasi di sekitar markas brigade seluler, jalan menuju area markas Brimob diblokir oleh polisi.Kendaraan yang lewat dari JL Raya Access UI ke JL Komjen Pol M Jasin, di mana kompleks Mako Brimob berada, tidak bisa lurus, mereka hanya bisa pergi ke persimpangan, pergi ke JL Nusantara, atau ke Jl Kelapa Dua Raya, atau berbalik.Lalu lintas pembaca tersumbat di sekitar persimpangan.Wartawan yang ingin menutupi beberapa dari mereka tidak lagi diizinkan memasuki markas brigade seluler melalui JL Komjen Pol M Jasin.Wartawan juga diperiksa untuk kartu pers dan memverifikasi pengiriman makanan sesuai dengan SOP, sehingga suatu insiden terjadi," kata Iqbal di markas Komando Brigade Mobile

berita: This afternoon the Makobrimob was tense, due to the Seizing and Throwing of Al-Qur'ans by Unscrupulous Members of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Prison this afternoon. It is known that the perpetrator of the throwing of the Qur'an is a prison officer who is known to be cruel to Muslim prisoners. violent disorder Even this news was published by CNN Indonesia, but unfortunately this news was published in a piece, and was also twisted by the CNN Indonesia Editor. CNN Indonesia reported that prisoners who went on a rampage because their cellphones were confiscated, even though the rampage began when Brimob Prison Officers threw the detainees' Al-Qur'an. Prisoners are also willing to have their cellphones confiscated, but the prisoners are not willing to have their Holy Books and Al-Qur'ans thrown into the trash by prison officers.
berita_id: Sore ini Makobrimob tegang, karena perebutan dan melempar al-Qur'ans oleh anggota yang tidak bermoral dari penjara markas brigade seluler sore ini.Diketahui bahwa pelaku lemparan Al -Qur'an adalah seorang perwira penjara yang dikenal kejam terhadap tahanan Muslim.Gangguan kekerasan Bahkan berita ini diterbitkan oleh CNN Indonesia, tetapi sayangnya berita ini diterbitkan dalam sebuah karya, dan juga dipelintir oleh editor CNN Indonesia.CNN Indonesia melaporkan bahwa para tahanan yang mengamuk karena ponsel mereka disita, meskipun mengamuk dimulai ketika petugas penjara Brimob melemparkan al-Qur'an dari tahanan.Tahanan juga bersedia melakukan ponsel mereka, tetapi para tahanan tidak bersedia memiliki kitab suci dan al-Qur'ans yang dilemparkan ke tempat sampah oleh petugas penjara.

berita: The GOVERNMENT has threatened to close social media and sharing sites, such as Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, and Youtube if they do not close accounts containing radicalism. A total of 11 Telegram domain name systems have even been asked to be blocked. The threat was voiced by the Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, after attending the declaration of anti-radicalism at Padjadjaran University, Bandung, yesterday. The reason is that the government's request for them to close accounts containing radicalism agency has not been fully complied with. "Throughout 2016 to 2017, only 50% were fulfilled. This is very disappointing. During the fasting month, I sent the director general to visit (the platform provider). If there is no improvement, we will be serious," said Rudi. He added that the social media platform was reluctant to close all accounts containing radicalism because in their home countries they had to go through court. "However, they are here because of business. Advertisements are also from here. Therefore, it is necessary to comply with the regulations here." The Ministry of Communication and Informatics has made various efforts to prevent the spread of radicalism, including closing sites and blocking accounts on social media. However, account blocking needs to involve the platform. The Ministry of Communication and Informatics yesterday also asked internet service providers to block 11 domain name systems (DNS) belonging to Telegram. The 11 DNS are t.me, telegram.me, telegram.org, core.telegram.org, desktop.telegram.org, macos.telegram.org, web.telegram.org, venus.web.telegram.org, pluto.web.telegram.org, flora.web.telegram.org, and flora-1.web.telegram .org. As a result, the web version of the Telegram service cannot be accessed via a computer. "We are also preparing the process of closing the Telegram application completely in Indonesia if Telegram does not prepare standard operational procedures for handling unlawful content in their application. This can endanger state security," said Director General of Information Applications at the Ministry of Communication and Informatics Semuel A Pangerapan. Blocking must be done because many channels in the messaging service application contain propaganda of radicalism, terrorism, and hatred. There are also invitations or how to assemble bombs. Telegram has also become a favorite of terrorists, including the Islamic State, because of its high level of encryption so that its messages are difficult for the authorities to sniff out. Telegram's Chief Executive Officer (CEO), Pavel Durov, via tweet, expressed his astonishment as to why their service was blocked. "It's strange, we have never received a request/protest from the Indonesian government. We will investigate and make an announcement," Durov said on his Twitter account, @durov, replying to a netizen's tweet. Campus Declaration Universities in West Java agreed to reject radicalism. That commitment was stated in the Declaration on Anti-radicalism which was attended by 44 state and private universities in West Java at Unpad, yesterday. In addition to all university rectors, the event was attended by Minister of Research, Technology and Higher Education Mohamad Nasir, Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara, West Java Governor Ahmad Heryawan.

Kami akan menyelidiki dan membuat pengumuman," kata Durov di akun Twitter -nya, @Durov, membalas tweet netizen.Universitas deklarasi kampus di Jawa Barat setuju untuk menolak radikalisme.Komitmen itu dinyatakan dalam Deklarasi Anti-Radikalisme yang dihadiri oleh 44 universitas negara bagian dan swasta di Jawa Barat di Unpad, kemarin.Selain semua rektor universitas, acara ini dihadiri oleh Menteri Penelitian, Teknologi dan Pendidikan Tinggi Mohamad Nasir, Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara, Gubernur Jawa Barat Ahmad Heryawan.

berita: Some time ago, messages circulated on social media and through short messages about preventing strokes in times of emergency. Broadly speaking, the sound of the message suggests sticking a needle into the patient's fingers. The goal is for blood circulation to return smoothly so that a stroke does not occur. Is that right? A neurologist at Siloam Kebon Jeruk Hospital, Fandy Susatia, during Soho #BetterU, Tuesday (20/5/2014), said that basically a stroke does occur due to blockage of blood vessels. But the blockage only occurs in blood mansion vessels in the brain. So it's not true if sticking a needle can prevent a stroke. It's just a myth, he said. Such actions, he continued, could actually endanger themselves. If the finger of a diabetic is stabbed, the wound healing process will take place slowly so there is a risk of infection. Stroke treatment costs will increase because they have to buy antibiotics for wound healing, he said. This advice is just one of many myths related to stroke. Other myths as described by Fandy include strokes cannot be prevented and treated, only older people have strokes, the sign of stroke is pain, and strokes occur in the heart.
berita_id: Beberapa waktu yang lalu, pesan beredar di media sosial dan melalui pesan singkat tentang mencegah stroke di saat darurat.Secara umum, suara pesan menunjukkan memasukkan jarum ke jari pasien.Tujuannya adalah untuk sirkulasi darah kembali dengan lancar sehingga stroke tidak terjadi.Apakah itu benar?Seorang ahli saraf di Rumah Sakit Siloam Kebon Jeruk, Fandy Susatia, selama Soho #Betteru, Selasa (20/5/2014), mengatakan bahwa pada dasarnya stroke memang terjadi karena penyumbatan pembuluh darah.Tetapi penyumbatan hanya terjadi pada pembuluh darah darah di otak.Jadi tidak benar jika menempelkan jarum dapat mencegah stroke.Itu hanya mitos, katanya.Tindakan seperti itu, lanjutnya, benar -benar bisa membahayakan diri mereka sendiri.Jika jari penderita diabetes ditikam, proses penyembuhan luka akan berlangsung perlahan sehingga ada risiko infeksi.Biaya perawatan stroke akan meningkat karena mereka harus membeli antibiotik untuk penyembuhan luka, katanya.Saran ini hanyalah salah satu dari banyak mitos yang berkaitan dengan stroke.Mitos -mitos lain seperti yang dijelaskan oleh Fandy termasuk stroke tidak dapat dicegah dan dirawat, hanya orang yang lebih tua yang memiliki pukulan, tanda stroke adalah rasa sakit, dan goresan terjadi di jantung.

berita: Catfish are freshwater fish, which usually live in critical places such as rice fields, dirty and muddy fish ponds and swamps. Many catfish live in places that lack oxygen. These fish are also known as carnivores, because they eat small shrimp and worms. Catfish are also known as tough fish species, because they are equipped with an additional respiratory apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, which allows catfish to survive in polluted and dirty water conditions. This way of living and growing in such a dirty place has led to accusations that catfish contain cancer cells. However, currently, the catfish circulating in the market are not catfish that live in the wild. Currently, there are many catfish farming in ponds, by providing good quality feed and controlling the cleanliness of the pond so that it is free from pollution. According to data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP), catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. Meanwhile, catfish consumption according to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS) was recorded at 29.98 kg / capita / year, up from 22.58 kg/capita/year in 2004. In Jakarta no less than 6,000 pecel catfish stalls have been registered with the Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI). The popularity of catfish always increases every year. This is inseparable from the myriad benefits of this murmured fish meat. The nutritional content found in catfish is a cheap source of valuable protein. As we know protein is very necessary for the growth of the fetus in the womb. Even the nutrition contained in 2.5 kg of catfish is equivalent to the nutrition of 1 kg of beef. The high phosphorus in catfish meat adds to the benefits of the fish, especially for pregnant women and their fetuses. In addition to phosphorus, potassium and sodium in catfish are also useful as the best food source for the heart and blood vessels. By regularly consuming catfish, it helps the heart work in pregnant women so that the blood will be pumped properly. The allegation that there are cancer cells in catfish cannot be believed to be true, this is reinforced by the statement of cancer experts from the Indonesian Oncology Association. Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish can choice trigger cancer, said dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SpB (K) Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association.
berita_id: Ikan lele adalah ikan air tawar, yang biasanya tinggal di tempat -tempat kritis seperti sawah, kolam ikan yang kotor dan berlumpur dan rawa -rawa.Banyak ikan lele tinggal di tempat -tempat yang kekurangan oksigen.Ikan -ikan ini juga dikenal sebagai karnivora, karena mereka makan udang kecil dan cacing.Ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai spesies ikan yang tangguh, karena mereka dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, yang memungkinkan ikan lele untuk bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air yang tercemar dan kotor.Cara hidup dan tumbuh di tempat yang begitu kotor ini telah menyebabkan tuduhan bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker.Namun, saat ini, ikan lele yang beredar di pasar bukanlah ikan lele yang hidup di alam liar.Saat ini, ada banyak pertanian ikan lele di kolam, dengan memberikan pakan berkualitas baik dan mengendalikan kebersihan kolam sehingga bebas dari polusi.Menurut data dari Kementerian Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan (KKP), produksi ikan lele pada tahun 2013 mencapai 543.461 ton, peningkatan dari 441.217 ton pada 2012 dan 337.577 ton pada tahun 2011. Sementara itu, Capfish Consumption menurut Badan Statistik Sentral (bps) direkam di 29.9.KG/Capita/Tahun pada tahun 2004. Di Jakarta tidak kurang dari 6.000 kios lele PECEL telah terdaftar di Indonesian Street Vendors Association (APKLI).Popularitas ikan lele selalu meningkat setiap tahun.Ini tidak dapat dipisahkan dari berbagai manfaat daging ikan yang bergumam ini.Kandungan nutrisi yang ditemukan dalam ikan lele adalah sumber protein berharga yang murah.Seperti yang kita ketahui, protein sangat diperlukan untuk pertumbuhan janin di dalam rahim.Bahkan nutrisi yang terkandung dalam 2,5 kg ikan lele setara dengan nutrisi 1 kg daging sapi.Tingginya fosfor dalam daging ikan lele menambah manfaat ikan, terutama untuk wanita hamil dan janinnya.Selain fosfor, kalium dan natrium dalam lele juga berguna sebagai sumber makanan terbaik untuk pembuluh jantung dan darah.Dengan mengonsumsi ikan lele secara teratur, itu membantu jantung bekerja pada wanita hamil sehingga darah akan dipompa dengan benar.Tuduhan bahwa ada sel kanker dalam ikan lele tidak dapat diyakini benar, ini diperkuat oleh pernyataan para ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.Saat ini tidak ada penelitian yang menyatakan bahwa makan ikan lele dapat memicu kanker, kata Dr.Dradjat R Suardi, SPB (K) Onk, seorang ahli kanker dari Asosiasi Onkologi Indonesia.

berita: Cianjur Regent Irvan Rivano Muchtar will prohibit Cianjur residents, especially young people, from playing the online game Pokemon GO. The reason is that the meaning contained in the game is contrary to the beliefs of the majority of the population of Cianjur and is considered dangerous. According to Irvan, one of the game applications on smartphones based on Android and iOS is indeed being loved by game lovers, especially young people. However, according to Irvan, the meaning of the word "Pokemon" in one language is "I am Jewish". "Obviously this is an acknowledgment of people who oppress our brothers, such as the Palestinians. It is also against religious teachings," he said, Tuesday, July 19 2016. Irvan said the Cianjur Regency Government is currently only urging smartphone users not to play Pokemon GO, which was recently officially launched in America and will only be inaugurated in Indonesia in the near future. "Now it's just an appeal, but maybe later it will be banned if it doesn't educate and is dangerous," he said. Irvan added, from some of the news circulating, Pokemon GO can cause accidents. Games that require users to get out of the house and walk to find Pokemon will disrupt concentration on the road. "Indeed there has been no dangerous research or not. But, what is clear, it is better to anticipate before all these bad things happen," he said. The Commander of the Military District 0608 Cianjur, Lieutenant Colonel Armed Imam Haryadi, has even issued a ban for his members from playing the Pokemon GO game, especially at headquarters. According to him, the GPS-based game will record complete location data so that it is feared that it will be misused. Imam explained that Pokemon GO is a three-dimensional and presently GPS-based game. When used, the game will record the search location data for the monster. If the recorded data goes to other parties and is used for certain purposes, it is very dangerous. "So we forbid all members of the TNI, from the Kodim, Koramil, down to them, from playing, especially inside the TNI headquarters," he said.
berita_id: Bupati Cianjur Irvan Rivano Muchtar akan melarang penduduk Cianjur, terutama orang -orang muda, dari bermain game online Pokemon Go.Alasannya adalah bahwa makna yang terkandung dalam permainan ini bertentangan dengan keyakinan mayoritas populasi Cianjur dan dianggap berbahaya.Menurut Irvan, salah satu aplikasi game di smartphone berdasarkan Android dan iOS memang dicintai oleh pecinta game, terutama orang muda.Namun, menurut Irvan, arti kata "pokemon" dalam satu bahasa adalah "Saya orang Yahudi"."Jelas ini adalah pengakuan terhadap orang -orang yang menindas saudara -saudara kita, seperti Palestina. Ini juga bertentangan dengan ajaran agama," katanya, Selasa, 19 Juli 2016. Irvan mengatakan pemerintah Cianjur Regency saat ini hanya mendesak pengguna ponsel cerdas untuk tidak bermain Pokemon Go, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan ada di Indonesia di Indonesia di The Losing, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi."Sekarang ini hanya banding, tapi mungkin nanti akan dilarang jika tidak mendidik dan berbahaya," katanya.Irvan menambahkan, dari beberapa berita yang beredar, Pokemon Go dapat menyebabkan kecelakaan.Game yang mengharuskan pengguna keluar dari rumah dan berjalan untuk menemukan Pokemon akan mengganggu konsentrasi di jalan."Memang belum ada penelitian yang berbahaya atau tidak. Tapi, apa yang jelas, lebih baik mengantisipasi sebelum semua hal buruk ini terjadi," katanya.Komandan Distrik Militer 0608 Cianjur, Letnan Kolonel Bersenjata Imam Haryadi, bahkan telah mengeluarkan larangan bagi para anggotanya untuk bermain game Pokemon Go, terutama di markas.Menurutnya, game berbasis GPS akan merekam data lokasi yang lengkap sehingga ditakuti bahwa itu akan disalahgunakan.Imam menjelaskan bahwa Pokemon Go adalah game tiga dimensi dan saat ini berbasis GPS.Saat digunakan, game akan merekam data lokasi pencarian untuk monster.Jika data yang direkam pergi ke pihak lain dan digunakan untuk tujuan tertentu, itu sangat berbahaya."Jadi kami melarang semua anggota TNI, dari Kodim, Koramil, hingga mereka, dari bermain, terutama di dalam markas TNI," katanya.

berita: The Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia assessed that the burning of reog carried out by the connexion Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao City, Philippines, could not be justified. The reason is there are other ways that can be taken to deal with the obsolete reog. "If he is old, can't he be put in a museum for learning, that should be the case," said Chairman of the Reog Ponorogo Association throughout Indonesia, Begug Purnomosidi when contacted by Republika.co.id, Monday (2/11). The Indonesian people should respect their own arts and culture. Neighboring countries, Begug said, want to make Reog Ponorogo as an art. "We who have Reog Ponorogo are even like that, this is not right," he said. The association will immediately find out what the real reason is and what responsibility the Ministry of Foreign Affairs has given regarding this incident. "We feel uncomfortable, which is clearly offended," he said. . Tomorrow, Begug and his colleagues will meet with the Ministry of Foreign Affairs to clarify the problem. In addition, the Consulate General in Davao City must apologize to the Indonesian people, especially the Reog Ponorogo lovers for their actions. Begug himself learned of the arson incident from his friends and Youtube on Saturday (31/10). He hopes that Reog Ponorogo can be recognized internationally as Indonesia's cultural heritage so that it is not recognized by other countries. "We will fight so that Reog Ponorogo is recognized by Unesco as a nation's heritage, just like batik," he said.
berita_id: Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia menilai bahwa pembakaran reog yang dilakukan oleh Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Kota Davao, Filipina, tidak dapat dibenarkan.Alasannya adalah ada cara lain yang dapat diambil untuk menangani reog yang sudah usang."Jika dia sudah tua, tidak bisakah dia dimasukkan ke dalam museum untuk belajar, itu seharusnya terjadi," kata ketua Asosiasi Reog Ponorogo di seluruh Indonesia, Purnomosidi Begug ketika dihubungi oleh Republika.co.id, Senin (2/11).Orang -orang Indonesia harus menghormati seni dan budaya mereka sendiri.Negara -negara tetangga, kata Begug, ingin menjadikan Reog Ponorogo sebagai seni."Kami yang telah reog Ponorogo bahkan seperti itu, ini tidak benar," katanya.Asosiasi akan segera mencari tahu apa alasan sebenarnya dan tanggung jawab apa yang diberikan oleh Kementerian Luar Negeri mengenai insiden ini."Kami merasa tidak nyaman, yang jelas tersinggung," katanya..Besok, Begug dan rekan -rekannya akan bertemu dengan Kementerian Luar Negeri untuk mengklarifikasi masalahnya.Selain itu, Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao harus meminta maaf kepada rakyat Indonesia, terutama pecinta Ponorogo yang reog atas tindakan mereka.Begug sendiri mengetahui insiden pembakaran dari teman -temannya dan YouTube pada hari Sabtu (31/10).Dia berharap bahwa Reog Ponorogo dapat diakui secara internasional sebagai warisan budaya Indonesia sehingga tidak diakui oleh negara lain."Kami akan bertarung sehingga Reog Ponorogo diakui oleh UNESCO sebagai warisan bangsa, seperti Batik," katanya.

berita: On social networks, there is a lot of information circulating that mentions catfish as the filthiest fish. In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3000 cancer cells. The news made catfish cultivators in East Java (East Java) offended and devastated. the nickname as the filthiest fish refers to the nature of catfish that likes to consume various types of waste in the waters. Even an article that is quite viral on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China. That's not true. "Pity catfish farmers, they are offended and very saddened by the news," said Head of the Fisheries and Marine Service of East Java Province, Heru Tjahjono, Saturday (31/10/2015). He said that the news that actually describes catfish cultivation in Haikou City, China is not the same as catfish cultivation in East Java. The news could have an impact on the catfish market in East Java. The reason is, the catfish market is a consumer in the lower middle class level II. While snapper, tuna, mackerel, grouper at level I upper middle class. Heru said, consumers at level I division are difficult to shake with the issue of the fish they consume. This is different from the issue of fish such as catfish, gourami, mujahir, which are food for middle to lower-class level II consumers. For level I consumers, it is difficult to be shaken by issues. In contrast to level II consumers. If there is an issue, level II consumers can be afraid and don't want to consume, he said.
berita_id: Di jejaring sosial, ada banyak informasi yang beredar yang menyebutkan ikan lele sebagai ikan paling kotor.Dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Berita itu membuat para pembudidaya lele di Jawa Timur (Jawa Timur) tersinggung dan hancur.Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka mengonsumsi berbagai jenis limbah di perairan.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Itu tidak benar."Kasihan petani lele, mereka tersinggung dan sangat sedih dengan berita itu," kata kepala perikanan dan layanan kelautan provinsi Jawa Timur, Heru Tjahjono, Sabtu (31/10/2015).Dia mengatakan bahwa berita yang benar -benar menggambarkan budidaya ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina tidak sama dengan budidaya ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Berita itu dapat berdampak pada pasar ikan lele di Jawa Timur.Alasannya adalah, pasar lele adalah konsumen di tingkat kelas menengah II.Sedangkan kakap, tuna, mackerel, kerapu di kelas menengah atas level I.Heru mengatakan, konsumen di divisi Level I sulit untuk dikocok dengan masalah ikan yang mereka konsumsi.Ini berbeda dari masalah ikan seperti ikan lele, gourami, mujahir, yang merupakan makanan untuk konsumen kelas menengah ke bawah.Untuk konsumen Level I, sulit untuk dikocok oleh masalah.Berbeda dengan konsumen Level II.Jika ada masalah, konsumen Level II bisa takut dan tidak ingin mengkonsumsi, katanya.

berita: After a few weeks on the market and becoming the most sought after item by premium class gadget lovers, it turns out that there are some iPhone 6 users who feel disappointed with the product they bought at a fairly expensive price. There are some iPhone users who feel that the quality of the device they buy is far below the standard because they feel the iPhone 6 is soft and bends easily. The above is not just an issue or gossip. If you put your new iPhone in a trouser pocket without a protective case or try to squeeze it a little like you want to break a chocolate bar, you'll soon find out that the iPhone 6's body bends easily. If you don't feel willing to bend your own iPhone, there are many videos and pictures that you can download and view from the internet that show Apple's weakness. Due to the outpouring of disappointment from iPhone 6 users that is widely uploaded on YouTube and also reports that enter Apple, which says the body of the latest iPhone is much softer than its predecessor, Apple had to swallow the bitter pill by experiencing a decline in the value of Apple's shares by 3.8%. Apple's stock price dropped after a video of the bent iPhone went viral on YouTube. In addition, the video showing that the iPhone 6 is flabby and easy to bend is also exacerbated by the many reports stating that there are many errors in the iOS update from iOS 7 to iOS 8. The problems encountered include intermittent updates and also users of more than 5GB of space are only for updates, so many iPhone users have to delete some of the photo and video files they have. To avoid a wider issue, Apple then made a claim that the damage that occurred to the iPhone 6 which was claimed to be soft and easy to bend was rare when used normally. Apple claims that in 6 days of sale, there were only 9 consumers who contacted the iPhone because their product was bent, but Apple forgot that iPhones are sold worldwide and there are more users who don't know who to contact to get their iPhone replaced because indeed the damage is not included. warranty. Another issue related to the iPhone 6 flaccid and easy to bend issue is the iOS 8 update which is otherwise problematic. Many consumers are calling because they find an error detecting their fingerprint. Because of this, Apple then discontinued the distribution of iOS and released a new one a day later. When compared with competitors, the strength of the iPhone 6 is only half that of competing products such as Samsung and LG. Of the Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, HTC One M8, and iPHone, tested at 4.5KG, the ones that bring out curled right up were the iPhone 6 and M8, reports Consumer Reports.
berita_id: Setelah beberapa minggu di pasar dan menjadi yang paling dicari oleh pecinta gadget kelas premium, ternyata ada beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 yang merasa kecewa dengan produk yang mereka beli dengan harga yang cukup mahal.Ada beberapa pengguna iPhone yang merasa bahwa kualitas perangkat yang mereka beli jauh di bawah standar karena mereka merasa iPhone 6 mudah dan berbelok dengan mudah.Di atas bukan hanya masalah atau gosip.Jika Anda meletakkan iPhone baru Anda ke dalam saku celana tanpa kotak pelindung atau mencoba memerasnya sedikit seperti Anda ingin memecahkan cokelat, Anda akan segera mengetahui bahwa tubuh iPhone 6 dengan mudah membungkuk.Jika Anda tidak merasa mau menekuk iPhone Anda sendiri, ada banyak video dan gambar yang dapat Anda unduh dan lihat dari internet yang menunjukkan kelemahan Apple.Karena curahan kekecewaan dari pengguna iPhone 6 yang secara luas diunggah di YouTube dan juga melaporkan bahwa masuk Apple, yang mengatakan tubuh iPhone terbaru jauh lebih lembut daripada pendahulunya, Apple harus menelan pil pahit dengan mengalami penurunan nilai saham Apple sebesar 3,8%.Harga saham Apple turun setelah video iPhone bengkok menjadi viral di YouTube.Selain itu, video yang menunjukkan bahwa iPhone 6 lembek dan mudah ditekuk juga diperburuk oleh banyak laporan yang menyatakan bahwa ada banyak kesalahan dalam pembaruan iOS dari iOS 7 ke iOS 8. Masalah yang dihadapi termasuk pembaruan yang terputus -putus dan juga pengguna lebih dari 5GB ruang yang hanya untuk pembaruan, banyak pengguna iPhone harus menghapus beberapa file dan video yang dimiliki.Untuk menghindari masalah yang lebih luas, Apple kemudian membuat klaim bahwa kerusakan yang terjadi pada iPhone 6 yang diklaim lembut dan mudah ditekuk jarang terjadi jika digunakan secara normal.Apple mengklaim bahwa dalam 6 hari penjualan, hanya ada 9 konsumen yang menghubungi iPhone karena produk mereka bengkok, tetapi Apple lupa bahwa iPhone dijual di seluruh dunia dan ada lebih banyak pengguna yang tidak tahu siapa yang harus dihubungi untuk mengganti iPhone mereka karena memang kerusakan tidak termasuk.jaminan.Masalah lain yang terkait dengan iPhone 6 lembek dan masalah yang mudah ditekuk adalah pembaruan iOS 8 yang merupakan masalah.Banyak konsumen menelepon karena mereka menemukan kesalahan mendeteksi sidik jari mereka.Karena itu, Apple kemudian menghentikan distribusi iOS dan merilis yang baru sehari kemudian.Jika dibandingkan dengan pesaing, kekuatan iPhone 6 hanya setengah dari produk yang bersaing seperti Samsung dan LG.Dari Galaxy Note 3, LG G3, HTC One M8, dan iPhone, diuji pada 4,5kg, yang mengeluarkan keriting tepat adalah iPhone 6 dan M8, lapor konsumen.

berita: For culinary connoisseurs with catfish as the basic ingredient, this news is very sad, how not, this very delicious fish is considered a source of disease. Some of mobile phone the information we received from the public stated that catfish contained 3000 cancer cells. Catfish have a high enough life ability, it is equipped with an additional breathing apparatus called a labyrinth, so that the ability to live exceeds other fish. Catfish live in dirty, muddy and dirty places, catfish also eat waste and dirt, so public opinion says that catfish causes cancer. But for now, catfish cultivation is no longer carried out in dirty and dirty places, now catfish cultivation has been carried out in clean ponds, synthetic ponds with clean water, and the supply of food for catfish is also more secure. When viewed from the way of cooking / how to process it, catfish will taste more delicious if fried, but most of the catfish sellers use cooking oil to fry catfish, they use cooking oil repeatedly. Cooking oil that is used repeatedly until it is black in color will cause cancer. Therefore, it is not only catfish that causes cancer, any food if fried using used cooking oil will cause cancer cells in the human body. So the conclusion: who thinks that catfish contains cancer cells is not true, catfish does not cause cancer cells, but how to process it using used cooking oil is what causes cancer cells in the human body.
berita_id: Untuk penikmat kuliner dengan ikan lele sebagai bahan dasar, berita ini sangat menyedihkan, bagaimana tidak, ikan yang sangat lezat ini dianggap sebagai sumber penyakit.Beberapa ponsel informasi yang kami terima dari publik menyatakan bahwa ikan lele berisi 3000 sel kanker.Lele memiliki kemampuan hidup yang cukup tinggi, dilengkapi dengan alat pernapasan tambahan yang disebut labirin, sehingga kemampuan untuk hidup melebihi ikan lain.Lele hidup di tempat -tempat kotor, berlumpur dan kotor, ikan lele juga makan limbah dan kotoran, jadi opini publik mengatakan bahwa ikan lele menyebabkan kanker.Tetapi untuk saat ini, budidaya ikan lele tidak lagi dilakukan di tempat -tempat kotor dan kotor, sekarang budidaya ikan lele telah dilakukan di kolam bersih, kolam sintetis dengan air bersih, dan pasokan makanan untuk ikan lele juga lebih aman.Jika dilihat dari cara memasak / cara memprosesnya, ikan lele akan terasa lebih lezat jika digoreng, tetapi sebagian besar penjual ikan lele menggunakan minyak goreng untuk menggoreng ikan lele, mereka menggunakan minyak goreng berulang kali.Minyak goreng yang digunakan berulang kali sampai berwarna hitam akan menyebabkan kanker.Oleh karena itu, bukan hanya ikan lele yang menyebabkan kanker, makanan apa pun jika digoreng menggunakan minyak goreng bekas akan menyebabkan sel kanker dalam tubuh manusia.Jadi kesimpulannya: siapa yang berpikir bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker tidak benar, ikan lele tidak menyebabkan sel kanker, tetapi bagaimana memprosesnya menggunakan minyak goreng bekas adalah yang menyebabkan sel kanker dalam tubuh manusia.

berita: Jakarta – After receiving constant criticism from iPhone 6 Plus users, because the device is very easy to bend. Over time, Apple was 'frustrated' by the quote complaints of its consumers and immediately gave information regarding the problem while at the same time refuting the quality of the fragile body of the iPhone 6 Plus. Apple does admit that there are iPhone 6 Plus users who experience a curved body, but there aren't many. According to his spokesman, the number who complained because of this problem was only 9 people as of Wednesday (24/9). "iPhone 6 has a strong unibody with extra strength. This smartphone also has stainless steel and titanium to protect its body parts. Including, using the strongest glass in the smartphone industry," said an Apple spokesman, as quoted by CNBC, Friday (26/9). ). Apple continued that their workers carried out many tests to test the strength of the iPhone 6 Plus. However, until now it is not known why the body of the iPhone 6 Plus bends so easily.
berita_id: Jakarta - Setelah menerima kritik terus -menerus dari pengguna iPhone 6 Plus, karena perangkat ini sangat mudah ditekuk.Seiring waktu, Apple 'frustrasi' oleh keluhan kutipan dari konsumennya dan segera memberikan informasi mengenai masalah tersebut sementara pada saat yang sama membantah kualitas tubuh rapuh iPhone 6 Plus.Apple memang mengakui bahwa ada iPhone 6 Plus pengguna yang mengalami tubuh melengkung, tetapi tidak ada banyak.Menurut juru bicaranya, jumlah yang mengeluh karena masalah ini hanya 9 orang pada hari Rabu (24/9)."IPhone 6 memiliki unibody yang kuat dengan kekuatan ekstra. Smartphone ini juga memiliki stainless steel dan titanium untuk melindungi bagian -bagian tubuhnya. Termasuk, menggunakan kaca terkuat di industri smartphone," kata seorang juru bicara Apple, seperti dikutip oleh CNBC, Jumat (26/9).).Apple melanjutkan bahwa pekerja mereka melakukan banyak tes untuk menguji kekuatan iPhone 6 Plus.Namun, sampai sekarang tidak diketahui mengapa tubuh iPhone 6 plus tikungan dengan mudah.

berita: JAKARTA - The thin body of the latest iPhone has raised the issue that the phone is easy to bend. This rumor plagued the iPhone 6 Plus when it was launched last year. The phone which has a thickness of 7.1 millimeters failed the curved test test. Yes, in some test tests uploaded on Youtube sharing videos, the phone's body is curved when testing. So what about the iPhone 6s Plus? Has a thickness that is 0.2 millimeters thicker than its predecessor, is it able to pass the bending test? In heaviness a video released by FoneFox on Youtube, Apple's latest flagship is apparently able to pass the bend test. The examiner performs the bending test by hand. By placing both thumbs in the center of the iPhone 6s Plus body, then pulling the other eight fingers to the opposite side, it turns out that the phone body does not change shape. Even though the tester issued 30 to 100 percent strength, the phone which has a thickness of 7.3 millimeters does not look curved and remains in its original position. It didn't stop there, the examiner then asked his friend for help to do the bending test again. As a result, the two testers were unable to bend the iPhone 6s Plus. As is known, Apple embeds the aluminum 7000 Series which is claimed by Apple to be very strong and stable to accommodate the hardware of this device.
berita_id: JAKARTA - Tubuh tipis iPhone terbaru telah mengangkat masalah bahwa ponsel mudah ditekuk.Rumor ini mengganggu iPhone 6 Plus ketika diluncurkan tahun lalu.Telepon yang memiliki ketebalan 7,1 milimeter gagal uji uji melengkung.Ya, dalam beberapa tes tes yang diunggah di video berbagi YouTube, tubuh ponsel melengkung saat pengujian.Jadi bagaimana dengan iPhone 6s Plus?Apakah ketebalan yaitu 0,2 milimeter lebih tebal dari pendahulunya, apakah ia dapat lulus uji lentur?Dalam berat video yang dirilis oleh Fonefox di YouTube, andalan terbaru Apple tampaknya dapat lulus tes tikungan.Penguji melakukan tes lentur dengan tangan.Dengan menempatkan kedua jempol di tengah -tengah bodi iPhone 6s plus, kemudian menarik delapan jari lainnya ke sisi yang berlawanan, ternyata badan telepon tidak berubah bentuk.Meskipun penguji mengeluarkan kekuatan 30 hingga 100 persen, telepon yang memiliki ketebalan 7,3 milimeter tidak terlihat melengkung dan tetap berada dalam posisi aslinya.Itu tidak berhenti di situ, pemeriksa kemudian meminta bantuan temannya untuk melakukan tes tekukan lagi.Akibatnya, kedua penguji tidak dapat menekuk iPhone 6s Plus.Seperti diketahui, Apple menanamkan seri aluminium 7000 yang diklaim oleh Apple sangat kuat dan stabil untuk mengakomodasi perangkat keras perangkat ini.

berita: The president's salary, which is only around Rp. 62 million per month, is currently considered very low. The government plans to propose an increase in the president's salary so that it is worth Rp. 553 million per month. In the RPP, apart from the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience salary increases. The president's salary has skyrocketed because the calculation is based on an index of 1:12698 between the salaries of the lowest rank civil servants and those of the lowest rank civil servants. The highest income index for the president is simulated to reach 96000 so that he will earn an income of IDR 553.4 million per month. Meanwhile, the vice president (wapres) will receive an income of IDR 368.9 million per month from the previous basic salary of IDR 20 million. vice president salary based on income index 64000 With pe With this salary change, the monthly income of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will compete with the salaries of leaders in other countries. The extent of the salary comparison is in the info graphic. In the RPP, new salary proposals also appear for ministers, attorney general, commander of the TNI, chief of police, chairman of the MPR, chairman of the DPR, chairman of the DPD, chairman of the KPK, chairman of the BPK, chairman of the Supreme Court, and chairman of the Constitutional Court With an index calculation of 16000, their income is IDR 92.2 million per month Then for the deputy chairman of the MPR, DPR, DPD, KPK, BPK , MA, and MK, the income index is 15,333 and receives an income of Rp. 88.3 million per month. As for the deputy minister, deputy head of the National Police, members of the DPR, DPD members, BPK members, and Supreme Court justices, per month, they earn Rp. 80.7 million. With an income index of 14000, the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (Kemenpan RB) acknowledged the issue of the circulation of this RPP even though he stated that the proposal was not yet ripe. The Head of the Legal, Communication and Information Bureau Public Ormation Ke Menpan RB Herman Suryatman said that the information on the RPP was not valid. Herman said that the RPP was sourced from the discussion material held last year. "Those are simulation numbers that are not valid. 2017," he said in Jakarta yesterday. As is known, the RPP on the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants is a technical regulation of the Law on State Civil Apparatus (ASN). According to Herman, the presentation contains a simulation of the income of civil servants and other state officials. still needs further study. "Not only does it contain a simulation of the income of state officials, but also a lieutenant simulation of the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood," he said. Using a calculation index of 1:12698, the income of civil servants, both central and regional, will increase. regional officials such as governors governors, regents, mayors, provincial DPRD, and city regency DPRDs will also experience an increase. The governor will earn an income of IDR 76.8 million per month with an index of 13333 Then the deputy governor, regent mayor, and chairman of the provincial DPRD will earn income Rp. 73.2 million with an income index of 12698. Meanwhile, the deputy regent/mayor, deputy chairman of the provincial DPRD, and the chairman of the Regency/City DPRD have a salary of Rp. 69.7 million per month with an income index of 12094. The province which has an income index of 11518 has a monthly salary of Rp. 66.3 million. Lastly, for members of the district and city DPRD, the salary to be earned is Rp. 63.3 million with an income index of 10969. Public policy expert at the University of Padjadjaran (Unpad) Yogi Suprayogi assessed, even though it is only a simulation, the salary increase for state officials is irrelevant. He said the current salary earned by state officials is sufficient. There is an additional operational allowance. That's big. It's what he likes. No need to grow it. It's irrelevant," he said. According to him, if there must be an increase, the salaries of the president and central officials must be adjusted to the inflation rate. "We are also not a developed country. Singapore could reach Rp 10 billion," he said. Yogi said, rather than an increase in the salaries of state officials, improving the salaries of civil servants is considered more important at this time. currently still discussing the technical rules of the ASN Law, one of which is the RPP on Salaries and Allowances Yogi emphasized the importance of changing the salary scheme of civil servants. Among the three things, Yogi requested that the basic salary be increased more than and performance allowances Currently the basic salary is smaller so that many civil servants go here and there to increase their performance allowances. Expensive allowances must be greater than the other two components so that teachers are willing to be placed in remote areas. In addition, he also highlighted that performance allowances must be based on performance. He warned not to other countries pay salaries based on level of education Salary provision in some countries is also partly based on performance In the United States, the salary of civil servants in the Department of State ranges from USD88000 to USD96000 per year However, the lowest government employee salary is USD18785 per year Fri There are 2.79 million civil servants in Uncle Sam's country. The salary of the US president is around USD 400,000. The presidential salary increase was very drastic in 2001. Previously, the president's salary was only USD 200,000. Malaysian Prime Minister (PM) Najib Razak gave an annual bonus in 2018 to government employees who In addition, he provides a pension of 1000 ringgit per month for those who have served for 25 years. The salary of Malaysian civil servants who serve 14 years is around 36000 ringgit and those who have served for more than 1019 years get an income of 70753 ringgit. new civil servants working in Singapore reach 3,000 Singapore dollars per month For managerial positions earn around 8,000 Singapore dollars The number of employees in Singapore reaches 84,000 people According to Thomas Friedman of the New York Times, civil servants in Singapore are among the most efficient and uncorruptible bureaucrats “They have high standards of discipline and accountability,” said Friedman

The Head of the Public Information Section of the National Police, Kombes Pol. Martinus Sitompul, emphasized that the issue of the throwing good afternoon of the holy book of the Koran by the guard at the Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba Branch, Central Jakarta on Friday, was not true. "It is not true that the Koran was thrown by the guard," said Kombes Martinus in a text message, Friday night. Martinus explained that what happened was that the guard checked a number of books and objects in the detention cell. According to him, the riot that occurred on Friday afternoon was triggered by the inmates who did not accept the officers' search of their rooms. "The turmoil that occurred was a reaction to the actions taken by guard officers who confiscated cell phones belonging to Block C detainees," he said. During the search, four cell phones belonging to four terrorist convicts were found, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam and Jumali. A number of angry Block B and Block C inmates then broke the cell door. Not only that, a number of facilities at the Salemba detention center were also damaged, including the gates of Block B and Block C hallways and their windows. Martinus added, "The detention center is conducive and the prisoners are calm," he said.
berita_id: Kepala Bagian Informasi Publik Polisi Nasional, Kombes Pol.Martinus Sitompul, menekankan bahwa masalah pelemparan sore yang baik dari kitab suci Alquran oleh penjaga di cabang Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba, Jakarta Tengah pada hari Jumat, tidak benar."Tidak benar bahwa Alquran dilemparkan oleh penjaga," kata Kombes Martinus dalam sebuah pesan teks, Jumat malam.Martinus menjelaskan bahwa apa yang terjadi adalah bahwa penjaga memeriksa sejumlah buku dan objek di sel penahanan.Menurutnya, kerusuhan yang terjadi pada hari Jumat sore dipicu oleh para tahanan yang tidak menerima pencarian petugas di kamar mereka."Gejolak yang terjadi adalah reaksi terhadap tindakan yang diambil oleh petugas penjaga yang menyita telepon seluler milik tahanan blok C," katanya.Selama pencarian, empat ponsel milik empat narapidana teroris ditemukan, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam dan Jumali.Sejumlah narapidana Blok B dan Blok C kemudian memecahkan pintu sel.Tidak hanya itu, sejumlah fasilitas di Salemba Detention Center juga rusak, termasuk gerbang blok B dan lorong blok C dan jendela mereka.Martinus menambahkan, "Pusat penahanan kondusif dan para tahanan tenang," katanya.

berita: The Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Retno LP Marsudi, confirmed that the news that Reog Ponorogo was deliberately set on fire at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) office in Davao, Philippines, was not entirely true. "Reog and gamelan ornaments in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were damaged and infested with termites," said Retno via text message, Saturday, October 31, 2015. For information, several media outlets had published news stating that officials at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao had allowed people to burn Indonesian cultural products. because it is considered idol worship. It was reported that the Reog and the dragon headdress were burned on 20 October 2015 in the courtyard of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao with the help of two security guards. "Reog has october been damaged so it has nothing to do with the notion of worshiping idols," said Retno.
berita_id: Menteri Luar Negeri Indonesia, Retno LP Marsudi, mengkonfirmasi bahwa berita bahwa Reog Ponorogo sengaja dibakar di Kantor Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Davao, Filipina, tidak sepenuhnya benar."Ornamen reog dan gamelan dalam bentuk naga kepala dibakar karena mereka rusak dan terinfeksi rayap," kata Retno melalui pesan teks, Sabtu, 31 Oktober 2015. Sebagai informasi, beberapa media telah menerbitkan berita yang menyatakan bahwa pejabat di konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao telah mengizinkan orang untuk membakar produk -produk budaya Indonesia.Karena itu dianggap sebagai penyembahan berhala.Dilaporkan bahwa REOG dan HEADDRESS Naga dibakar pada 20 Oktober 2015 di halaman Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao dengan bantuan dua penjaga keamanan."Reog telah Oktober telah rusak sehingga tidak ada hubungannya dengan gagasan menyembah berhala," kata Retno.

berita: Jakarta - Some iPhone 6 Plus users report that Apple's latest gadget is easy to bend. Allegedly this is because the design of the iPhone 6 Plus is so thin and large in size. The internet users who are fad also make it a subject of ridicule. One of the images circulating on  the internet displays a photo of the iPhone 6 in a curved state. In this parody image, it is written that the aluminum material in the iPhone 6 is something revolutionary so that it can be bent. "Apple's revolutionary patent allows users to have a better viewing experience by curving it," the caption reads. The iPhone 6 Plus easy to bend problem has been reported by several users, complete with photos. As told by a Macrumors Forum user named Hanzon. He admitted that it took him a long time to put the iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket. At least 4 hours the device is in the pocket. While in the pants, Hanzon did not take out the iPhone 6 Plus and continued his usual activities as usual. As a result, he found the middle of his new smartphone was a bit 'bent'.
berita_id: Jakarta - Beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus melaporkan bahwa gadget terbaru Apple mudah ditekuk.Diduga ini karena desain iPhone 6 Plus sangat tipis dan besar.Pengguna Internet yang Mantik juga menjadikannya subjek ejekan.Salah satu gambar yang beredar di internet menampilkan foto iPhone 6 dalam keadaan melengkung.Dalam gambar parodi ini, tertulis bahwa bahan aluminium di iPhone 6 adalah sesuatu yang revolusioner sehingga dapat ditekuk."Paten revolusioner Apple memungkinkan pengguna untuk memiliki pengalaman menonton yang lebih baik dengan melengkung," tulisan itu berbunyi.Masalah iPhone 6 Plus Easy to Bend telah dilaporkan oleh beberapa pengguna, lengkap dengan foto.Seperti yang diceritakan oleh pengguna forum MacRumors bernama Hanzon.Dia mengakui bahwa butuh waktu lama baginya untuk menempatkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depannya.Setidaknya 4 jam perangkat ada di saku.Saat berada di celana, Hanzon tidak mengeluarkan iPhone 6 Plus dan melanjutkan kegiatannya yang biasa seperti biasa.Akibatnya, ia menemukan bagian tengah smartphone barunya sedikit 'bengkok'.

berita: The riot occurred at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, Friday (10/11) afternoon. A number of buildings were damaged. So far there are two versions of the cause of the event. Which one is true? The first version is circulating on social media. It was stated that the detainees who were charged with terrorism cases were angry to hear the news that there were guards who were suspected of harassing the Al-Qur'an and the books of the clerics belonging to the detainees. "Densus and the warden arrogantly entered the Ikhwan's room and the Koran was stepped on by Brimob, the warden and Densus finally caused the ikhwans to go on a rampage and destroy the Brimob mako detention room, the current situation is still tense..." The excerpt was released on social media as reported by from Panjimas. The second version came from the Head of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Public Relations Division, Kombes Martinus Sitompul. According to him, the issue of harassment of the Qur'an is a hoax. "It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard officers, there were officers conducting an examination of the books and objects in the cell. Currently the condition of the detention house is conducive and the residents of the detention center are calm," he said as written by Detik. .
