Minister of Finance (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani emphasized that the government did not prepare a plan to increase the president's salary. In fact, according to him, the government did not discuss the plan to increase the president's salary at all. "It does not exist and has never been plan discussed. So, we have no discussion about it at all, absolutely nothing," said Sri Mulyani at the Presidential Palace Complex, Bogor, West Java, Monday (12/3). Sri Mulyani said, in the current technology era, there are so many people who spread information that is not necessarily true. "In the current era of social media, a lot of information is produced, and documents that are made seem to be similar to the government, then published," he explained. the salary of civil servants, the Minister of Finance said that the government would prepare it according to the note on the report submitted to the DPR. In the 2019 RKP and 2019 RAPBN, we will design according to what we have conveyed to the council," he said. month and vice president is Rp. 368948462 per month. The current salary of the president is known to be very far from the figure of Rp. 500 million. The current basic salary of the president is only around Rp. 30240000 per month. This is in accordance with Article 2 of Law Number 7 of 1978, which states that the president's salary is six times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK) Meanwhile, in PP No. 75/2000 it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. president, which reached Rp. 32500000 Thus, the president received a salary of Rp. 62740000 per month
berita_id: Menteri Keuangan (Menkeu) Sri Mulyani menekankan bahwa pemerintah tidak menyiapkan rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden.Bahkan, menurutnya, pemerintah tidak membahas rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden sama sekali."Itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah direncanakan dibahas. Jadi, kami tidak berdiskusi sama sekali, sama sekali tidak ada," kata Sri Mulyani di Kompleks Istana Presiden, Bogor, Jawa Barat, Senin (12/3).Sri Mulyani mengatakan, di era teknologi saat ini, ada begitu banyak orang yang menyebarkan informasi yang belum tentu benar."Di era media sosial saat ini, banyak informasi diproduksi, dan dokumen yang dibuat tampaknya mirip dengan pemerintah, kemudian diterbitkan," jelasnya.Gaji pegawai negeri, Menteri Keuangan mengatakan bahwa pemerintah akan menyiapkannya sesuai dengan catatan pada laporan yang diajukan ke DPR.Dalam RKP 2019 dan RAPBN 2019, kami akan merancang sesuai dengan apa yang telah kami sampaikan kepada dewan, "katanya. Bulan dan wakil presiden adalah Rp. 368948462 per bulan. Gaji presiden saat ini diketahui sangat jauh dari angka 700 dari 500 juta ini.Gaji Presiden adalah enam kali lipat dari pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK) sementara itu, di PP No.75/2000 dinyatakan bahwa tiga pejabat menerima gaji RP 5040000 per bulan

berita: Recently, the city of Surabaya was shocked by the discovery of pacifiers in bottles suspected of containing drugs. With this discovery information, the Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP) of Surabaya City conducted raids in 14 sub-districts and confiscated hundreds of these candy pacifiers. "The raid was held for two days, March 6 to 7. On the first day, 345 bottles of candy suspected of containing drugs were confiscated," said Head of Surabaya City Satpol PP, Irvan Widiyanto, Wednesday (8/3/2017). The 14 sub-districts that were targeted for the raid were the sub-districts of Gunung Anyar, Simokerto, Gubeng, Bulak, Tandes, Jambangan, Tenggilis Mejoyo, Tambak sari, Sukolilo, Sambi Kerep, Sawahan, Karang Pilang, Wiyung, and Pabean Cantikan. is still being tested in the laboratory. "A total of 345 bottles were obtained and laboratory tests are still being carried out," said Irvan. The locations targeted for the raids were hawkers and grocery stores near the elementary school (SD). The raid was carried out after it was found that students skipped school examine in the East Surabaya area last week. The elementary school student felt dizzy after consuming pacifiers. "Satpol PP also cooperates with Pusksemas in each sub-district. So that testing can be carried out immediately when the candy is found," he explained. Meanwhile, the Head of the Surabaya City National Narcotics Agency (BNNK), AKBP Suparti, asked the public to calm down and not panic over the incident. His party has also dispatched a team after receiving information on the pacifier candy which is suspected to contain the drug. "This is still a guess. It will be confirmed later after the Lab test. At the earliest, this test can be known in the next three days," he said briefly.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, kota Surabaya terkejut dengan penemuan dot dalam botol yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Dengan informasi penemuan ini, Unit Kepolisian Dinas Sipil (SATPOL PP) dari Kota Surabaya melakukan penggerebekan di 14 sub-distrik dan menyita ratusan dot permen ini."Serangan itu diadakan selama dua hari, 6 hingga 7 Maret. Pada hari pertama, 345 botol permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan disita," kata kepala Surabaya City Satpol PP, Irvan Widiyanto, Rabu (8/3/2017).Ke-14 sub-distrik yang ditargetkan untuk serangan itu adalah sub-distrik Gunung Anyar, Simokerto, Gubeng, Bulak, Tandes, Jambangan, Tenggilis Mejoyo, Tambak Sari, Sukolilo, Sambi Kerep, Sawahan, Karang Pilan, Wiyung, dan Paban.masih diuji di laboratorium."Sebanyak 345 botol diperoleh dan tes laboratorium masih dilakukan," kata Irvan.Lokasi yang ditargetkan untuk penggerebekan adalah penjaja dan toko kelontong di dekat Sekolah Dasar (SD).Serangan itu dilakukan setelah ditemukan bahwa siswa melewatkan pemeriksaan sekolah di daerah Surabaya Timur minggu lalu.Siswa sekolah dasar merasa pusing setelah mengonsumsi dot."Satpol PP juga bekerja sama dengan Pusksemas di setiap sub-distrik. Sehingga pengujian dapat dilakukan segera ketika permen ditemukan," jelasnya.Sementara itu, kepala Badan Narkotika Nasional Kota Surabaya (BNNK), AKBP Suparti, meminta masyarakat untuk tenang dan tidak panik atas insiden tersebut.Partainya juga telah mengirim tim setelah menerima informasi tentang permen dot yang diduga mengandung obat."Ini masih dugaan. Ini akan dikonfirmasi nanti setelah tes laboratorium. Paling awal, tes ini dapat diketahui dalam tiga hari ke depan," katanya sebentar.

berita: News about the Traveloka application being blocked has surfaced recently. The call to uninstall this application has recently been widely discussed on social networks. Initially, this call emerged when a pianist named Ananda Sukarlan walked out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan delivered his speech. At that time Anies was delivering his speech in celebration of the 90th anniversary of Kanisius College at the Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran. It is well known that Ananda Sukarlan himself is one of the alumni of Kanisius College. With the action he did, namely by walking out when Anies gave a speech, it was also followed by a number of other alumni. One of the people who are said to support Ananda's walk out is the founder and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma. Derianto is considered to have supported Ananda's actions by shaking hands and congratulating him. The action taken by Derianto also resulted in the call to uninstall Traveloka and the company gave a response. Traveloka stated that one of the bosses did not attend the Kanisius College celebration because he was leaving the city. According to a clarification made by Traveloka, Derinato had planned to go overseas for several months and was unable to attend the Kanisius Alumni event. “We are proud that one of our founders, Mr. Derianto Kusuma, received an award from Aumni Kanisius. However, Mr. Derianto could not attend because he was on an official trip out of town and it had been planned several months ago,” said Traveloka. Meanwhile, the news circulating, namely Traveloka's CTO support for the pianist named Ananda, lotion was also clarified. Traveloka stated that the company always puts the values ​​of mutual respect for one another. This is also applied to all employees and leadership stakeholders. 'Traveloka is a company founded by the sons and daughters of the Indonesian people who prioritize the values ​​of mutual respect, tolerance and innovation. We always apply these values ​​to all employees. This is at the same time responding to issues surrounding Anies' speech at the 90th Celebration of Kanisius College, which closed Traveloka.
berita_id: Berita tentang aplikasi Traveloka yang diblokir telah muncul baru -baru ini.Panggilan untuk menghapus instalan aplikasi ini baru -baru ini telah dibahas secara luas di jejaring sosial.Awalnya, panggilan ini muncul ketika seorang pianis bernama Ananda Sukarlan berjalan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta, Anies Baswedan menyampaikan pidatonya.Pada waktu itu Anies menyampaikan pidatonya untuk merayakan peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College di Jakarta International Expo Kemayoran.Sudah diketahui bahwa Ananda Sukarlan sendiri adalah salah satu alumni Kanisius College.Dengan tindakan yang dia lakukan, yaitu dengan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidato, itu juga diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lainnya.Salah satu orang yang dikatakan mendukung Ananda's Walk Out adalah pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma.DeRianto dianggap mendukung tindakan Ananda dengan berjabat tangan dan memberi selamat padanya.Tindakan yang diambil oleh DeRianto juga menghasilkan panggilan untuk menghapus instalan Traveloka dan perusahaan memberikan tanggapan.Traveloka menyatakan bahwa salah satu bos tidak menghadiri perayaan Kanisius College karena dia meninggalkan kota.Menurut klarifikasi yang dibuat oleh Traveloka, DeRinato telah merencanakan untuk pergi ke luar negeri selama beberapa bulan dan tidak dapat menghadiri acara alumni Kanisius.“Kami bangga bahwa salah satu pendiri kami, Mr. DeRianto Kusuma, menerima penghargaan dari Aumni Kanisius. Namun, Mr. DeRianto tidak dapat hadir karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi di luar kota dan telah direncanakan beberapa bulan yang lalu,” kata Traveloka.Sementara itu, berita yang beredar, yaitu dukungan CTO Traveloka untuk pianis bernama Ananda, Lotion juga diklarifikasi.Traveloka menyatakan bahwa perusahaan selalu memberikan nilai -nilai saling menghormati satu sama lain.Ini juga diterapkan untuk semua karyawan dan pemangku kepentingan kepemimpinan.'Traveloka adalah perusahaan yang didirikan oleh putra dan putri orang -orang Indonesia yang memprioritaskan nilai -nilai saling menghormati, toleransi, dan inovasi.Kami selalu menerapkan nilai -nilai ini untuk semua karyawan.Ini pada saat yang sama menanggapi isu -isu seputar pidato anies di perayaan ke -90 Kanisius College, yang menutup Traveloka.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. Quoted from the official release of the Deputy for Protocol, Press and Media of the State Secretariat Bey Machmudin, the certainty was revealed after the Minister of Finance Sri Mulyani Indrawati confirmed this in front of the audience. journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace, West Java on Monday (12/03) It does not exist and has never been discussed, he explained. that currently there is indeed a lot of information and documents circulating as if they came from president a government institution What the Minister of State says (in social media) is a hoax. In today's social media there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published, he explained. , widely circulated on social media regarding the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia In this issue, it is stated that the President will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. The Vice President is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Dikutip dari rilis resmi Deputi untuk Protokol, Pers dan Media Sekretariat Negara Bey Machmudin, kepastian itu terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan hadirin.Wartawan di Bogor Presidential Palace, Jawa Barat pada hari Senin (12/03) itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah dibahas, jelasnya.Bahwa saat ini memang ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar seolah -olah mereka berasal dari presiden sebuah lembaga pemerintah apa yang dikatakan Menteri Negara (di media sosial) adalah tipuan.Di media sosial saat ini ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan, jelasnya., secara luas diedarkan di media sosial mengenai rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dalam masalah ini, dinyatakan bahwa presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga RP.553422694 per bulan.Wakil presiden dikatakan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji RP.368948462 per bulan

berita: The Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao, Philippines, received protests from the public regarding the reog and gamelan decorations that were burned there. Therefore, the Consulate General in Davao gave an explanation regarding the burning that was carried out. "On October 20, 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City was forced to destroy Ponorogo reog which has been an asset of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao since 1988. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because Ponorogo reog was in a damaged condition and eaten by termites," as written in a statement by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao that received by merdeka.com, this morning, Saturday (31/10). Minister of Foreign Affairs Retno L. P. Marsudi also confirmed that the burning was carried out because it was already and infested with termites. "Reog and gamelan decorations in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were damaged and full of termites," said Foreign Minister Retno in a short message. Several media had reported about the burning of these cultural assets. There are even media who say that the burning of cultural assets is because it is considered an idol corrode and the procession of exorcising spirits. The Consulate General in Davao himself said that the burning that was carried out was not an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao to damage or even eliminate cultural assets. "The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The Consulate General in Davao City also wants to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to expel idols or spirits," continued the statement from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The statement also stated that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao was communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new Ponorogo reog.
berita_id: Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, menerima protes dari publik mengenai dekorasi reog dan gamelan yang dibakar di sana.Oleh karena itu, konsulat jenderal di Davao memberikan penjelasan tentang pembakaran yang dilakukan."On October 20, 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City was forced to destroy Ponorogo reog which has been an asset of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao since 1988. The destruction by burning had to be carried out because Ponorogo reog was in a damaged condition and eaten by termites," as written in a statement by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao that received by merdeka.com, this morning, Saturday(31/10).Menteri Luar Negeri Retno L. P. Marsudi juga mengkonfirmasi bahwa pembakaran dilakukan karena sudah dan terinfeksi rayap."Dekorasi reog dan gamelan dalam bentuk kepala naga dibakar karena mereka rusak dan penuh rayap," kata Menteri Luar Negeri Retno dalam pesan singkat.Beberapa media telah melaporkan tentang pembakaran aset budaya ini.Bahkan ada media yang mengatakan bahwa pembakaran aset budaya adalah karena dianggap sebagai korode idola dan prosesi pengusiran roh.Konsulat jenderal di Davao sendiri mengatakan bahwa pembakaran yang dilakukan bukanlah upaya oleh konsulat jenderal di Davao untuk merusak atau bahkan menghilangkan aset budaya."Penghancuran aset -aset ini telah dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan rasa hormat penuh terhadap Reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya. Konsulat jenderal di Kota Davao juga ingin menekankan bahwa pembakaran sama sekali tidak ada hubungannya dengan upaya untuk mengeluarkan berhala atau roh," lanjut pernyataan dari konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao.Pernyataan itu juga menyatakan bahwa Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao berkomunikasi dengan partai -partai di Indonesia untuk mencari Ponorogo Reog baru.

berita: The Special Detachment (Densus) 88 Anti-Terror Police Headquarters is investigating the alleged ISIS flag in the midst of the riots that occurred at the Brimob Mako Terrorist Prison a few days ago. "(The issue of the suspected ISIS flag) is being investigated by Densus friends. Therefore, it is the authority of the Densus friends even though they are in Brimob who guard the Densus," said the Head of the Public Relations Division of the Police, Inspector General Pol Setyo Wasisto, to reporters at the National Police Headquarters, Jakarta. South, Monday (13/11). Setyo also straightened out the issue related to the cause of the riot due to the throwing of the holy Qur'an by the guard at the Mako Brimob Rutan, Kelapa logic gate Dua, Depok. "It's been clarified that it's not true. There were those who spread (hoaxes) that it threw away the Koran, it didn't exist. What was there was a sweeping after praying. A cellphone was found. Asked for a cellphone, angry," said Setyo. In addition, Setyo explained that in the riots there were no burnings but only acts of vandalism carried out by the inmates. "Nothing, just prisoners destroying detention facilities," concluded Setyo. Last Friday (10/11) there was a commotion at the Brimob Mako Terrorist Prison, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Salemba Rutan branch at around 16.00 pm. Karo Penmas Public Relations Division of the National Police Headquarters Brigadier General Pol Rikhwanto said that the riot was carried out by terrorist prisoners and damaged the prison facilities. "The prison cell door was broken into, the gate of the block hallway, the window glass in block C and block B," said Rikwanto through his official release. The riots, continued Rikhwanto, began after Friday prayers when the prisoners were brought into the cells. After that, the members of the Densus picket conducted a search in rooms A.5 and C5 (RB). From the room, four cellphones were found belonging to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam and Jumali. "One of the detainees did not accept it and provoked the officers with various kinds of words, then some members were provoked by their words," said Rikwanto. Then finally the prisoner screamed so that it provoked the other inmates in the block next to him. To condition the situation, members of the Pioneer Unit III picket fired shots into the air as well as warning the prisoners.
berita_id: Detasemen Khusus (Densus) 88 Kantor Polisi Anti-Teror sedang menyelidiki dugaan bendera ISIS di tengah-tengah kerusuhan yang terjadi di penjara teroris Brimob Mako beberapa hari yang lalu."(Masalah yang dicurigai bendera ISIS) sedang diselidiki oleh teman -teman Densus. Oleh karena itu, itu adalah otoritas teman -teman Densus meskipun mereka berada di Brimob yang menjaga densus," kata kepala divisi hubungan publik polisi, inspektur jenderal Pol Setyo Wasisto, kepada wartawan di markas besar kepolisian nasional, jakarta.Selatan, Senin (13/11).Setyo juga meluruskan masalah yang terkait dengan penyebab kerusuhan karena lemparan Al -Qur'an suci oleh penjaga di Mako Brimob Rutan, Kelapa Logic Gate Dua, Depok."Sudah diklarifikasi bahwa itu tidak benar. Ada orang -orang yang menyebar (tipuan) bahwa itu membuang Alquran, itu tidak ada. Apa yang ada menyapu setelah berdoa. Sebuah ponsel ditemukan. Meminta ponsel, marah," kata Setyo.Selain itu, Setyo menjelaskan bahwa dalam kerusuhan tidak ada pembakaran tetapi hanya tindakan vandalisme yang dilakukan oleh para tahanan."Tidak ada, hanya tahanan yang menghancurkan fasilitas penahanan," simpul Setyo.Jumat lalu (10/11) ada keributan di Penjara Teroris Brimob Mako, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Cabang Salemba Rutan sekitar pukul 16.00.Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Karo Penmas dari Markas Besar Kepolisian Nasional Brigadir Jenderal Pol Rikhwanto mengatakan bahwa kerusuhan itu dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris dan merusak fasilitas penjara."Pintu sel penjara dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, kaca jendela di blok C dan blok B," kata Rikwanto melalui rilis resminya.Kerusuhan, melanjutkan Rikhwanto, dimulai setelah doa Jumat ketika para tahanan dibawa ke dalam sel.Setelah itu, anggota piket Densus melakukan pencarian di kamar A.5 dan C5 (RB).Dari kamar, empat ponsel ditemukan milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam dan Jumali."Salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memprovokasi para petugas dengan berbagai jenis kata, kemudian beberapa anggota diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka," kata Rikwanto.Lalu akhirnya tahanan itu berteriak sehingga memicu narapidana lain di blok di sebelahnya.Untuk mengkondisikan situasi, anggota piket Unit III menembakkan tembakan ke udara serta memperingatkan para tahanan.

berita: The Head of the General Information Section (Kabagpenum) of the National Police, Kombes Pol. Martinus Sitompul, denied the issue of the throwing of the Koran by the guard at the Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba Branch, Central Jakarta, Friday (11/10/2017). The Mako Brimob Prison Salemba Branch riots. "It is not true that the Koran was thrown by the guard," said Kombes Martinus in a text message, Friday night. Martinus precondition explained that what happened was that the guard checked a number of books and objects in the detention cell. According to him, the riot that occurred on Friday afternoon was triggered by the inmates who did not accept the officers' search of their rooms. "The turmoil that occurred was a reaction to the actions taken by guard officers who confiscated cell phones belonging to Block C detainees," he said. During the search, four cell phones belonging to four terrorist convicts were found, namely Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam and Jumali. A number of angry Block B and Block C inmates then broke the cell door. Not only that, a number of facilities at the Salemba detention center were also damaged, including the gates of Block B and Block C hallways and their windows. Martinus added that the condition of the prison is now back to being conducive. "The detention center is conducive and the prisoners are calm," he said
berita_id: Kepala Bagian Informasi Umum (Kabagpenum) dari Polisi Nasional, Kombes Pol.Martinus Sitompul, membantah masalah pelemparan Alquran oleh penjaga di cabang Mako Brimob Rutan Salemba, Jakarta Tengah, Jumat (11/10/2017).Penjara Mako Brimob kerusuhan cabang Salemba."Tidak benar bahwa Alquran dilemparkan oleh penjaga," kata Kombes Martinus dalam sebuah pesan teks, Jumat malam.Martinus Precondition menjelaskan bahwa apa yang terjadi adalah bahwa penjaga memeriksa sejumlah buku dan objek di sel penahanan.Menurutnya, kerusuhan yang terjadi pada hari Jumat sore dipicu oleh para tahanan yang tidak menerima pencarian petugas di kamar mereka."Gejolak yang terjadi adalah reaksi terhadap tindakan yang diambil oleh petugas penjaga yang menyita telepon seluler milik tahanan blok C," katanya.Selama pencarian, empat ponsel milik empat narapidana teroris ditemukan, yaitu Juhanda, Saulihun, Khairul Anam dan Jumali.Sejumlah narapidana Blok B dan Blok C kemudian memecahkan pintu sel.Tidak hanya itu, sejumlah fasilitas di Salemba Detention Center juga rusak, termasuk gerbang blok B dan lorong blok C dan jendela mereka.Martinus menambahkan bahwa kondisi penjara sekarang kembali menjadi kondusif."Pusat penahanan kondusif dan para tahanan tenang," katanya

berita: Rumors circulated in the world of social media, that there was a riot at the Mako Brimob Detention Center, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, on Friday (11/10/2017) at around 16.00 Wib. Reportedly 3 blocks of the detention room caught fire & the doors were destroyed. To complete the story, this account completes its tweet with a video that the owner of the account says the source sent him. The video shows a number of people who appear to be convicted of terrorism, making gestures that indicate that they are in a tense atmosphere, and then the camera, which appears to be from a cell phone, moves to reveal a shattered window. berita: Catfish is one type of fish that contains a lot of animal protein. Pecel catfish is one of the favorite food menus for many people because the price is quite cheap and delicious. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is it called the dirtiest fish? The following is an explanation: Catfish live in very dirty ponds and are usually surrounded by chicken or pig coops. For those of you who are catfish fans, not all catfish live or are bred in ponds around which there is a chicken coop or a pigsty. In Indonesia, many also keep catfish in ordinary ponds. But why is it called the dirtiest fish, maybe because most catfish farmers feed their livestock with feed that comes from anything dirty including chicken carcasses etc. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish that mudcat he harvests every 3 months to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan province, to be precise in Haikou. Frequent complaints from the community, a reporter from the local fisheries department investigated the fish. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. It turned out that the seven ponds were all surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there were many piles of garbage. According to Islamic jurisprudence, eating catfish is halal. But sometimes many catfish breeders in Indonesia keep catfish in ponds and are fed with manure. If the condition is like that, then the catfish becomes like a jallalah animal, that is, an animal that eats dirty and unclean food so that it is unlawful to eat it. In order to become halal again, catfish must be quarantined or separated from dirty places and given clean food. Minimum quarantine time is 3 days. Catfish is a type of fish that consumes waste. Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty ponds, this fish can also consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pig manure, even this fish can also consume human waste. Some time ago, news about the dangers of consuming fried catfish circulated. Reportedly, a doctor once admitted that he often had patients with swollen and infected thyroid disease, with symptoms: swelling of the lower neck, swelling around the neck that looked like a tumor, the eyeballs felt like they were about to come out, heat around the neck, frequent coughing in the middle of the night. without cause. After being asked, it turns out that all the patients often eat catfish and fried eel. This also happened to the catfish skipper in Yogyakarta, his father, wife and child experienced the symptoms as above. When the doctor asked one of the professors at Pluit, it turned out that the catfish contains a mild poison, so that if it is fried, the clean oil will turn black. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. Friends for those of you who are catfish fans, even though catfish is halal and not too worrying as a wise consumer you must and remain careful. You also don't know when you buy catfish in the market or in a food stall, is it quarantined before frying the fish or not? If you are in doubt, don't eat it. Or if you are sure of its cleanliness, please consume it. However, it is recommended not to use large amounts on a regular basis.
berita_id: Lele adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang mengandung banyak protein hewani.Pecel Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit bagi banyak orang karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Mengapa disebut ikan paling kotor?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: ikan lele hidup di kolam yang sangat kotor dan biasanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam atau babi.Bagi Anda yang merupakan penggemar lele, tidak semua ikan lele hidup atau dibiakkan di kolam di sekitar yang ada kandang ayam atau babi.Di Indonesia, banyak yang juga menyimpan ikan lele di kolam biasa.Tetapi mengapa itu disebut ikan paling kotor, mungkin karena sebagian besar petani lele memberi makan ternak mereka dengan pakan yang berasal dari apa pun yang kotor termasuk karkas ayam dll. Menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele yang ia panen setiap 3 bulan untuk dipasarkan dan restoran di pinggir jalan di Hainan, Hainan Hain.Keluhan yang sering dari masyarakat, seorang reporter dari departemen perikanan setempat menyelidiki ikan tersebut.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Ternyata ketujuh kolam semuanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sementara di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Menurut yurisprudensi Islam, makan lele adalah halal.Tetapi kadang -kadang banyak peternak lele di Indonesia menyimpan ikan lele di kolam dan diberi makan dengan pupuk kandang.Jika kondisinya seperti itu, maka ikan lele menjadi seperti binatang jallalah, yaitu hewan yang memakan makanan kotor dan najis sehingga tidak sah untuk memakannya.Untuk menjadi halal lagi, ikan lele harus dikarantina atau dipisahkan dari tempat -tempat kotor dan diberi makanan bersih.Waktu karantina minimum adalah 3 hari.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang mengonsumsi limbah.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di kolam kotor, ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan pupuk babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengkonsumsi limbah manusia.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, berita tentang bahaya mengonsumsi ikan lele goreng yang beredar.Dilaporkan, seorang dokter pernah mengakui bahwa ia sering menderita pasien dengan penyakit tiroid yang bengkak dan terinfeksi, dengan gejala: pembengkakan leher bawah, pembengkakan di sekitar berita: Riots broke out at the Salemba detention center branch of the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, which housed terrorism convicts. However, the police confirmed that there was no throwing of the Koran in the incident. The incident occurred because of the prisoner's reaction when officers confiscated his cell phone mobile phone in Block C detention. He emphasized that there was no throwing of the Koran by the guard. However, the officers did check the books belonging to the cell occupants. "What is there is that the officers conducted an examination of the books and objects in the cell," said Martinus.
berita_id: Kerusuhan pecah di Cabang Pusat Penahanan Salemba dari Markas Komando Brigade Mobile, Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, yang menampung narapidana terorisme.Namun, polisi mengkonfirmasi bahwa tidak ada lemparan Alquran dalam insiden itu.Peristiwa itu terjadi karena reaksi tahanan ketika petugas menyita ponselnya di ponsel di blok C penahanan.Dia menekankan bahwa tidak ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga.Namun, para petugas memang memeriksa buku -buku milik penghuni sel."Apa yang ada bahwa para petugas melakukan pemeriksaan buku dan benda -benda di dalam sel," kata Martinus.

berita: Jakarta - When Apple launched the iPhone 6 Plus as the largest iPhone with a screen size of 5.5 inches, many were worried that it would make it difficult for users to put it in their pants pockets. The fear was finally proven. Indeed, this is not a big part, but some iPhone 6 Plus users who put the device in their trouser pockets are forced to accept the fact that the curved part of their iPhone 6 Plus is. As told by a Macrumors Forum user named Hanzon. He admitted that it took him a long time to put the iPhone 6 Plus in his commit front trouser pocket. At least 4 hours the device is in the pocket. While in the pants, Hanzon did not take out the iPhone 6 Plus and continued his usual activities as usual. As a result, he found the middle of his new smartphone was a bit 'bent'. DevinPitcher also had a bad experience. He also put his iPhone 6 Plus in his front pocket. It's not clear how long he kept it, which was clear enough to make him warp. Thus quoted detikINET from Macrumors, Wednesday (24/9/2014). There has been no official confirmation from Apple regarding the issue. But what is clear is that this is the reason for iPhone 6 Plus users to be careful about placing their latest iDevice.
berita_id: Jakarta - Ketika Apple meluncurkan iPhone 6 Plus sebagai iPhone terbesar dengan ukuran layar 5,5 inci, banyak yang khawatir akan menyulitkan pengguna untuk memasukkannya ke dalam saku celana mereka.Ketakutan akhirnya terbukti.Memang, ini bukan bagian besar, tetapi beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 plus yang menempatkan perangkat di kantong celana mereka dipaksa untuk menerima fakta bahwa bagian melengkung dari iPhone 6 Plus mereka.Seperti yang diceritakan oleh pengguna forum MacRumors bernama Hanzon.Dia mengakui bahwa butuh waktu lama baginya untuk menempatkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depan komit.Setidaknya 4 jam perangkat ada di saku.Saat berada di celana, Hanzon tidak mengeluarkan iPhone 6 Plus dan melanjutkan kegiatannya yang biasa seperti biasa.Akibatnya, ia menemukan bagian tengah smartphone barunya sedikit 'bengkok'.Devinpitcher juga memiliki pengalaman buruk.Dia juga meletakkan iPhone 6 Plus di saku depannya.Tidak jelas berapa lama dia menyimpannya, yang cukup jelas untuk membuatnya melengkung.Demikian dikutip Detikinet dari Macrumors, Rabu (24/9/2014).Belum ada konfirmasi resmi dari Apple mengenai masalah ini.Tapi yang jelas adalah bahwa ini adalah alasan bagi pengguna iPhone 6 Plus untuk berhati -hati dalam menempatkan iDevice terbaru mereka.

berita: Catfish is a fish that lives in fresh water, besides being a catfish farm fish, it also usually lives in lakes, swamps, muddy water and rivers. The dangers of eating catfish are still largely unknown to the general public because after consuming it, they have not felt any symptoms or complaints. JAKARTA, the National Narcotics Agency (BNN) has released the test results of the pacifier candy sample. Previously, the snacks, which were sold for Rp. 1000, were suspected of containing drugs. In fact, since the first scene in the Surabaya area, East Java, it made many parents nervous. Not only that, the candy went viral on social media because it was accused of containing drugs. "After testing at the Narcotics Laboratory of the National Narcotics Agency, it was concluded that the candy sample was negative and did not contain narcotics or other psychoactive ingredients," said Head of the BNN Public Relations Section, Kombes Slamet Pribadi, Thursday (9/3/2017). Slamet said that several cases of food types were often used as a modus operandi by narcotics syndicates. But usually these products are sold illegally and at a price that is certainly different from the market price. "BNN urges the public to remain vigilant against various modes of illicit drug trafficking that are increasingly diverse," he continued. Slamet added that BNN also asked parents manoeuver to always monitor their sons and daughters' interactions. Likewise with other related parties, such as schools, neighborhood associations, neighborhood associations, to religious leaders, community leaders, traditional leaders, youth leaders to be able to help monitor the surrounding environment, in order to avoid the dangers of drug abuse.
berita_id: Jakarta, Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) telah merilis hasil tes sampel Permen PACIFIER.Sebelumnya, makanan ringan, yang dijual seharga RP.1000, diduga mengandung obat.Bahkan, sejak adegan pertama di daerah Surabaya, Jawa Timur, itu membuat banyak orang tua gugup.Tidak hanya itu, permen menjadi viral di media sosial karena dituduh mengandung obat -obatan."Setelah pengujian di Laboratorium Narkotika Badan Narkotika Nasional, disimpulkan bahwa sampel permen negatif dan tidak mengandung narkotika atau bahan -bahan psikoaktif lainnya," kata kepala bagian hubungan masyarakat BNN, Kombes Slamet Pribadi, Kamis (9/3/2017).Slamet mengatakan bahwa beberapa kasus jenis makanan sering digunakan sebagai modus operandi oleh sindikat narkotika.Tetapi biasanya produk -produk ini dijual secara ilegal dan dengan harga yang tentu saja berbeda dari harga pasar."BNN mendesak masyarakat untuk tetap waspada terhadap berbagai mode perdagangan narkoba yang semakin beragam," lanjutnya.Slamet menambahkan bahwa BNN juga meminta orang tua manuuver untuk selalu memantau interaksi putra dan putri mereka.Demikian juga dengan partai -partai terkait lainnya, seperti sekolah, asosiasi lingkungan, asosiasi lingkungan, kepada para pemimpin agama, pemimpin masyarakat, pemimpin tradisional, pemimpin pemuda yang dapat membantu memantau lingkungan sekitarnya, untuk menghindari bahaya penyalahgunaan narkoba.

berita: The Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia in Davao City, Philippines, clarified the issue of burning Reog Ponorogo related to the expulsion of idols or spirits. The objection was conveyed through a press release on its website which was updated this afternoon, Saturday, October 31, 2015. The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City admitted that they had destroyed the Ponorogo Reog on October 20, 2015. The Ponorogo government minister Reog is an asset they have owned since 1988. So what is the real reason they destroy cultural objects by burning them? "The destruction by burning had to be carried out because the Ponorogo reog was already in a damaged condition and was eaten by termites," wrote the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao. The Consulate General affirmed that the burning was not at all an attempt by the Consulate General in Davao City to damage or eliminate Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. The destruction of these assets has been carried out carefully and with full respect for Reog Ponorogo as a cultural asset. "The Consulate General in Davao City also wants to emphasize that the burning has absolutely nothing to do with efforts to exorcise idols or spirits." The Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City is currently communicating with parties in Indonesia to seek a new replacement for Reog Ponorogo. Previously, the Indonesian Minister of Foreign Affairs, Retno LP Marsudi, said that the news of a Reog Ponorogo being deliberately burned at the office of the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) in Davao, Philippines, was not entirely true. "Reog and gamelan decorations in the form of dragon heads were burned because they were damaged and infested with termites," said Retno via text message. For information, several media had published news stating that officials at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao allowed these individuals to burn the cultural products of the Indonesian people because they were considered to be worshiping idols.
berita_id: Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina, mengklarifikasi masalah pembakaran Reog Ponorogo terkait dengan pengusiran berhala atau roh.Keberatan itu disampaikan melalui siaran pers di situs webnya yang diperbarui sore ini, Sabtu, 31 Oktober 2015. Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao mengakui bahwa mereka telah menghancurkan Ponorogo Reog pada 20 Oktober 2015. Jadi, Menteri Pemerintah Ponorogo adalah sebuah aset yang telah mereka miliki?"Penghancuran oleh pembakaran harus dilakukan karena Ponorogo Reog sudah dalam kondisi rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap," tulis Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao.Konsulat Jenderal menegaskan bahwa pembakaran sama sekali tidak merupakan upaya oleh Konsulat Jenderal di Kota Davao untuk merusak atau menghilangkan Reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya.Penghancuran aset -aset ini telah dilakukan dengan hati -hati dan dengan penuh rasa hormat terhadap Reog Ponorogo sebagai aset budaya."Konsulat jenderal di Kota Davao juga ingin menekankan bahwa pembakaran sama sekali tidak ada hubungannya dengan upaya untuk mengusir idola atau roh."Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao saat ini berkomunikasi dengan pihak -pihak di Indonesia untuk mencari pengganti baru untuk Reog Ponorogo.Sebelumnya, Menteri Luar Negeri Indonesia, Retno LP Marsudi, mengatakan bahwa berita tentang Ponorogo yang dirancang ulang dengan sengaja dibakar di kantor Jenderal Konsulat Republik Indonesia (KJRI) di Davao, Filipina, tidak sepenuhnya benar."Dekorasi reog dan gamelan dalam bentuk kepala naga dibakar karena rusak dan terinfeksi rayap," kata Retno melalui pesan teks.Sebagai informasi, beberapa media telah menerbitkan berita yang menyatakan bahwa para pejabat di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao mengizinkan orang -orang ini membakar produk -produk budaya rakyat Indonesia karena mereka dianggap menyembah berhala.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month. Or Rp 6.6 billion per year. This increase occurs if the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on the Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities of Civil Servants is actually passed. The amount is stated in the RPP material. With the president's salary index of 96,000 points, it was found that the figure was Rp. 553 million. According to Article 2 of Law number 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). Meanwhile, in PP 75/2000, it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5,040,000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is Rp. 30,240,000 per month. Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32,500,000. So that the total money received by the president each month is IDR wage 62,740,000 or IDR 752,880,000 per year. According to the palace, this amount has not changed since 2001. The total salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of major countries in the world. Prime Minister (PM) of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year. After Lee, there is Doris Leuthard, the President of Switzerland, who has a salary of USD 437,000 or IDR 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull followed with a salary of USD 403,700 or Rp 5.5 billion per year. President Jokowi is only higher than PRC President Xi Jinping who is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year. Meanwhile, US President Donald Trump recorded the smallest income, which was USD 1 per year. Of course this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal fortune of around USD 3 billion. University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. So that the income received by the number one person in Indonesia is very high. "It makes sense too," he explained. He said that as head of state as well as head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a president are enormous. So, according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid by the state budget, whose salary is greater than the president's. Instead, he said it would be dangerous if there were other government officials whose salaries were higher than the President. Meanwhile, the palace has not been able to comment further on the salary increase scheme for civil servants, presidents and other state officials. Presidential Spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about this. "I don't have the information yet. I'll confirm it later," he said when confirmed. The former Acting Officer (Plt) of the KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan.Atau Rp 6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini terjadi jika rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) pada gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas pegawai negeri sebenarnya disahkan.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Dengan indeks gaji presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, ditemukan bahwa angkanya adalah RP.553 juta.Menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 tahun 1978, gaji Presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Sementara itu, dalam hal 75/2000, dinyatakan bahwa ketiga pejabat menerima gaji RP.5.040.000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji dasar presiden adalah RP.30.240.000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32.500.000.Sehingga total uang yang diterima oleh presiden setiap bulan adalah IDR upah 62.740.000 atau IDR 752.880.000 per tahun.Menurut Istana, jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001. Gaji total presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di dunia.Perdana Menteri (PM) dari Singapura, Lee Hsien Loong mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun.Setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss, yang memiliki gaji USD 437.000 atau IDR 6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull diikuti dengan gaji USD 403.700 atau RP 5,5 miliar per tahun.Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC XI Jinping yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun.Sementara itu, Presiden AS Donald Trump mencatat pendapatan terkecil, yaitu USD 1 per tahun.Tentu saja ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Sehingga pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi, menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat yang harus dibayar dengan anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Sebaliknya, dia mengatakan akan berbahaya jika ada pejabat pemerintah lain yang gaji yang gaji lebih tinggi dari presiden.Sementara itu, istana belum dapat berkomentar lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji untuk pegawai negeri, presiden dan pejabat negara lainnya.Juru bicara presiden Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal ini."Aku belum punya informasinya. Aku akan mengkonfirmasi nanti," katanya ketika dikonfirmasi.Mantan Penjabat Petugas (PLT) kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: Member of Commission III of the House of Representatives, Taufiqulhadi, asked the public not to be consumed by misleading news or hoaxes related to the commotion at the Brimob Command Headquarters detention, Kelapa Dua Depok, West Java, last Friday, November 10 2017. Be "I hope the public will not be easily provoked. Because there is an insult to the Koran that is a hoax," said Taufiqulhadi on the sidelines of a discussion at Gado-Gado Boplo, Menteng, Jakarta, Saturday, November 11 2017. There are sympathizers of certain groups who spread the hoax issue. So he asked the public not to be consumed by the false news. He said the commotion was caused by a cellphone that was confiscated by the authorities. "The officers' cellphones were secured. And I think that's true. For example, if the officers didn't mobile phone protect the terrorists' cellphones, the idea of ​​terrorism could be released from detention," he said. So, it was the right step from security to immediately confiscate the cell phones belonging to the detainees. Taufiqulhadi supports the security measures. "And we hope for a more firm attitude to secure those inside," he continued. A number of prison facilities were damaged. The Head of the Public Information Bureau of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Brigadier General Rikwanto confirmed this commotion, Friday (11/10/2017). "On Friday, November 10 2017, at 16.00 WIB there was a commotion at the Mako Brimob terrorist detention center Salemba prison branch carried out by terrorist prisoners," said Rikwanto. According to Rikwanto, the commotion caused damage to the prison facilities. These included the breaking down of the prison cell door and the damage to the gate of the hallway block and window panes, namely in Block C and Block B. The KPK Officially Names Setya Novanto as a Suspect in the E-KTP Corruption Case Again According to him, the situation at the location has been successfully handled by the authorities. He also denied that there were wild rumors that this incident was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by officers. “It is not true that there is throwing of the Koran. It's a hoax," he said. According to the police, the trigger was that there were prisoners who did not accept being examined and provoked a commotion. Rikwanto explained, after Friday prayers, the detainees were put into their respective cells by the Densus 88 Team. While carrying out these activities, the Densus 88 Team conducted a search. There are 4 pieces of HP found. “Found 4 HP. It belongs to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali, who are prisoners of terrorism cases," he said. One of the detainees did not accept the search. According to Rikwanto, the detainee who was not named then made a provocation. Remembering Heroes' Services, Police Use Fighter Costumes in Operation Zebra Anoa "It is true that with the inspection activity, one of the detainees did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words, then some members were provoked by their words and there were other prisoners who did takbir aloud so that it provoked the prisoner of the next block," he explained. As a result, riots ensued. A number of facilities in the prison were damaged by the inmates. "The prison cell door was broken into, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in Block C and Block B)," said Rikwanto. But it didn't last long. The apparatus, according to Rikwanto, immediately took control of the situation. Currently the situation is reported to be conducive. There were no casualties in the incident. Nothing," said Rikwanto.
berita_id: Anggota Komisi III dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat, Taufiqulhadi, meminta publik untuk tidak dikonsumsi oleh berita yang menyesatkan atau tipuan terkait dengan keributan di penahanan markas besar Komando Brimob, saya berharap akan tidak mudah diprovisi, Jumat, Jumat lalu, itu adalah "November 2017. Saya berharap publik tidak akan mudah diproversikan.Taufiqulhadi di sela-sela diskusi di Gado-Gado Boplo, Menteng, Jakarta, Sabtu, 11 November 2017. Ada simpatisan kelompok tertentu yang menyebarkan masalah tipuan.Jadi dia meminta publik untuk tidak dikonsumsi oleh berita palsu.Dia mengatakan keributan itu disebabkan oleh ponsel yang disita oleh pihak berwenang."Ponsel petugas diamankan. Dan saya pikir itu benar. Misalnya, jika petugas tidak bergerak ponsel melindungi ponsel teroris, gagasan terorisme dapat dilepaskan dari penahanan," katanya.Jadi, itu adalah langkah yang tepat dari keamanan untuk segera menyita ponsel yang termasuk dalam tahanan.Taufiqulhadi mendukung langkah -langkah keamanan."Dan kami berharap sikap yang lebih kuat untuk mengamankan orang -orang di dalam," lanjutnya.Sejumlah fasilitas penjara rusak.Kepala Biro Informasi Publik Divisi Hubungan Masyarakat Brigadir Jenderal Polisi Nasional Rikwanto mengkonfirmasi keributan ini, Jumat (11/10/2017)."Pada hari Jumat, 10 November 2017, pukul 16.00 WIB ada keributan di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Mako Brimob Cabang Penjara Salemba yang dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris," kata Rikwanto.Menurut Rikwanto, keributan menyebabkan kerusakan pada fasilitas penjara.Ini termasuk kehabisan pintu sel penjara dan kerusakan pada gerbang blok lorong dan panel jendela, yaitu di Blok C dan Blok B. KPK secara resmi menyebutkan Setya Novanto sebagai tersangka dalam kasus korupsi e-KTP lagi menurutnya, situasi di lokasi telah berhasil ditangani oleh pihak berwenang.Dia juga membantah bahwa ada desas -desus liar bahwa kejadian ini dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh petugas."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran. Ini tipuan," katanya.Menurut polisi, pemicunya adalah bahwa ada tahanan yang tidak menerima diperiksa dan memicu keributan.Rikwanto menjelaskan, setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing oleh tim Densus 88.Saat melakukan kegiatan ini, tim Densus 88 melakukan pencarian.Ada 4 potong HP yang ditemukan."Ditemukan 4 hp. Itu milik Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, dan Jumali, yang merupakan tahanan kasus terorisme," katanya.Salah satu tahanan tidak menerima pencarian.Menurut Rikwanto, tahanan yang tidak dinamai kemudian membuat provokasi.Mengingat Layanan Pahlawan, polisi menggunakan kostum pejuang dalam operasi Zebra Anoa "Memang benar bahwa dengan kegiatan inspeksi, salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memicu petugas dengan berbagai kata, kemudian beberapa anggota diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan lain yang melakukan Takbir dengan keras sehingga memicu tahanan blok berikutnya," ia menjelaskan.Akibatnya, kerusuhan terjadi.Sejumlah fasilitas di penjara rusak oleh para tahanan."Pintu sel penjara dipecah, gerbang lorong blok, panel jendela (di blok C dan blok B)," kata Rikwanto.Tapi itu tidak bertahan lama.Peralatan, menurut Rikwanto, segera mengendalikan situasi.Saat ini situasinya dilaporkan kondusif.Tidak ada korban dalam insiden itu.Tidak ada, "kata Rikwanto.

berita: Catfish is one of the favorite foods in Indonesia. Besides being cheap, the taste is also very good. However, there are some people who are afraid to enjoy the cuisine of these freshwater fish. They assume that catfish causes cancer and other diseases. But is the assumption that catfish contains cancer true? Here is the explanation. Catfish Habitat and Life In its natural life, catfish is a species known for its toughness and durability. This animal has an additional respiratory organ called a labyrinth. With the labyrinth in its body, catfish can live in all kinds of conditions. Even in murky and polluted waters, catfish can still survive. Catfish are indeed very adaptable and fast-growing animals. Compared to other types, catfish also includes fish whose body development level is quite rapid. In just tens of days, the size and weight of his body can increase several times. In addition, catfish can also consume any type of food. Even when hungry, these murmuring animals also want to eat other animal waste, including waste that contains dangerous toxins. Therefore, it is not surprising that the animal, which in English is called the catfish, is often seen as the dirtiest fish based on its character and lifestyle. This is what then led to the interpretation if catfish causes cancer or in other words catfish contains cancer. Research Results Prove On the other hand as reported, when used indiscriminately antibiotics will cause germ immunity or resistance. In America, this case inch continues to increase because antibiotics are often found in farmed fish. According to research conducted by Arizona State University, one type of cultured fish that contains high levels of antibiotics is catfish, which is often purchased and consumed by the public. If antibiotics are consumed more often, the result is that the bacteria that attack the human body are getting stronger. Bacteria, viruses, parasites, and fungi are able to withstand antibiotics so that the treatment system will not be able to cure disease attacks. Differences in Catfish Cultivation in Indonesia and Other Countries Meanwhile, in Indonesia itself, breeders often breed and raise catfish in ponds or ponds. The pond is always kept free from pollution and far from the center of waste disposal. The food provided is also a special food for catfish. So it is still safe for consumption and will not cause health problems. This condition is much different from the case that occurred in China some time ago. At that time, there were various complaints from the people of Hainan Province who experienced health problems after consuming catfish. After an investigation, it turns out that the source of this problem lies in the management and system of catfish farming. The pond used to raise the fish is filled with garbage with a very high mercury content. In addition, it is located adjacent to the pig and chicken coop. Moreover, the pool was never cleaned at all. A similar case also occurs in African Nigeria. As the release issued, most of the catfish consumed by the people of the country is taken from the river. Though the rivers are full of waste, dirt and pollution. The result of consuming catfish is the occurrence of cancer. In addition, other problems often arise, such as obesity or body fatness and dirty blood. Dirty blood flow will cause more serious problems in the body such as kidney and heart disease. The emergence of this case also makes people more and more convinced that catfish contains cancer and tumors. Catfish Processing System One of the most popular ways to cook catfish is by frying. Many do not know that the wrong frying technique can cause the catfish consumed to be a source of disease and most importantly cancer. The most fatal mistake that often occurs is in the use of the oil. The oil used for frying catfish must be free of cholesterol and other harmful substances. Even though the fish is cultivated in the right way and cleaned before cooking, when the frying oil is not healthy, it can still cause disease. From here, of course, we understand that the source of the disease does not come from the catfish itself but the oil. In essence, between catfish and cancer actually have no relationship at all. Conclusions Obtained So in conclusion, if it is maintained in the right way and the pond is always clean and free from pollution, catfish is still safe for consumption. Likewise, the processing system must be washed thoroughly before cooking. Several types of bacteria that are often found in the body of catfish are salmonella, shigella, to ecoli. The presence of these bacteria is what makes catfish the cause of cancer and tumors. But when treated with the right heat, we can be sure the bacteria will die by themselves.
berita_id: Catfish adalah salah satu makanan favorit di Indonesia.Selain murah, rasanya juga sangat enak.Namun, ada beberapa orang yang takut menikmati masakan ikan air tawar ini.Mereka berasumsi bahwa ikan lele menyebabkan kanker dan penyakit lainnya.Tetapi apakah asumsi bahwa ikan lele mengandung kanker benar?Inilah penjelasannya.Habitat lele dan kehidupan dalam kehidupan alaminya, ikan lele adalah spesies yang dikenal karena ketangguhan dan daya tahannya.Hewan ini memiliki organ pernapasan tambahan yang disebut labirin.Dengan labirin di tubuhnya, ikan lele dapat hidup dalam segala kondisi.Bahkan di perairan yang keruh dan tercemar, ikan lele masih bisa bertahan hidup.Lele memang hewan yang sangat mudah beradaptasi dan tumbuh cepat.Dibandingkan dengan jenis lain, ikan lele juga termasuk ikan yang tingkat perkembangan tubuhnya cukup cepat.Hanya dalam waktu puluhan hari, ukuran dan berat tubuhnya dapat meningkat beberapa kali.Selain itu, ikan lele juga dapat mengonsumsi semua jenis makanan.Bahkan ketika lapar, hewan -hewan bergumam ini juga ingin makan limbah hewan lain, termasuk limbah yang mengandung racun berbahaya.Oleh karena itu, tidak mengherankan bahwa hewan, yang dalam bahasa Inggris disebut ikan lele, sering dipandang sebagai ikan paling kotor berdasarkan karakter dan gaya hidupnya.Inilah yang kemudian mengarah pada interpretasi jika ikan lele menyebabkan kanker atau dengan kata lain ikan lele mengandung kanker.Hasil penelitian terbukti di sisi lain seperti yang dilaporkan, ketika digunakan antibiotik tanpa pandang bulu akan menyebabkan kekebalan atau resistensi kuman.Di Amerika, inci kasus ini terus meningkat karena antibiotik sering ditemukan pada ikan pertanian.Menurut penelitian yang dilakukan oleh Arizona State University, salah satu jenis ikan yang dikultur yang mengandung antibiotik tingkat tinggi adalah ikan lele, yang sering dibeli dan dikonsumsi oleh publik.Jika antibiotik lebih sering dikonsumsi, hasilnya adalah bahwa bakteri yang menyerang tubuh manusia semakin kuat.Bakteri, virus, parasit, dan jamur dapat menahan antibiotik sehingga sistem pengobatan tidak akan dapat menyembuhkan serangan penyakit.Perbedaan dalam budidaya ikan lele di Indonesia dan negara -negara lain sementara itu, di Indonesia itu sendiri, peternak sering membiakkan dan memelihara ikan lele di kolam atau kolam.Kolam selalu dijaga bebas dari polusi dan jauh dari pusat pembuangan limbah.Makanan yang disediakan juga merupakan makanan khusus untuk ikan lele.Jadi masih aman untuk dikonsumsi dan tidak akan menyebabkan masalah kesehatan.Kondisi ini jauh berbeda dari kasus yang terjadi di Cina beberapa waktu lalu.Pada waktu itu, ada berbagai keluhan dari orang -orang Provinsi Hainan yang mengalami masalah kesehatan setelah mengonsumsi ikan lele.Setelah penyelidikan, ternyata sumber masalah ini terletak pada manajemen dan sistem pertanian ikan lele.Kolam yang digunakan untuk mengangkat ikan diisi dengan sampah dengan kandungan merkuri yang sangat tinggi.Selain itu, terletak berdekatan dengan kandang babi dan ayam.Selain itu, kolam tidak pernah dibersihkan sama sekali.Kasus serupa juga terjadi di Afrika Nigeria.Seperti yang dikeluarkan rilis, sebagian besar ikan lele yang dikonsumsi oleh orang -orang di negara itu diambil dari sungai.Meskipun sungai penuh dengan limbah, kotoran dan polusi.Hasil dari mengonsumsi ikan lele adalah terjadinya kanker.Selain itu, masalah lain sering muncul, seperti obesitas atau kegemukan tubuh dan darah kotor.Aliran darah kotor akan menyebabkan masalah yang lebih serius dalam tubuh seperti ginjal dan penyakit jantung.Munculnya kasus ini juga membuat orang semakin yakin bahwa ikan lele mengandung kanker dan tumor.Sistem Pemrosesan Lele Salah satu cara paling populer untuk memasak ikan lele adalah dengan menggoreng.Banyak yang tidak tahu bahwa teknik penggorengan yang salah dapat menyebabkan ikan lele yang dikonsumsi menjadi sumber penyakit dan yang paling penting kanker.Kesalahan paling fatal yang sering terjadi adalah menggunakan minyak.Minyak yang digunakan untuk ikan lele goreng harus bebas dari kolesterol dan zat berbahaya lainnya.Meskipun ikan dibudidayakan dengan cara yang benar dan dibersihkan sebelum dimasak, ketika minyak penggorengan tidak sehat, itu masih dapat menyebabkan penyakit.Dari sini, tentu saja, kami memahami bahwa sumber penyakit tidak berasal dari ikan lele itu sendiri tetapi minyak.Intinya, antara ikan lele dan kanker sebenarnya tidak memiliki hubungan sama sekali.Kesimpulan yang diperoleh demikian dalam kesimpulan, jika dipertahankan dengan cara yang benar dan kolam selalu bersih dan bebas dari polusi, ikan lele masih aman untuk dikonsumsi.Demikian juga, sistem pemrosesan harus dicuci secara menyeluruh sebelum dimasak.Beberapa jenis bakteri yang sering ditemukan di tubuh lele adalah Salmonella, Shigella, untuk Ecoli.Kehadiran bakteri ini adalah apa yang membuat Catfish menjadi penyebab kanker dan tumor.Tetapi ketika dirawat dengan panas yang tepat, kita bisa yakin bakteri akan mati sendiri.

berita: Recently, there have been many articles out there that conveniently translate the meaning of Pokemon as "I'm a Jew". Of course this was followed by the dislike of Pokemon fans. What exactly is going on here? Is there a battle between Pokemon lovers and haters? Or just traffic seekers? By justifying slander with religious remarks in the title of the article? There are several things that show that the translation of Pokemon into "I am Jewish" is invalid, and cannot be accounted for. We can take from the language that we understand, which makes more sense where Pokemon means file "Pocket Monsters" rather than "I'm Jewish"? Okay, if the translation in English is not satisfied, let's look at the early history of why it was named Pokemon. He is Satoshi Tajiri, a boy who lives in the suburbs of Tokyo. His hobby is catching insects and tadpoles that are around his house. Before long, he found his hobby quite interesting and continued to practice catching insects and tadpoles. Not only that, he also invites other children to do the same to have the joy of playing outdoors. As soon as Tajiri grew up, he and his friend Ken Sugimori and several other friends who were gamers started their own gaming business under the name Creatures. When Tajiri first became acquainted with the Game Boy and other cable game consoles, he imagined insects walking around on the cables. He is also heavily influenced by the fantasy film Ultraman (Ultra Seven), where Ultraman uses a small capsule to fight against large monsters. With that capital, they began to design a game called Capsule Monsters. After several failed attempts to submit this game to Nintendo, Shigeru Miyamoto, who is Tajuri's new friend, brought Capsule Monsters directly to the Nintendo company. It didn't take long for Nintendo to finance and develop their games. Spent 6 years in the making process and it didn't take long for this game to become trending in the world. Tajiri's delay in registering the Capsule Monsters trademark made someone else take over the name and they eventually changed the name of Capsule Monsters to "Pocket Monsters". In that long history, there is no relationship between Tajiri and the Syriac/Suryani party who was slandered by the ***** Pokemon that the Pokemon's name was "I'm a Jew". So... if you like Pokemon, just enjoy it, as long as you can divide the time between playing and 'playing'. There's no need to fear, or worry about people's invalid translations of the meaning of Pokemon.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, ada banyak artikel di luar sana yang dengan mudah menerjemahkan arti Pokemon sebagai "Saya seorang Yahudi".Tentu saja ini diikuti oleh ketidaksukaan penggemar Pokemon.Apa sebenarnya yang terjadi di sini?Apakah ada pertempuran antara pecinta dan pembenci Pokemon?Atau hanya pencari lalu lintas?Dengan membenarkan fitnah dengan komentar agama dalam judul artikel?Ada seorang bocah lelaki yang tinggal di pinggiran kota Tokyo.Hobinya adalah menangkap serangga dan berudu yang ada di sekitar rumahnya.Tak lama, ia menemukan hobinya cukup menarik dan terus berlatih menangkap serangga dan kecebong.Tidak hanya itu, ia juga mengundang anak -anak lain untuk melakukan hal yang sama untuk bersenang -senang bermain di luar ruangan.Segera setelah Tajiri dibesarkan, dia dan temannya Ken Sugimori dan beberapa teman lain yang merupakan gamer memulai bisnis game mereka sendiri dengan nama makhluk.Ketika Tajiri pertama kali berkenalan dengan Game Boy dan konsol permainan kabel lainnya, ia membayangkan serangga berjalan di atas kabel.Dia juga sangat dipengaruhi oleh film fantasi Ultraman (Ultra Seven), di mana Ultraman menggunakan kapsul kecil untuk melawan monster besar.Dengan modal itu, mereka mulai merancang permainan yang disebut Capsule Monsters.Setelah beberapa upaya gagal untuk mengirimkan game ini ke Nintendo, Shigeru Miyamoto, yang merupakan teman baru Tajuri, membawa monster kapsul langsung ke Nintendo Company.Tidak butuh waktu lama bagi Nintendo untuk membiayai dan mengembangkan permainan mereka.Menghabiskan 6 tahun dalam proses pembuatan dan tidak butuh waktu lama untuk permainan ini menjadi tren di dunia.Penundaan Tajiri dalam mendaftarkan merek dagang Capsule Monsters membuat orang lain mengambil alih nama dan mereka akhirnya mengubah nama monster kapsul menjadi "monster saku".Dalam sejarah yang panjang itu, tidak ada hubungan antara Tajiri dan partai Syria/Suryani yang difitnah oleh ***** Pokemon bahwa nama Pokemon adalah "I'm a Jew Yahudi".Jadi ... jika Anda suka Pokemon, nikmati saja, selama Anda dapat membagi waktu antara bermain dan 'bermain'.Tidak perlu takut, atau khawatir tentang terjemahan orang yang tidak valid tentang makna Pokemon.

berita: The Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Service, Afwan Lubis, is not convinced by the existence cerebrate of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. "I don't think it's possible. But what about it? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," he said via cellular, Monday (7/3/2016). about the boar-bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal. Meanwhile, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. "In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will explore this prohibition, really from sea urchins or not," he said via cellular. He added, if proven MUI will publish to the public so as not to use the toothbrush. In addition, MUI will withdraw the product from the market.
