berita: Finance Minister Sri Mulyani emphasized that there was no discussion about the increase in the salaries of the president and vice president. This was conveyed in response to the news circulating about it. "There is no news and there has never been a discussion," said Sri Mulyani at the Presidential Palace Complex, Bogor, West Java, Monday (12/3/2018). Read also: The Government is Still Discussing the Plan to Increase the Salary of Civil Servants Sri admits that currently there is a lot of information circulating regarding the increase in the salaries of the president and vice president, especially on social media. In fact, there are also documents circulating as if they came from a government institution. The photo of the fake document contains a nominal increase in the salary and allowances of the president and vice president. "In today's social media there is a lot of information or documents that are made similar to those from the government and published, even though they are hoaxes," said Sri. Read also: Low Police Salary, Deputy Chief of Police Welcomes Plan to Increase Civil Servant Salary The salary for the vice president in declared the hoax document is stated to reach Rp. 368,948,462 per month.
berita_id: Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani menekankan bahwa tidak ada diskusi tentang peningkatan gaji Presiden dan Wakil Presiden.Ini disampaikan sebagai tanggapan terhadap berita yang beredar tentang hal itu."Tidak ada berita dan tidak pernah ada diskusi," kata Sri Mulyani di Kompleks Istana Presiden, Bogor, Jawa Barat, Senin (12/3/2018).Baca juga: Pemerintah masih membahas rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji pegawai negeri sipil SRI mengakui bahwa saat ini ada banyak informasi yang beredar mengenai peningkatan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden, terutama di media sosial.Bahkan, ada juga dokumen yang beredar seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah.Foto dokumen palsu berisi peningkatan nominal dalam gaji dan tunjangan Presiden dan Wakil Presiden."Di media sosial saat ini ada banyak informasi atau dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan, meskipun mereka adalah tipuan," kata Sri.Baca juga: Gaji Polisi Rendah, Wakil Kepala Polisi Menyambut Rencana untuk Meningkatkan Gaji Pegawai Negeri Sipil Gaji untuk Wakil Presiden dengan menyatakan dokumen tipuan dinyatakan untuk mencapai RP.368.948.462 per bulan.

berita: Jurnaldigital.com – Cianjur Regent Irvan Rivano Muchtar will prohibit Cianjur residents, especially young people, from playing the online game Pokemon Go. The reason is that the meaning contained in the game is contrary to the beliefs of wish the majority of the population of Cianjur and is considered dangerous. According to Irvan, one of the game applications on smartphones based on Android and Apple is indeed being loved by game lovers, especially young people. However, according to Irvan, the meaning of the word Pokemon in one language is I am Jewish. “Obviously this is an acknowledgment of people who oppress our brothers, like the Palestinians. It also contradicts religious teachings," he said, Tuesday, July 19 2016. Irvan said the Cianjur Regency Government is currently only urging smartphone users not to play Pokemon Go, which was recently officially launched in America and will only be inaugurated in Indonesia in the near future. "Now it's just an appeal, but maybe later it will be banned if it doesn't educate and is dangerous," he said. Irvan added, from some of the news circulating, Pokemon Go can cause accidents. Games that require users to leave the house and walk to look for pokemon will disrupt concentration on the road. “Indeed, there has been no research on whether it is dangerous or not. But what is clear is that it is better to anticipate before all these bad things happen,” he said. The Commander of Military District 0608 Cianjur, Lieutenant Colonel Armed Imam Haryadi, has even issued a ban for his members from playing the Pokemon Go game, especially at headquarters. According to him, the GPS-based game will record complete location data so that it is feared that it will be misused. Imam explained, the Pokemon Go game is three-dimensional and based on GPS. When used, it will record the location data for the monster's search. If the recorded data goes to other parties and is used for certain purposes, it is very dangerous. "So we forbid all members of the TNI, starting from the Kodim, Koramil, and below to play, especially in the TNI headquarters environment," said Armed
berita_id: Jurnaldigital.com - Bupati Cianjur Irvan Rivano Muchtar akan melarang penduduk Cianjur, terutama orang -orang muda, dari memainkan game online Pokemon Go.Alasannya adalah bahwa makna yang terkandung dalam permainan ini bertentangan dengan keyakinan harapan mayoritas populasi Cianjur dan dianggap berbahaya.Menurut Irvan, salah satu aplikasi game di smartphone berdasarkan Android dan Apple memang dicintai oleh pecinta game, terutama orang -orang muda.Namun, menurut Irvan, arti kata pokemon dalam satu bahasa adalah saya orang Yahudi."Jelas ini adalah pengakuan terhadap orang -orang yang menindas saudara -saudara kita, seperti orang -orang Palestina. Ini juga bertentangan dengan ajaran agama," katanya, Selasa, 19 Juli 2016. Irvan mengatakan bahwa pemerintah Kabupaten Cianjur saat ini hanya akan mendesak pengguna ponsel cerdas untuk tidak bermain di Pokemon Go, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan ada di Indonesia di Indonesia, yang baru -baru ini diluncurkan secara resmi di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya ada di Indonesia di Indonesia di THOD, yang baru -baru ini secara resmi diluncurkan di Amerika dan hanya akan hanya akan disalahgunakan di Indonesia di Indonesia."Sekarang ini hanya banding, tapi mungkin nanti akan dilarang jika tidak mendidik dan berbahaya," katanya.Irvan menambahkan, dari beberapa berita yang beredar, Pokemon Go dapat menyebabkan kecelakaan.Game yang mengharuskan pengguna meninggalkan rumah dan berjalan untuk mencari Pokemon akan mengganggu konsentrasi di jalan."Memang, belum ada penelitian apakah itu berbahaya atau tidak. Tapi yang jelas adalah bahwa lebih baik mengantisipasi sebelum semua hal buruk ini terjadi," katanya.Komandan Distrik Militer 0608 Cianjur, Letnan Kolonel Bersenjata Imam Haryadi, bahkan telah mengeluarkan larangan bagi para anggotanya untuk memainkan permainan Pokemon Go, terutama di markas besar.Menurutnya, game berbasis GPS akan merekam data lokasi yang lengkap sehingga ditakuti bahwa itu akan disalahgunakan.Imam menjelaskan, game Pokemon Go adalah tiga dimensi dan berdasarkan GPS.Saat digunakan, itu akan merekam data lokasi untuk pencarian monster.Jika data yang direkam pergi ke pihak lain dan digunakan untuk tujuan tertentu, itu sangat berbahaya."Jadi kami melarang semua anggota TNI, mulai dari Kodim, Koramil, dan di bawah untuk bermain, terutama di lingkungan markas TNI," kata bersenjata

berita: The Jabodetabek Reog Community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials. "We want to get an official and written explanation, because in the previous clarification the Indonesian Consulate General confirmed the news on the pretext that the art equipment was damaged," said Secretary General of the Reog Jabodetabek (Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang and Bekasi) community Agus Setiyoko, Monday (2/2). /11). Agus revealed that there were three points of request for clarification that they submitted to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. First, to ask for an official and written explanation regarding the case of the reog art instrument burning by the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. In addition to the written explanation, Agus continued, in the second point, his party also questioned the dissemination of the news of the burning of the reog art instrument in a number of online media which stated that the reason for the burning was because it was considered an idol. The last point that is no less important, Agus continued, is a request to the Indonesian Embassy or the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City, Philippines to publish or broadcast clarifications on the issue of burning reog art objects in a number of national media. "We also demand that the Consulate General or through the Indonesian Embassy in the Philippines ask for the right of clarification from the media who brought up the news to avoid confusion in the news that developed in the country," he said. The letter, which was written on the head of the Jabodetabek Reyog Association Number 023/PRPJ/X/2015, was not only sent via electronic message to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City, but also forwarded to the Indonesian Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the Regent of Ponorogo. Separately, the Indonesian Consul General in Davao City, Eko Hartono, who had been asked for clarification via electronic mail, replied via a similar electronic message that the news of the burning of a number of reog art instruments by the local Consulate General staff was true. However, Consul General Eko Hartono, as quoted in an electronic message received by Agus Setiyoko, said the burning had to be carried out because the 30-year-old art instrument was damaged and eaten by termites. "Mr. Eko as the Indonesian Consul General in Davao even said that they were grateful for being able to communicate (via email) with the reog community in Indonesia so that they could ask for input for the procurement of a number of new reog art instruments there," said Agus. However, Agus said, the reog art lovers and actors in the country still need an official and open explanation that can be read in the national media so as not to continue to trigger disappointment or even anger from the reog community in Indonesia. "The second letter that we submitted above is more of a reflection of the shock and disappointment of the Indonesian people, especially the reog artist community in the country over the incident of burning objects for the reog art," he said. An Antara correspondent reported that news about the burning of a number of reog art properties, such as gayor, peacock masks and a dragon head gamelan, appeared in a number of online media along with photos of the burning of a peacock mask prowess in the yard of a house suspected of being the Indonesian Consulate General's office in Davao City, Philippines.
berita_id: Komunitas Reog Jabodetabek mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog oleh peralatan seni rusak," kata Sekretaris Jenderal Komunitas Reog Jabodetabek (Jakarta, Bogor, Depok, Tangerang dan Bekasi) AGUS SETIYOKO, Senin (2/2)./11).Agus mengungkapkan bahwa ada tiga poin permintaan untuk klarifikasi yang mereka sampaikan kepada Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Pertama, untuk meminta penjelasan resmi dan tertulis mengenai kasus instrumen seni reog yang dibakar oleh konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Selain penjelasan tertulis, Agus melanjutkan, pada poin kedua, partainya juga mempertanyakan penyebaran berita tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog di sejumlah media online yang menyatakan bahwa alasan pembakaran adalah karena dianggap sebagai idola.Poin terakhir yang tidak kalah pentingnya, Agus melanjutkan, adalah permintaan ke Kedutaan Besar Indonesia atau Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina untuk menerbitkan atau menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang masalah pembakaran objek seni reog di sejumlah media nasional."Kami juga menuntut agar konsulat umum atau melalui kedutaan Indonesia di Filipina meminta hak klarifikasi dari media yang mengemukakan berita untuk menghindari kebingungan dalam berita yang berkembang di negara itu," katanya.Surat itu, yang ditulis di kepala nomor Asosiasi Jabodetabek Reyog 023/PRPJ/X/2015, tidak hanya dikirim melalui pesan elektronik ke Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, tetapi juga diteruskan ke Kementerian Luar Negeri Indonesia dan Bupati Ponorogo.Secara terpisah, Konsul Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, Eko Hartono, yang telah diminta klarifikasi melalui surat elektronik, menjawab melalui pesan elektronik yang serupa bahwa berita pembakaran sejumlah instrumen seni reog oleh staf umum konsulat setempat benar.Namun, Konsul Jenderal Eko Hartono, seperti dikutip dalam pesan elektronik yang diterima oleh Agus Setiyoko, mengatakan pembakaran harus dilakukan karena instrumen seni berusia 30 tahun itu rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap."Tn. Eko sebagai Konsul Jenderal Indonesia di Davao bahkan mengatakan bahwa mereka bersyukur karena dapat berkomunikasi (melalui email) dengan komunitas reog di Indonesia sehingga mereka dapat meminta masukan untuk pengadaan sejumlah instrumen seni reog baru di sana," kata Agus.Namun, kata Agus, pecinta dan aktor seni yang reog di negara itu masih membutuhkan penjelasan resmi dan terbuka yang dapat dibaca di media nasional agar tidak terus memicu kekecewaan atau bahkan kemarahan dari komunitas reog di Indonesia."Surat kedua yang kami kirimkan di atas lebih merupakan cerminan dari keterkejutan dan kekecewaan orang -orang Indonesia, terutama komunitas seniman yang dirancang ulang di negara itu atas insiden objek yang membakar untuk seni reog," katanya.Sebuah koresponden Antara melaporkan bahwa berita tentang pembakaran sejumlah properti seni yang dirancang ulang, seperti Gayor, topeng merak dan gamelan kepala naga, muncul di sejumlah media online bersama dengan foto -foto pembakaran dari kecakapan topeng merak di halaman sebuah rumah yang diduga sebagai kantor jenderal konsulat di Dava, Kota Dava, di Kota Dava.

berita: Raids on pacifiers suspected of containing drugs were also carried out in Bangkalan Regency. During the raid, which was held by joint officers from the Bangkalan Police, Satpol PP, and the Bangkalan Health Office, thousands of bottles of dot candy were secured from a number of shops. The target of the raid was not only big shops. A number of hawkers who sell in elementary schools (SD) also did not escape the simultaneous operation in a number of Bangkalan areas. Even the joint officers found the candy agent allegedly containing the banned substance. The total number of confiscated candies was 1,530 bottles. All the evidence is secured at the Mapolres and will be tested in the laboratory to determine the substance in it. “This raid is not only in the city. But we spread it to a number of areas such as Tanah Merah, Kamal and Sukolilo," explained Head of the Bangkalan Police Ops, Kompol Agung Setyono, Wednesday (8/7/2017). The next step, said Agung, is to wait for the results of the examination and research on the content of the candy. If it is proven that they contain illegal drugs, the candy sellers will be summoned for questioning. However, if it does not contain harmful substances, it will be returned. “This candy has spread everywhere. Of course, it is a concern for parents to supervise their children when buying any food,” he added. Meanwhile, Head of the Health Division of the Bangkalan Health Office, Ciptaning Tekad, added that at least the candy should be secured first and waiting for the results of research from the Surabaya Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BBPOM). "If you look at the ML code, these are imported goods. If confect MD is a domestic product. But all the explanations are in Indonesian. Whether this is fake or not, we are waiting for the results of the examination," he explained.
berita_id: Penggerebekan pada dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan juga dilakukan di Kabupaten Bangkalan.Selama penggerebekan, yang dipegang oleh petugas bersama dari polisi Bangkalan, Satpol PP, dan Kantor Kesehatan Bangkalan, ribuan botol permen DOT diamankan dari sejumlah toko.Target serangan itu bukan hanya toko -toko besar.Sejumlah penjaja yang menjual di sekolah dasar (SD) juga tidak luput dari operasi simultan di sejumlah wilayah Bangkalan.Bahkan petugas gabungan menemukan agen permen yang diduga mengandung zat yang dilarang.Jumlah total permen yang disita adalah 1.530 botol.Semua bukti diamankan di Mapolres dan akan diuji di laboratorium untuk menentukan zat di dalamnya."Serangan ini tidak hanya di kota. Tapi kami menyebarkannya ke sejumlah daerah seperti Tanah Merah, Kamal dan Sukolilo," jelas kepala Ops Polisi Bangkalan, Kompol Agung Setyono, Rabu (8/7/2017).Langkah selanjutnya, kata Agung, adalah menunggu hasil pemeriksaan dan penelitian tentang konten permen.Jika terbukti bahwa mereka mengandung obat -obatan terlarang, penjual permen akan dipanggil untuk ditanyai.Namun, jika tidak mengandung zat berbahaya, itu akan dikembalikan."Permen ini telah menyebar ke mana -mana. Tentu saja, itu menjadi perhatian orang tua untuk mengawasi anak -anak mereka ketika membeli makanan apa pun," tambahnya.Sementara itu, kepala Divisi Kesehatan Kantor Kesehatan Bangkalan, Ciptaning Tekad, menambahkan bahwa setidaknya permen harus diamankan terlebih dahulu dan menunggu hasil penelitian dari Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat Surabaya (BBPOM)."Jika Anda melihat Kode ML, ini adalah barang impor. Jika Konferter MD adalah produk domestik. Tetapi semua penjelasannya dalam bahasa Indonesia. Apakah ini palsu atau tidak, kami sedang menunggu hasil pemeriksaan," jelasnya.

berita: The Pokemon Go game is currently booming among young people. Not a few people who have a pokemon fever and are willing to blusukan in search of Pokemon. However, this game made by Nintendo, Pokemon Corps, and Niantic Labs can't be separated from oblique issues. Recently, there have been many links circulating on social media stating that the game contains an invitation that cannot be tolerated by Islam. It is widely circulated on social media that Pokemon actually in Syriac or Syriac means "I am Jewish", while Pikachu is said to mean "Be Jewish", and Charmander means "God is Weak". The rumor has certainly become a heated debate on social media. Many believed and shared the rumor, many febricity thought it was just something that was linked. So is that really the issue? The Los Angels Times in an article dated April 24, 2001 once reviewed this. In the LA Times, it was stated that at that time in Middle Eastern countries such as Oman, Qatar, Dubai, Jordan, Egypt, and Saudi Arabia, there were many rumors that the Pokemon game had connotations that promoted anti-Islamic behavior and believed in Judaism. This of course causes anxiety. The LA Times noted that despite Nintendo's denials, the leaders of those countries still couldn't accept Pokemon. The rumors arose amid concerns Arab countries would assimilate the emerging culture. Even so, many rumors were not proven at that time. "It has been proven that this toy is part of a Jewish plot to corrupt the minds of our young generation because it offends blasphemous thoughts, mocks God and our moral values ​​so that it is very dangerous for our young generation," said Sheik Abdel Monem abu Zent, ​​former member Jordanian parliament. Even so, in the LA Times article, he stated that there was no strong evidence that the Pokemon game did have connotations that were detrimental to Islam. Mohammed Abu Laila, a professor from Al Azhar University, said that until now there was no solid evidence that confirmed the rumors that made parents forbid their children to play the Pokemon game. In a statement in Jordan's Amman newspaper, the Syriac Orthodox Christian Church denied allegations that Pokemon and other character names have roots in ancient Syriac and insult Islam. Church officials said they were surprised by the incoming letter stating that Pokemon contained a Jewish invitation. The article from the LA Times can be read at the following link.

berita: Director General of Applications and Information at the Ministry of Communication and Information (Dirjen Aptika Kemkominfo) Samuel Abrijani Pangerapan said Facebook plans to open an office in Indonesia. "Besides opening an office, it will be closer to its users, and the service will be faster," said Samuel after a meeting with Facebook Asia Pacific representatives in Jakarta, Wednesday (2/8/2017). Samuel explained that Facebook plans to open an office in the form of a PT (Limited Company) and will be inaugurated in August 2017. In the meeting, according to Samuel, Facebook was represented by Director Head of Trust and Safet Asia Pacific Jeff Wu and Head of Public Policy Southeast Asia Alvin Tan. The meeting was a follow-up to a meeting with OTT (internet-based service applications) in order to improve the handling of negative content. Furthermore, Samuel said, Facebook on that occasion reported an increase in services, including the handling of negative content. The government expects the service level index (SLI), especially the response to occlude the government, which in 2015-2016 amounted to 49.3 percent can be increased. "If we compare them with others, they are already close to 70 percent, that's what we hope for improvement," he said. On that occasion, Samuel explained, Facebook delivered a geo-blocking feature. Through geo-blocking, Facebook can block access to negative content only in countries where it is prohibited. Thus, content that does not comply with regulations in Indonesia can be blocked specifically in the Indonesian region. Meanwhile, in other countries where it is deemed not to violate the rules, it can still be accessed. He gave an example of pornographic content. "In Indonesia pornography is prohibited and very rigid, so they have to comply with Indonesian regulations because it is prohibited. Maybe in other countries the content is not prohibited so that it can be accessed, while in Indonesia it cannot be accessed," he said.
berita_id: Direktur Jenderal Aplikasi dan Informasi di Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi (Dirjen Aptika Kemkominfo) Samuel Abrijani Pangerapan mengatakan Facebook berencana untuk membuka kantor di Indonesia."Selain membuka kantor, itu akan lebih dekat dengan penggunanya, dan layanan ini akan lebih cepat," kata Samuel setelah pertemuan dengan perwakilan Facebook Asia Pasifik di Jakarta, Rabu (2/8/2017).Samuel menjelaskan bahwa Facebook berencana untuk membuka kantor dalam bentuk PT (perusahaan terbatas) dan akan diresmikan pada Agustus 2017. Dalam pertemuan tersebut, menurut Samuel, Facebook diwakili oleh Direktur Kepala Trust dan Safet Asia Pasifik Jeff Wu dan kepala kebijakan publik Asia Tenggara Asia Alvin Tan.Pertemuan tersebut merupakan tindak lanjut dari pertemuan dengan OTT (aplikasi layanan berbasis internet) untuk meningkatkan penanganan konten negatif.Selain itu, Samuel mengatakan, Facebook pada kesempatan itu melaporkan peningkatan layanan, termasuk penanganan konten negatif.Pemerintah mengharapkan Indeks Level Layanan (SLI), terutama respons terhadap pemerintah, yang pada 2015-2016 berjumlah 49,3 persen dapat ditingkatkan."Jika kita membandingkannya dengan orang lain, mereka sudah mendekati 70 persen, itulah yang kami harapkan untuk perbaikan," katanya.Pada kesempatan itu, Samuel menjelaskan, Facebook menyampaikan fitur geo-blocking.Melalui geo-blocking, Facebook dapat memblokir akses ke konten negatif hanya di negara-negara di mana ia dilarang.Dengan demikian, konten yang tidak mematuhi peraturan di Indonesia dapat diblokir secara khusus di wilayah Indonesia.Sementara itu, di negara -negara lain di mana dianggap tidak melanggar aturan, itu masih dapat diakses.Dia memberi contoh konten pornografi."Di Indonesia, pornografi dilarang dan sangat kaku, jadi mereka harus mematuhi peraturan Indonesia karena dilarang. Mungkin di negara lain konten tidak dilarang sehingga dapat diakses, sedangkan di Indonesia tidak dapat diakses," katanya.

berita: All Muslims who read this article need to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush brand. Recently, one type of dental cleaner has been found that contains non-halal ingredients. The material is known to contain sea urchins and is used as an ingredient in the manufacture of toothbrushes. To find out whether the toothbrush contains the forbidden ingredients or not is easy. Check the packaging and abound look for the words 'BRISTLE'. If the material is contained in the package, it means that the manufacturer has used pig bristles as one of the ingredients in the toothbrush. So it's best to re-check the packaging of the goods you buy and identify the names of haram ingredients which are usually disguised to trick consumers. The term Bristle means Pig Hair or sea urchins. In addition to toothbrushes, Bristle ingredients are also found in bread brushes (bread spreaders). The writing form is usually different, sometimes just 'Bristle', sometimes 'Pure Bristle' or '100% China Bristle'. Avoid using ingredients that Bristle is made of. Spread this information to other family and friends so that more people know and avoid this non-halal product.
berita_id: Semua Muslim yang membaca artikel ini harus lebih berhati -hati dalam memilih merek sikat gigi.Baru-baru ini, satu jenis pembersih gigi telah ditemukan yang mengandung bahan-bahan non-halal.Bahan ini diketahui mengandung bulu babi dan digunakan sebagai bahan dalam pembuatan sikat gigi.Untuk mengetahui apakah sikat gigi mengandung bahan terlarang atau tidak mudah.Periksa kemasannya dan lihat kata -kata 'bulu'.Jika bahan terkandung dalam paket, itu berarti bahwa pabrikan telah menggunakan bulu babi sebagai salah satu bahan di sikat gigi.Jadi yang terbaik adalah memeriksa ulang kemasan barang yang Anda beli dan mengidentifikasi nama-nama bahan haram yang biasanya menyamar untuk menipu konsumen.Istilah bulu berarti rambut babi atau landak laut.Selain sikat gigi, bahan -bahan bulu juga ditemukan dalam sikat roti (penyebar roti).Bentuk penulisan biasanya berbeda, kadang -kadang hanya 'bulu', kadang -kadang 'bulu murni' atau '100% china bristle'.Hindari menggunakan bahan -bahan yang terbuat dari bulu.Sebarkan informasi ini ke keluarga dan teman-teman lain sehingga lebih banyak orang tahu dan hindari produk non-halal ini.

berita: Who doesn't know catfish, this fish is a favorite for many people because it has a delicious taste and has a soft meat texture, but it turns out that catfish is the dirtiest fish, one mouthful contains three thousand cancer cells. Is that true? Catfish The Dirtiest Fish, One Mouth contains Three Thousand Cancer Cells, Here's the Explanation Catfish is one of the favorite food menus and even in every food stall this menu is always available because the price is quite cheap and delicious can be the main attraction for this one fish. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is that? The following is dutch east indies the explanation The catfish pond is very dirty and surrounded by chicken coops and pigs According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan province to be precise in Haikou which he harvested 3 months very. Due to the many complaints from the community, journalists searched about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. The seven ponds are surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there are many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places because these fish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pigs, even this fish can also consume human waste. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. That's some information about catfish in China, but in Indonesia this fish has been cultivated well by catfish farmers and they use pellets as food instead of using waste which is very dangerous for the health of the human body. So that consuming catfish in Indonesia there is no need to doubt its cleanliness, but as wise consumers we must remain vigilant about the content of this fish and do not need to consume it in large quantities on a regular basis because it can interfere with our health. Apart from all that, are there any healthy benefits of catfish? it turns out that this one fish besides being delicious also contains several substances that are good for the health of the human body. Here are 4 benefits of catfish: Healthy heart and brain Catfish contains omega-3 and omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and it turns out that a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good quality In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue and strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12 A serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is about 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin is useful in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content so it is safe for consumption. That's some information about the dirtiest fish catfish, one bite contains three thousand cancer cells, but it turns out that this fish also has high nutritional value if cultivated properly.
berita_id: Siapa yang tidak tahu ikan lele, ikan ini adalah favorit bagi banyak orang karena memiliki rasa yang lezat dan memiliki tekstur daging yang lembut, tetapi ternyata ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor, satu suapan berisi tiga ribu sel kanker.Apakah itu benar?Catfish ikan paling kotor, satu mulut berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, inilah penjelasannya Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Kenapa begitu?Berikut ini adalah Hindia Belanda, penjelasan, kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi menurut seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar dan restoran pinggir jalan di Provinsi Helah untuk menjadi tepat di Haikou yang ia hasilkan 3 bulan.Karena banyak keluhan dari masyarakat, jurnalis mencari tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Tujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sedangkan di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor karena ikan ini mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah manusia.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi di Indonesia ikan ini telah dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani lele dan mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan alih -alih menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh manusia.Sehingga mengkonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia tidak perlu meragukan kebersihannya, tetapi sebagai konsumen yang bijak kita harus tetap waspada tentang kandungan ikan ini dan tidak perlu mengkonsumsinya secara teratur secara teratur karena dapat mengganggu kesehatan kita.Terlepas dari semua itu, apakah ada manfaat ikan lele yang sehat?Ternyata ikan yang satu ini selain lezat juga mengandung beberapa zat yang baik untuk kesehatan tubuh manusia.Berikut adalah 4 manfaat ikan lele: Lelyal jantung dan otak yang sehat mengandung omega-3 dan omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan ternyata sekumpulan ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan kualitas yang baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot dan memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12 Porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan sekitar 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berguna dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan lele karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah sehingga aman untuk dikonsumsi.Itu beberapa informasi tentang ikan lele ikan paling kotor, satu gigitan berisi tiga ribu sel kanker, tetapi ternyata ikan ini juga memiliki nilai gizi yang tinggi jika dibudidayakan dengan benar.

berita: PROKAL.CO, Maybe you've read an article or just a chain message about first aid for stroke sufferers by sticking a needle into the tip of a finger until it bleeds. Don't swallow this information raw and do it. As explained by Dr. Astried Indrasari SpPD, the news is just a hoax and has not been proven true. There is no first aid to prevent stroke by pricking the patient's finger. Appropriate help is to immediately lift carefully and take the patient to the hospital in order to get the right therapy, he stressed. Patients must receive appropriate therapy to minimize the risk of stroke. If the cause of the patient's fainting is due to a blockage, it is assisted to expedite the blocked blood vessels. Meanwhile, if there is a broken blood vessel, it is prevented so that the broken blood vessel does not get bigger, he said. The doctor at the Regional General Hospital (RSUD) Abdul Wahab Sjahranie (AWS) said that if you want to prevent a stroke, you must take precautions before experiencing blockage or rupture of blood vessels. Most people don't prevent it from the start, but when something new happens, they get worried and bung confused, he explained. When the blood vessels are blocked or ruptured, the blood flow in the body will die, so that a person experiences loss of balance. There is no prevention of stroke, which is only therapy so that blockage and rupture of blood vessels does not get worse. Because if left unchecked, it can threaten the patient's life,
berita_id: Prokal.co, mungkin Anda telah membaca sebuah artikel atau hanya pesan rantai tentang pertolongan pertama untuk penderita stroke dengan memasukkan jarum ke ujung jari sampai berdarah.Jangan menelan informasi ini mentah dan melakukannya.Seperti yang dijelaskan oleh Dr. Astried Indrasari SPPD, berita itu hanya tipuan dan belum terbukti benar.Tidak ada pertolongan pertama untuk mencegah stroke dengan menusuk jari pasien.Bantuan yang tepat adalah segera mengangkat dengan hati -hati dan membawa pasien ke rumah sakit untuk mendapatkan terapi yang tepat, ia menekankan.Pasien harus menerima terapi yang tepat untuk meminimalkan risiko stroke.Jika penyebab pingsan pasien adalah karena penyumbatan, itu dibantu untuk mempercepat pembuluh darah yang diblokir.Sementara itu, jika ada pembuluh darah yang rusak, itu dicegah sehingga pembuluh darah yang rusak tidak menjadi lebih besar, katanya.Dokter di Rumah Sakit Umum Regional (RSUD) Abdul Wahab Sjahranie (AWS) mengatakan bahwa jika Anda ingin mencegah stroke, Anda harus mengambil tindakan pencegahan sebelum mengalami penyumbatan atau pecahnya pembuluh darah.Kebanyakan orang tidak mencegahnya sejak awal, tetapi ketika sesuatu yang baru terjadi, mereka khawatir dan bung bingung, jelasnya.Ketika pembuluh darah diblokir atau pecah, aliran darah dalam tubuh akan mati, sehingga seseorang mengalami kehilangan keseimbangan.Tidak ada pencegahan stroke, yang hanya terapi sehingga penyumbatan dan pecahnya pembuluh darah tidak menjadi lebih buruk.Karena jika dibiarkan, itu dapat mengancam kehidupan pasien,

berita: The Food and Drug Supervisory Agency (BPOM) has tested a candy sample resembling a pacifier suspected of containing drugs. From the results of laboratory tests carried out by BPOM, it showed that the dot-shaped candy was negative for drugs. "Until now, of the various drug indicators to be tested, four negative results have been obtained for four drug indicators," said Head of BPOM Penny Kusumastuti Lukito when contacted by merdeka.com, Wednesday (8/3) night. Penny said there were 19 parameters used in examining the merchandise pacifier candy sample. Of the 19 indicators, four of them showed negative drug candy. "Narcotics class one, narcotics class three, psychotropics, there are 19 parameters that will be resolved," said Penny. According to Penny, to ensure that the pacifier contains drugs, testing is currently underway with other types of indicators. The results of these laboratory tests will later be submitted to the National Narcotics Agency (BNN). "Based on these four parameters, it does not contain drugs," said Penny. Penny added, the candy pacifier itself is registered with BPOM RI with the code ML 224409003077 with the brand Penguin Brand; Hard Candy. The candy is imported from China. "It has been registered with the POM Agency for imported products from China," he concluded. Previously, rumors circulated that candy allegedly containing drugs was circulating in Surabaya. The candy, which is packaged in colorful packaging, is often found in shops and hawkers in schools. The news has gone viral in cyberspace. In fact, in the aftermath of the hectic news, the Surabaya City Government immediately mobilized the Satpol PP, Linmas and sub-districts accompanied by Polri and TNI officers to conduct raids in several locations.
berita_id: Badan Pengawas Makanan dan Obat (BPOM) telah menguji sampel permen yang menyerupai dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Dari hasil tes laboratorium yang dilakukan oleh BPOM, ini menunjukkan bahwa permen berbentuk dot negatif untuk obat-obatan."Sampai sekarang, dari berbagai indikator obat yang akan diuji, empat hasil negatif telah diperoleh untuk empat indikator obat," kata kepala BPOM Penny Kusumastuti Lukito ketika dihubungi oleh Merdeka.com, Rabu (8/3) malam.Penny mengatakan ada 19 parameter yang digunakan dalam memeriksa sampel permen dot barang dagangan.Dari 19 indikator, empat dari mereka menunjukkan permen obat negatif."Narkotika Kelas Satu, Narkotika Kelas Tiga, Psikotropika, ada 19 parameter yang akan diselesaikan," kata Penny.Menurut Penny, untuk memastikan bahwa dot berisi obat -obatan, pengujian saat ini sedang berlangsung dengan jenis indikator lainnya.Hasil tes laboratorium ini nantinya akan diserahkan kepada Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN)."Berdasarkan empat parameter ini, itu tidak mengandung narkoba," kata Penny.Penny ditambahkan, dot permen itu sendiri terdaftar dengan BPOM RI dengan kode ML 224409003077 dengan merek penguin merek;Permen.Permen diimpor dari Cina."Telah terdaftar di Badan POM untuk produk impor dari China," pungkasnya.Sebelumnya, rumor beredar bahwa permen yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan beredar di Surabaya.Permen, yang dikemas dalam kemasan berwarna -warni, sering ditemukan di toko -toko dan penjaja di sekolah.Berita itu telah beredar di dunia maya.Bahkan, setelah berita sibuk, pemerintah kota Surabaya segera memobilisasi PP Satpol, Linmas dan distrik disertai oleh Polri dan Petugas TNI untuk melakukan penggerebekan di beberapa lokasi.

berita: The president's salary, which is only around Rp. 62 million per month, is currently considered very low. The government plans to propose an increase in the president's salary so that it is worth Rp. 553 million per month. In the RPP, apart from the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience salary increases. The president's salary has skyrocketed because the calculation is based on an index of 1:12698 between the salaries of the lowest rank civil servants and those of the lowest rank civil servants. The highest income index for the president is simulated to reach 96000 so that he will earn an income of IDR 553.4 million per month. Meanwhile, the vice president (wapres) will receive an income of IDR 368.9 million per month from the previous basic salary of IDR 20 million. vice president salary based on income index 64000 With pe With this salary change, the monthly income of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will compete with the salaries of leaders in other countries. The extent of the salary comparison is in the info graphic. In the RPP, new salary proposals also appear for ministers, attorney general, commander of the TNI, chief of police, chairman of the MPR, chairman of the DPR, chairman of the DPD, chairman of the KPK, chairman of the BPK, chairman of the Supreme Court, and chairman of the Constitutional Court With an index calculation of 16000, their income is IDR 92.2 million per month Then for the deputy chairman of the MPR, DPR, DPD, KPK, BPK , MA, and MK, the income index is 15,333 and receives an income of Rp. 88.3 million per month. As for the deputy minister, deputy head of the National Police, members of the DPR, DPD members, BPK members, and Supreme Court justices, per month, they earn Rp. 80.7 million. With an income index of 14000, the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (Kemenpan RB) acknowledged the issue of the circulation of this RPP even though he stated that the proposal was not yet ripe. The Head of the Legal, Communication and Information Bureau Public Ormation Ke Menpan RB Herman Suryatman said that the information on the RPP was not valid. Herman said that the RPP was sourced from the discussion material held last year. "Those are simulation numbers that are not valid. 2017," he said in Jakarta yesterday. As is known, the RPP on the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants is a technical regulation of the Law on State Civil Apparatus (ASN). According to Herman, the presentation contains a simulation of the income of civil servants and other state officials. still needs further study. "Not only does it contain a simulation of the income of state officials, but also a lieutenant simulation of the income of civil servants. Please don't be misunderstood," he said. Using a calculation index of 1:12698, the income of civil servants, both central and regional, will increase. regional officials such as governors governors, regents, mayors, provincial DPRD, and city regency DPRDs will also experience an increase. The governor will earn an income of IDR 76.8 million per month with an index of 13333 Then the deputy governor, regent mayor, and chairman of the provincial DPRD will earn income Rp. 73.2 million with an income index of 12698. Meanwhile, the deputy regent/mayor, deputy chairman of the provincial DPRD, and the chairman of the Regency/City DPRD have a salary of Rp. 69.7 million per month with an income index of 12094. The province which has an income index of 11518 has a monthly salary of Rp. 66.3 million. Lastly, for members of the district and city DPRD, the salary to be earned is Rp. 63.3 million with an income index of 10969. Public policy expert at the University of Padjadjaran (Unpad) Yogi Suprayogi assessed, even though it is only a simulation, the salary increase for state officials is irrelevant. He said the current salary earned by state officials is sufficient. There is an additional operational allowance. That's big. It's what he likes. No need to grow it. It's irrelevant," he said. According to him, if there must be an increase, the salaries of the president and central officials must be adjusted to the inflation rate. "We are also not a developed country. Singapore could reach Rp 10 billion," he said. Yogi said, rather than an increase in the salaries of state officials, improving the salaries of civil servants is considered more important at this time. currently still discussing the technical rules of the ASN Law, one of which is the RPP on Salaries and Allowances Yogi emphasized the importance of changing the salary scheme of civil servants. Among the three things, Yogi requested that the basic salary be increased more than and performance allowances Currently the basic salary is smaller so that many civil servants go here and there to increase their performance allowances. Expensive allowances must be greater than the other two components so that teachers are willing to be placed in remote areas. In addition, he also highlighted that performance allowances must be based on performance. He warned not to other countries pay salaries based on level of education Salary provision in some countries is also partly based on performance In the United States, the salary of civil servants in the Department of State ranges from USD88000 to USD96000 per year However, the lowest government employee salary is USD18785 per year Fri There are 2.79 million civil servants in Uncle Sam's country. The salary of the US president is around USD 400,000. The presidential salary increase was very drastic in 2001. Previously, the president's salary was only USD 200,000. Malaysian Prime Minister (PM) Najib Razak gave an annual bonus in 2018 to government employees who In addition, he provides a pension of 1000 ringgit per month for those who have served for 25 years. The salary of Malaysian civil servants who serve 14 years is around 36000 ringgit and those who have served for more than 1019 years get an income of 70753 ringgit. new civil servants working in Singapore reach 3,000 Singapore dollars per month For managerial positions earn around 8,000 Singapore dollars The number of employees in Singapore reaches 84,000 people According to Thomas Friedman of the New York Times, civil servants in Singapore are among the most efficient and uncorruptible bureaucrats “They have high standards of discipline and accountability,” said Friedman

The virtual world was enlivened with an invitation to boycott Traveloka. The Uninstall Traveloka hashtag has also become a top trending topic on Twitter. This seems to be the result of the Walk Out (WO) action of the famous Indonesian composer, Ananda Sukarlan when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th anniversary of the establishment of Kanisius College at JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11). When Anies Baswedan gave a speech, Ananda suddenly stood up and then WO left the room. His action was followed by hundreds of alumni and other attendees, until Anies finished giving his speech and left the event. Based on the information gathered, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, who was also present at the event, apparently also greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech. This was seen as support for Ananda's actions. I don't know who started it, Derianto's actions apparently provoked netizens to boycott Traveloka. As of this writing, #UninstallTraveloka is still the number one trending topic on Twitter. A number of netizens publish commented lopsidedly against Traveloka. The @dimasprakbar account for example, "The right of @traveloka boss to walkout when the governor of DKI gives a speech. Also the public's right to #UninstallTraveloka when they are not satisfied with the attitude of @traveloka boss". "#DeriantoKusuma, Traveloka owner exemplifies dishonorable actions in WO at Kanisius. Price discounts are not commensurate with honor. Bye @traveloka," replied @hizzatullah in the next column. "I wanted to #uninstallTraveloka but recently realized that I haven't installed it," tweeted the account @ainurohman. In addition, there are also netizens who defend and assess that the Traveloka boycott will not have any impact on the hotel booking application and travel tickets. "Why just because of the new governor? The application is still useful. What's the point in #uninstallTraveloka," wrote the account @FansyahAzwar. "As long as @traveloka gives me benefits, whatever the boss wants to do, it still won't #UninstallTraveloka :))" continued @inddraa5 in the next tweet
berita_id: Dunia virtual dimeriahkan dengan undangan untuk memboikot Traveloka.Hashtag Traveloka uninstall juga telah menjadi topik tren teratas di Twitter.Ini tampaknya merupakan hasil dari aksi Walk Out (WO) dari komposer Indonesia terkenal, Ananda Sukarlan ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato pada peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius di Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Sabtu (11/11).Ketika Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato, Ananda tiba -tiba berdiri dan kemudian akan meninggalkan ruangan.Tindakannya diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan peserta lainnya, sampai Anies selesai memberikan pidatonya dan meninggalkan acara tersebut.Berdasarkan informasi yang dikumpulkan, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, yang juga hadir di acara tersebut, tampaknya juga menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies.Ini dipandang sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, tindakan DeRianto tampaknya memicu netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Sampai tulisan ini, #uninstalltraveloka masih merupakan topik tren nomor satu di Twitter.Sejumlah netizen yang diterbitkan berkomentar miring terhadap Traveloka.Akun @DimasPrakBar misalnya, "Hak bos @traveloka untuk memandangi ketika gubernur DKI memberikan pidato. Juga hak publik untuk #uninstalltraveloka ketika mereka tidak puas dengan sikap bos @traveloka"."#Deriantokusuma, pemilik Traveloka mencontohkan tindakan tidak terhormat di Wo di Kanisius. Diskon harga tidak sepadan dengan kehormatan. Bye @traveloka," jawab @hizzatullah di kolom berikutnya."Saya ingin #uninstalltraveloka tetapi baru -baru ini menyadari bahwa saya belum menginstalnya," tweet akun @ainurohman.Selain itu, ada juga netizen yang membela dan menilai bahwa boikot Traveloka tidak akan berdampak pada aplikasi pemesanan hotel dan tiket perjalanan."Mengapa hanya karena gubernur baru? Aplikasi ini masih berguna. Apa gunanya #uninstalltraveloka," tulis akun @Fansyahazwar."Selama @traveloka memberi saya manfaat, apa pun yang ingin dilakukan bos, itu masih tidak akan #uninstalltraveloka :))" lanjut @inddraa5 di tweet berikutnya

berita: Circulating photos of participants of Action 212 Volume Two on social media who cannot enter the mosque Istiqlal early this morning because the doors of the mosque were closed. According to the management mosque the circulating issue is not true. "It's a thousand percent hoax," said the Head of the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam to Republika.co.id Tuesday morning. He said, for last night's case, there were indeed participants in the action who came from East Java as many as five buses. They claimed to come from Madura. schoolhouse Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. "After approaching 10 (at night), we met with the head of his entourage, we announced to his entourage that the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be opened again one hour before Fajr," he said. Abu explained, the group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. "And what's in the photo, it looks like people are queuing up to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that in conclusion, the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie
berita_id: Sirkulasi foto peserta aksi 212 volume dua di media sosial yang tidak dapat memasuki masjid istiqlal pagi ini karena pintu masjid ditutup.Menurut masjid manajemen, masalah yang beredar tidak benar."Ini adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata kepala bagian protokol dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam ke Republika.co.id Selasa pagi.Dia mengatakan, untuk kasus tadi malam, memang ada peserta dalam aksi yang berasal dari Jawa Timur sebanyak lima bus.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta sekolah memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan."Setelah mendekati 10 (di malam hari), kami bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, kami mengumumkan kepada rombongannya bahwa aturan di ISTIQLAL, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum Fajr," katanya.Abu menjelaskan, kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali."Dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang mengantri untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa sebagai kesimpulan, berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan

berita: This is important information for all Muslims, especially in Indonesia, please spread this information. Recently, information was spread about one of the toothbrush products that contains pig bristles. If you find that the toothbrush package says "Bristle", it means that the toothbrush contains pig bristles. Sometimes it also says "Pure Bristle" and "100% China Bristle" Quoted from the Langitan.com magazine page, China Bristles means the same as Hog Bristles which means pet pigs. In addition to being used as an ingredient for toothbrushes, materials containing sea urchins are also used in bread brushes, wall paint, cosmetics and so on. According to one employee at the District Court (PN) of Tuban Regency, Bahyu Agung Kurniawan, that it is necessary to be careful because not all of these sea urchins have Bristles inscribed. Even though many scholars have different opinions about the issue of using sea requirement urchins, it is better to avoid it so that the scholars get out of disputes. And that is the best wara' attitude, which is to avoid brushes from sea urchins because the majority of scholars forbid their use. Based on the 2014 MUI fatwa, it was stated that it had forbidden the use of pig bristle brushes. And in 2016, the use of sea bristles already exists in toothbrush products. Wallahu a'lam...
berita_id: Ini adalah informasi penting untuk semua Muslim, terutama di Indonesia, silakan sebarkan informasi ini.Baru -baru ini, informasi tersebar tentang salah satu produk sikat gigi yang berisi bulu babi.Jika Anda menemukan bahwa paket sikat gigi mengatakan "bulu", itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Kadang -kadang juga mengatakan "bulu murni" dan "100% China Bristle" yang dikutip dari halaman majalah Langitan.com, China Bristles berarti sama dengan bulu babi yang berarti babi hewan peliharaan.Selain digunakan sebagai bahan untuk sikat gigi, bahan yang mengandung landak laut juga digunakan dalam sikat roti, cat dinding, kosmetik dan sebagainya.Menurut seorang karyawan di Pengadilan Distrik (PN) Kabupaten Tuban, Bahyu Agung Kurniawan, bahwa perlu untuk berhati -hati karena tidak semua bulu babi laut ini tertulis.Meskipun banyak sarjana memiliki pendapat berbeda tentang masalah penggunaan landak persyaratan laut, lebih baik menghindarinya sehingga para sarjana keluar dari perselisihan.Dan itu adalah sikap Wara terbaik, yaitu untuk menghindari kuas dari bulu babi karena mayoritas cendekiawan melarang penggunaannya.Berdasarkan MUI Fatwa 2014, dinyatakan bahwa ia telah melarang penggunaan sikat bulu babi.Dan pada tahun 2016, penggunaan bulu laut sudah ada dalam produk sikat gigi.Wallahu a'lam ...

berita: MALANGTIMES - For almost a week, residents' anxiety over the circulation of pacifiers suspected of containing drugs in various regions has finally come to light. The test results at the National Narcotics manoeuver Agency's (BNN) Drug Laboratory released a teat candy with the brand of Hard Candy, which is a foreign food produced in China with the BPOM distribution permit number 224409003077, no narcotics and psychotropic substances were found, as has been widely reported on social media this week. . "Negatively, no narcotics content was found. This is the result of an official test and was reported directly by the Central BNN Public Relations with a clarification letter number B/BK-1/III/2017/Humas dated March 9, 2017," explained the Head of Malang Regency BNN, AKBP. I Made Arjana via telephone, Thursday (09/03) evening to MALANGTIMES. Laboratory test results only found sugar and other food ingredients in the form of Dextrose Monohydrate, D-Sorbitol, Sucrose, D-Mannitol, Palmitate Compounds, Calcium and Methyl Stearate and Beta Lactose. The results of the Central BNN Drug Laboratory test can be said to be the same as the results from the Labfor. Surabaya branch, but there is additional content in the pacifier candy which is tested for BHT as an anti-oxidant. "Hopefully the results of the two tests will make the public calm and no longer worry about the alleged pacifier containing drugs," said I Made, who continued that the candy is safe for consumption. Although the candy dot case has found a bright spot, the Malang Regency BNN still appeals to the public to be aware of the various modes of illicit drug trafficking that are increasingly diverse. "The mode of drug trafficking is indeed increasingly sophisticated, even in some cases the type of food is often used as a mode by narcotics syndicates," he said. He also added, but usually these products are sold illegally and at prices that are certainly different from the market price, such as the case of a lot of candy pacifiers being sold at affordable prices for children. BNN also asked parents to always monitor their children's interactions. Likewise with other related parties, such as schools, RT neighborhoods, RW neighborhoods, to religious leaders, community leaders, traditional leaders, youth leaders to be able to help monitor the surrounding environment, in order to avoid the dangers of drug abuse. "It is mandatory to unite to fight drugs," said I Made, who also appealed for the pacifier case so that school children would bring their own food and drink from their respective homes.
berita_id: MALANGTIMES - Selama hampir seminggu, kecemasan warga atas sirkulasi dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan di berbagai daerah akhirnya terungkap.Hasil tes di Laboratorium Obat Narkotika Narkotika Narkotika Manoeuver (BNN) merilis permen TEAT dengan merek permen keras, yang merupakan makanan asing yang diproduksi di Cina dengan nomor izin distribusi BPOM 224409003077, tidak ada narkotika dan zat psikotropika yang ditemukan, seperti yang telah dilaporkan secara luas pada media sosial minggu ini.."Secara negatif, tidak ada konten narkotika yang ditemukan. Ini adalah hasil dari tes resmi dan dilaporkan secara langsung oleh hubungan masyarakat BNN pusat dengan nomor surat klarifikasi B/BK-1/III/2017/Humas tertanggal 9 Maret 2017," jelas kepala Malang Regency BNN, AKBP.Saya membuat Arjana melalui telepon, Kamis (09/03) malam ke Malangtimes.Hasil uji laboratorium hanya menemukan gula dan bahan makanan lainnya dalam bentuk dekstrosa monohidrat, D-sorbitol, sukrosa, D-mannitol, senyawa palmitat, kalsium dan metil starat dan laktosa beta.Hasil tes laboratorium obat BNN pusat dapat dikatakan sama dengan hasil dari labfor.Cabang Surabaya, tetapi ada konten tambahan dalam permen dot yang diuji BHT sebagai anti-oksidan."Mudah -mudahan hasil dari dua tes akan membuat publik tenang dan tidak lagi khawatir tentang dugaan dot yang mengandung obat -obatan," kata saya membuat, yang melanjutkan bahwa permen aman untuk dikonsumsi.Meskipun kasus Candy Dot telah menemukan titik terang, Kabupaten Malang masih menarik bagi publik untuk menyadari berbagai mode perdagangan narkoba yang semakin beragam."Mode perdagangan narkoba memang semakin canggih, bahkan dalam beberapa kasus jenis makanan sering digunakan sebagai mode oleh sindikat narkotika," katanya.Dia juga menambahkan, tetapi biasanya produk -produk ini dijual secara ilegal dan dengan harga yang tentu saja berbeda dari harga pasar, seperti kasus banyak dot permen yang dijual dengan harga terjangkau untuk anak -anak.BNN juga meminta orang tua untuk selalu memantau interaksi anak -anak mereka.Demikian juga dengan partai -partai terkait lainnya, seperti sekolah, lingkungan RT, lingkungan RW, bagi para pemimpin agama, pemimpin masyarakat, pemimpin tradisional, pemimpin pemuda yang dapat membantu memantau lingkungan sekitarnya, untuk menghindari bahaya penyalahgunaan narkoba."Adalah wajib untuk bersatu untuk melawan narkoba," kata saya membuat, yang juga mengimbau kasus dot sehingga anak -anak sekolah akan membawa makanan dan minuman mereka sendiri dari rumah masing -masing.

berita: Regarding the finding of candy snacks containing drugs, a number of people are worried, such as the Pekanbaru legislature. The Council asked the Police, Disperindag, BPOM and other related agencies enounce to act immediately and go to the field to ensure that the snacks for children suspected of containing drugs were not circulating in Pekanbaru City. "This is what worries us and the public, so it must be anticipated as soon as possible, so that it does not enter our area. For this reason, the police have been able to move down to the field to ensure that pacifiers suspected of containing drugs are not circulating in Pekanbaru, trace every trader and producer, " said Member of Commission II DPRD Pekanbaru City, Roem Diani Dewi, Friday (10/3). This PKS politician said that if the candy case which was indicated to contain drugs was true, then the police were asked to be firm and enforce the existing rules. "Don't let the goods have been circulated before taking action, because in some stalls it seems that they are already circulating, and we will see for ourselves," said Roem. In addition, said Roem, if it is proven that it is true and positive for containing drugs, law enforcement authorities are asked to be firm and give appropriate punishment to the food distributor or supplier. "It is the perpetrators of this crime who need to be dealt with. It is clear that this is damaging the nation's generation by incorporating harmful substances into snacks, especially for children," said Roem. Furthermore, Roem also hopes that, as a form of anticipation, the government, be it BPOM, Diskes, and schools need to work together to disseminate information to students about the dangers of drugs. "We hope that students are given an understanding of the dangers of this drug, especially if it is packaged in an attractive form like the alleged pacifier containing drugs, it is very difficult to be recognized by the public especially children. I think the school also plays a role and should not allow traffickers roaming outside schools whose health and safety are not guaranteed," explained Roem. The finding of pacifiers suspected of containing drugs is reportedly being traded in a number of elementary schools and kindergartens (TK) in the city of Surabaya, even to confirm the case, the Surabaya East Java government and other related parties such as the BPOM are reportedly conducting an investigation.
berita_id: Mengenai temuan camilan permen yang mengandung obat -obatan, sejumlah orang khawatir, seperti legislatif Pekanbaru.Dewan meminta polisi, Disperindag, BPOM, dan lembaga terkait lainnya untuk bertindak segera dan pergi ke lapangan untuk memastikan bahwa makanan ringan untuk anak -anak yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan tidak beredar di Kota Pekanbaru."Inilah yang membuat kami khawatir dan publik, jadi itu harus diantisipasi sesegera mungkin, sehingga tidak memasuki daerah kami. Untuk alasan ini, polisi telah dapat pindah ke lapangan untuk memastikan bahwa dot yang dicurigai mengandung obat -obatan tidak beredar di PEKANBARU, ROUS setiap pedagang dan produser," kata anggota Komisi II PEKAN.Politisi PKS ini mengatakan bahwa jika kasus permen yang diindikasikan mengandung narkoba itu benar, maka polisi diminta untuk menjadi tegas dan menegakkan aturan yang ada."Jangan biarkan barang telah diedarkan sebelum mengambil tindakan, karena di beberapa kios tampaknya mereka sudah beredar, dan kita akan melihat sendiri," kata Roem.Selain itu, kata Roem, jika terbukti bahwa itu benar dan positif untuk mengandung obat -obatan, otoritas penegak hukum diminta untuk tegas dan memberikan hukuman yang tepat kepada distributor makanan atau pemasok."Ini adalah pelaku kejahatan ini yang perlu ditangani. Jelas bahwa ini merusak generasi bangsa dengan memasukkan zat berbahaya ke dalam makanan ringan, terutama untuk anak -anak," kata Roem.Selain itu, Roem juga berharap bahwa, sebagai bentuk antisipasi, pemerintah, baik itu bpom, disk, dan sekolah perlu bekerja sama untuk menyebarkan informasi kepada siswa tentang bahaya narkoba."Kami berharap bahwa siswa diberi pemahaman tentang bahaya obat ini, terutama jika dikemas dalam bentuk yang menarik seperti dugaan dot yang mengandung obat -obatan, sangat sulit untuk diakui oleh publik terutama anak -anak. Saya pikir sekolah juga memainkan peran dan seharusnya tidak mengizinkan pedagang berkeliaran di luar sekolah yang kesehatan dan keselamatannya tidak dijamin," jelas Roem.Temuan dot yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan dilaporkan diperdagangkan di sejumlah sekolah dasar dan taman kanak -kanak (TK) di kota Surabaya, bahkan untuk mengkonfirmasi kasus tersebut, pemerintah Jawa East Surabaya dan partai -partai terkait lainnya seperti BPOM dilaporkan melakukan penyelidikan.

berita: Pokemon is a media franchise owned by the video game company Nintendo and created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1995. A piece of information is circulating on social media: the word Pokemon means "I'm Jewish". It is said that the name Pokemon is taken from the Syriac language (Syrian language) which in Indonesian means "I am Jewish". However, this is disputed, according to Sheikh Muhammed Salih Al-Munajjid of the Q&A Islamic Q&A site, the correct understanding of Pokemon is an abbreviation of "Pocket monster", which is an animal small enough to fit in a pocket. The correct view is that this is a name that comes from Japan. It is taken from the (English) words “Pocket monster” and means an animal that is small enough to fit in one's pocket. “Pokemon” is an abbreviation of these two words. (Islamic Q&A) According to the Oxford English dictionary, Pokemon (Pronunciation: /'poki?män/) is a video game featuring Japanese cartoon characters. Originally, Pokemon was the name of a Japanese video game from the word "pocket monster". On the Reference page, create the word "Pokemon" in Japanese comes from the words "Poketto" and "Monsut" or "Pocket Monsters" in English.
berita_id: Pokemon adalah waralaba media yang dimiliki oleh perusahaan video game Nintendo dan dibuat oleh Satoshi Tajiri pada tahun 1995. Sepotong informasi beredar di media sosial: kata Pokemon berarti "I'm Jewish".Dikatakan bahwa nama Pokemon diambil dari bahasa Syria (bahasa Suriah) yang dalam bahasa Indonesia berarti "Saya Yahudi".Namun, ini diperdebatkan, menurut Sheikh Muhammed Salih al-Munajjid dari situs Q&A Q&A, pemahaman yang benar tentang Pokemon adalah singkatan dari "monster saku", yang merupakan hewan yang cukup kecil untuk muat di saku.Pandangan yang benar adalah bahwa ini adalah nama yang berasal dari Jepang.Ini diambil dari kata -kata (bahasa Inggris) "monster saku" dan berarti binatang yang cukup kecil untuk dimasukkan ke dalam saku seseorang."Pokemon" adalah singkatan dari dua kata ini.(T&J Islam) Menurut Kamus Bahasa Inggris Oxford, Pokemon (pengucapan: /'Poki? Män /) adalah video game yang menampilkan karakter kartun Jepang.Awalnya, Pokemon adalah nama video game Jepang dari kata "saku monster".Di halaman referensi, buat kata "pokemon" dalam bahasa Jepang berasal dari kata "poketto" dan "monsut" atau "monster saku" dalam bahasa Inggris.

berita: Thousands of Reog Ponorogo artists held a demonstration, Tuesday (10/11/2015), as a form of protest over the burning of Reog properties at the Consulate General of the Republic of Indonesia (KJRI) Davao in the Philippines. Based on information compiled by Madiunpos.com, the artist's demonstration of the reog burning incident was not only carried out by artists from Ponorogo. Also seen taking to the streets are artists from various cities or regencies in Indonesia. The thousands of artists held demonstrations by giving speeches, unfurling banners bearing a number of demands, and also performing reog around Ponorogo Square. After carrying out a series of activities in protest against the burning of property at the Consulate General in Davao, representatives of the demonstrators were then allowed to attend a hearing on the second floor of the Ponorogo Regency DPRD Building, Jl. East Square. Representatives of the participants in the demonstration were received by elements of the leadership of the Ponorogo DPRD along with the Acting Regent of Ponorogo Maskur. "We do not accept the burning of reog that was carried out at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao some time ago. Our demand is that they immediately apologize to the people of Ponorogo as the owner of this reog art," said the reog artist representing the Community Pandemen Reyog (Kompag) Ponorogo, Grendo, as quoted by Madiunpos.com from the Facebook fanpage wall All About Ponorogo, Tuesday. Reog Pemeriksaan Checkup Meanwhile, Spokesperson for the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Arrmanatha Nasir, said that his party was conducting an internal inspection regarding the burning of reog at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. "Essentially, there has been an official statement from the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao regarding the reog issue and the Ministry of Foreign Affairs also has an internal process to ensure that the goods are state agency assets," said Arrmanatha Nasir in Jakarta, as reported by Antara News Agency, Sunday (8/8). /11/2015). On 20 October 2015, the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao issued an official statement that the destruction of Ponorogo reog by burning was carried out because its condition had been damaged and eaten by termites. However, the photos that have gone viral and have even been distributed by local online media, Bitung News, show that there is a certain ritual before the burning. In Good Condition One of the photos also shows that before being burned, the Ponorogo reog was stored in a glass cabinet and appeared to be in good condition. Apart from the reog, in another photo, it can be seen that Indonesian Consulate General Davao removed the dragon ornaments ministry on the gamelan set and then burned it. Related to this, Arrmanatha conveyed that the Ministry of Foreign Affairs would carry out inspections according to the processes in accordance with existing standards. " Periodically there are internal inspections , " he said . Domestic reactions related to the burning of Reog Ponorogo at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, were conveyed by the Jabodetabek Reog Community. The community sent an official letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, asking for clarification on information on the burning of reog art instruments by Indonesian Consulate General officials. Secretary General of the Jabodetabek Reog Association, Agus Setiyoko, said that his party hoped that the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, apart from providing a detailed explanation of the burning of reog, could also broadcast clarifications on the burning of reog art objects in a number of national media.
berita_id: Ribuan seniman Reog Ponorogo mengadakan demonstrasi, Selasa (10/11/2015), sebagai bentuk protes atas pembakaran properti reog di Konsulat Jenderal Republik Indonesia (KJRI) Davao di Filipina.Berdasarkan informasi yang disusun oleh madiunpos.com, demonstrasi artis tentang insiden pembakaran yang di -reog tidak hanya dilakukan oleh seniman dari Ponorogo.Juga terlihat turun ke jalan adalah seniman dari berbagai kota atau daerah di Indonesia.Ribuan seniman mengadakan demonstrasi dengan memberikan pidato, membentangkan spanduk yang memiliki sejumlah tuntutan, dan juga melakukan reog di sekitar Ponorogo Square.Setelah melakukan serangkaian kegiatan sebagai protes terhadap pembakaran properti di Jenderal Konsulat di Davao, perwakilan para demonstran kemudian diizinkan untuk menghadiri sidang di lantai dua gedung DPRD Kabupaten Ponorogo, JL.Lapangan Timur.Perwakilan peserta dalam demonstrasi diterima oleh unsur -unsur kepemimpinan Ponorogo DPRD bersama dengan akting bupati Ponorogo Maskur."Kami tidak menerima pembakaran reog yang dilakukan di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao beberapa waktu yang lalu. Permintaan kami adalah bahwa mereka segera meminta maaf kepada orang -orang Ponorogo sebagai pemilik seni reog ini," kata artis reog yang mewakili pandemen pandemen dari pandemen facebook (kompag) ponorogo, grendo, seperti yang dikutip oleh MADOOG.Sementara itu, pemeriksaan kembali Pemeriksaan, juru bicara Kementerian Luar Negeri, Arrmanatha Nasir, mengatakan bahwa partainya sedang melakukan inspeksi internal mengenai pembakaran reog di konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina."Pada dasarnya, telah ada pernyataan resmi dari konsulat jenderal Indonesia di Davao mengenai masalah yang dirancang ulang dan Kementerian Luar Negeri juga memiliki proses internal untuk memastikan bahwa barang tersebut adalah aset agen negara," kata Arrmanatha Nasir di Jakarta, seperti dilaporkan oleh Antara News Agency, Minggu (8/8)./11/2015).Pada tanggal 20 Oktober 2015, konsulat umum Indonesia di Davao mengeluarkan pernyataan resmi bahwa penghancuran Ponorogo Reog dengan pembakaran dilakukan karena kondisinya telah rusak dan dimakan oleh rayap.Namun, foto -foto yang telah menjadi viral dan bahkan telah didistribusikan oleh media online lokal, Bitung News, menunjukkan bahwa ada ritual tertentu sebelum pembakaran.Dalam kondisi baik, salah satu foto juga menunjukkan bahwa sebelum dibakar, Ponorogo Reog disimpan di lemari kaca dan tampak dalam kondisi baik.Terlepas dari reog, di foto lain, dapat dilihat bahwa konsulat Indonesia Jenderal Davao menghapus pelayanan Ornamen Naga di set Gamelan dan kemudian membakarnya.Terkait dengan ini, Arrmanatha menyampaikan bahwa Kementerian Luar Negeri akan melakukan inspeksi sesuai dengan proses sesuai dengan standar yang ada."Secara berkala ada inspeksi internal," katanya.Reaksi domestik yang berkaitan dengan pembakaran Ponorogo Reog di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, disampaikan oleh komunitas Reog Jabodetabek.Komunitas mengirim surat resmi kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, meminta klarifikasi tentang informasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog oleh pejabat umum konsulat Indonesia.Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Agus Setiyoko, mengatakan bahwa partainya berharap bahwa Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, selain memberikan penjelasan terperinci tentang pembakaran Reog, juga dapat menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang pembakaran benda -benda seni yang digunakan kembali di sejumlah media nasional.

berita: Previously bent or curved iPhone cases had hit some iPhone models. Finally, this case happened to the iPhone 5S earlier this year. What about the new iPhone duo that was just released to Apple's market on Friday last week? Not even a week, a similar case has been reported by iPhone 6 users. Not only one case, three iPhone 6s in a curved state have been spread on the internet. As quoted from Mashable, Wednesday (24/9/2014), a member of the MacRumors forum shared a photo respective of his curved iPhone 6 Plus. Hanzon, the member's name, admitted that he kept the iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket while driving. After a few hours of pocketing, Hanzon found the iPhone 6 had changed shape, the center was slightly curved. A similar case was also reported by a member of the MacRumors forum, DevinPitcher. He said that his colleague's iPhone 6 Plus also curved after being pocketed in the front pocket of his pants. A photo of the curved iPhone 6 was also posted by Devin in a thread. A post on the French forum, MacBidouille, also reported a similar case. Members of this forum also included a photo of a colleague's iPhone 6 that was bent just because it was placed in the front pocket of his pants. This crooked case is not the first to happen. Earlier this year, several iPhone 5S owners reported that their phones were curved even though they weren't impacted and also didn't sit in their back pockets or sit down. Meanwhile, in 2012, several iPhone 5 users claimed to experience such cases on their devices.
berita_id: Kasing iPhone yang sebelumnya bengkok atau melengkung telah mencapai beberapa model iPhone.Akhirnya, kasus ini terjadi pada iPhone 5S awal tahun ini.Bagaimana dengan duo iPhone baru yang baru saja dirilis ke Apple's Market pada hari Jumat minggu lalu?Bahkan tidak seminggu, kasus serupa telah dilaporkan oleh pengguna iPhone 6.Tidak hanya satu kasus, tiga iPhone 6s dalam keadaan melengkung telah tersebar di internet.Seperti dikutip dari Mashable, Rabu (24/9/2014), seorang anggota Forum Macrumors membagikan foto masing -masing dari iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung.Hanzon, nama anggota, mengakui bahwa ia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana depannya saat mengemudi.Setelah beberapa jam mengantongi, Hanzon menemukan iPhone 6 telah berubah bentuk, pusatnya sedikit melengkung.Kasus serupa juga dilaporkan oleh anggota Forum Macrumors, Devinpitcher.Dia mengatakan bahwa iPhone 6 Plus rekannya juga melengkung setelah dikenakan di saku depan celananya.Foto iPhone 6 melengkung juga diposting oleh Devin di utas.Sebuah posting di forum Prancis, MacBidouille, juga melaporkan kasus serupa.Anggota forum ini juga menyertakan foto iPhone 6 kolega yang ditekuk hanya karena ditempatkan di saku depan celananya.Kasus bengkok ini bukan yang pertama terjadi.Awal tahun ini, beberapa pemilik iPhone 5S melaporkan bahwa ponsel mereka melengkung meskipun mereka tidak terpengaruh dan juga tidak duduk di saku belakang mereka atau duduk.Sementara itu, pada tahun 2012, beberapa pengguna iPhone 5 mengklaim mengalami kasus seperti itu di perangkat mereka.
